  17module thinning_mod
  18  ! MODULE thinning (prefix='thn' category='1. High-level functionality')
  19  !
  20  !:Purpose: Using observation-type-specific algorithms, set bit 11 of 'flag'
  21  !           on data that are not to be assimilated.
  22  !
  23  !:Note:    This module is intended to group all of the thinning methods in a
  24  !           single fortran module.
  25  !
  26  use midasMpi_mod
  27  use bufr_mod
  28  use mathPhysConstants_mod
  29  use earthConstants_mod
  30  use obsSpaceData_mod
  31  use horizontalCoord_mod
  32  use verticalCoord_mod
  33  use timeCoord_mod
  34  use gridStateVector_mod
  35  use gridStateVectorFileIO_mod
  36  use codtyp_mod
  37  use physicsFunctions_mod
  38  use utilities_mod
  39  use kdtree2_mod
  40  implicit none
  41  private
  42
  43  public :: thn_thinHyper, thn_thinTovs, thn_thinCSR
  44  public :: thn_thinRaobs, thn_thinAircraft, thn_thinScat, thn_thinSatWinds
  45  public :: thn_thinSurface, thn_thinGbGps, thn_thinGpsRo, thn_thinAladin
  46  public :: thn_thinSatSST
  47  integer, external :: get_max_rss
  48
  49contains
  50
  51  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
  52  ! thn_thinSurface
  53  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
  54  subroutine thn_thinSurface(obsdat, obsFamily)
  55    !:Purpose: Main subroutine for thinning of surface obs.
  56
  57    implicit none
  58
  59    ! Arguments:
  60    type(struct_obs), intent(inout) :: obsdat
  61    character(len=2), intent(in)    :: obsFamily
  62
  63    ! Locals:
  64    integer :: nulnam
  65    integer :: fnom, fclos, ierr
  66
  67    ! Namelist variables
  68    logical :: doThinning        ! if false, we return immediately
  69    real(8) :: step              ! time resolution (in hours)
  70    integer :: deltmax           ! maximum time difference (in minutes)
  71    logical :: useBlackList      ! signal if blacklist file should be read and used
  72    logical :: considerSHIPstnID ! signal if SHIP stn ID should be considered in thinning
  73
  74    namelist /thin_surface/doThinning, step, deltmax, useBlackList, considerSHIPstnID
  75    
  76    ! set default values for namelist variables
  77    doThinning        = .false. 
  78    step              = 6.0d0   
  79    deltmax           = 90      
  80    useBlackList      = .false. 
  81    considerSHIPstnID = .true.
  82    
  83    ! return if no surface obs
  84    if (.not. obs_famExist(obsdat, obsFamily)) return
  85
  86    ! Read the namelist for Surface observations (if it exists)
  87    if (utl_isNamelistPresent('thin_surface', './flnml')) then
  88      nulnam = 0
  89      ierr = fnom(nulnam, './flnml','FTN+SEQ+R/O', 0)
  90      if (ierr /= 0) call utl_abort('thn_thinSurface: Error opening file flnml')
  91      read(nulnam,nml = thin_surface, iostat = ierr)
  92      if (ierr /= 0) call utl_abort('thn_thinSurface: Error reading namelist')
  93      if (mmpi_myid == 0) write(*, nml = thin_surface)
  94      ierr = fclos(nulnam)
  95    else
  96      write(*,*)
  97      write(*,*) 'thn_thinSurface: Namelist block thin_surface is missing in the namelist.'
  98      write(*,*) '                 The default value will be taken.'
  99      if (mmpi_myid == 0) write(*, nml = thin_surface)
 100    end if    
 101
 102    if (.not. doThinning) return
 103
 104    call utl_tmg_start(114,'--ObsThinning')
 105    call thn_surfaceInTime(obsdat, obsFamily, step, deltmax, useBlackList, considerSHIPstnID)
 106    call utl_tmg_stop(114)
 107
 108  end subroutine thn_thinSurface
 109
 110  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 111  ! thn_thinRaobs
 112  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 113  subroutine thn_thinRaobs(obsdat)
 114    !:Purpose: Main thinning subroutine Radiosonde obs.
 115
 116    implicit none
 117
 118    ! Arguments:
 119    type(struct_obs), intent(inout) :: obsdat
 120
 121    ! Locals:
 122    integer :: nulnam
 123    integer :: fnom, fclos, ierr
 124
 125    ! Namelist variables
 126    logical :: verticalThinningES ! choose to do vertical thinning of humidity obs
 127    logical :: ecmwfRejetsES      ! choose to do filtering of T-Td obs with approach similar to ECMWF
 128    real(4) :: toleranceFactor    ! Tolerance factor for TAC vs BUFR selection
 129
 130    namelist /thin_raobs/ verticalThinningES, ecmwfRejetsES, toleranceFactor
 131
 132    ! return if no aircraft obs
 133    if (.not. obs_famExist(obsdat,'UA')) return
 134
 135    ! Default values for namelist variables
 136    verticalThinningES = .true.
 137    ecmwfRejetsES = .true.
 138    toleranceFactor = 1.4
 139
 140    ! Read the namelist for Radiosonde observations (if it exists)
 141    if (utl_isNamelistPresent('thin_raobs','./flnml')) then
 142      nulnam = 0
 143      ierr = fnom(nulnam,'./flnml','FTN+SEQ+R/O',0)
 144      if (ierr /= 0) call utl_abort('thn_thinRaobs: Error opening file flnml')
 145      read(nulnam,nml=thin_raobs,iostat=ierr)
 146      if (ierr /= 0) call utl_abort('thn_thinRaobs: Error reading thin_raobs namelist')
 147      if (mmpi_myid == 0) write(*,nml=thin_raobs)
 148      ierr = fclos(nulnam)
 149    else
 150      write(*,*)
 151      write(*,*) 'thn_thinRaobs: Namelist block thin_raobs is missing in the namelist.'
 152      write(*,*) '               The default value will be taken.'
 153      if (mmpi_myid == 0) write(*,nml=thin_raobs)
 154    end if
 155
 156    call utl_tmg_start(114,'--ObsThinning')
 157    call thn_radiosonde(obsdat, verticalThinningES, ecmwfRejetsES, toleranceFactor)
 158    call utl_tmg_stop(114)
 159
 160  end subroutine thn_thinRaobs
 161
 162  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 163  ! thn_thinAircraft
 164  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 165  subroutine thn_thinAircraft(obsdat)
 166    !:Purpose: Main thinning subroutine for aircraft obs.
 167
 168    implicit none
 169
 170    ! Arguments:
 171    type(struct_obs), intent(inout) :: obsdat
 172
 173    ! Locals:
 174    integer :: nulnam
 175    integer :: fnom, fclos, ierr
 176
 177    ! Namelist variables
 178    integer :: deltmax ! maximum time difference (in minutes)
 179
 180    namelist /thin_aircraft/deltmax
 181
 182    ! return if no aircraft obs
 183    if (.not. obs_famExist(obsdat,'AI')) return
 184
 185    ! Default values for namelist variables
 186    deltmax = 90
 187
 188    ! Read the namelist for Aircraft observations (if it exists)
 189    if (utl_isNamelistPresent('thin_aircraft','./flnml')) then
 190      nulnam = 0
 191      ierr = fnom(nulnam,'./flnml','FTN+SEQ+R/O',0)
 192      if (ierr /= 0) call utl_abort('thn_thinAircraft: Error opening file flnml')
 193      read(nulnam,nml=thin_aircraft,iostat=ierr)
 194      if (ierr /= 0) call utl_abort('thn_thinAircraft: Error reading thin_aircraft namelist')
 195      if (mmpi_myid == 0) write(*,nml=thin_aircraft)
 196      ierr = fclos(nulnam)
 197    else
 198      write(*,*)
 199      write(*,*) 'thn_thinAircraft: Namelist block thin_aircraft is missing in the namelist.'
 200      write(*,*) '                  The default value will be taken.'
 201      if (mmpi_myid == 0) write(*,nml=thin_aircraft)
 202    end if
 203
 204    call utl_tmg_start(114,'--ObsThinning')
 205    call thn_aircraftByBoxes(obsdat, 'AI', deltmax)
 206    call utl_tmg_stop(114)
 207
 208  end subroutine thn_thinAircraft
 209
 210  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 211  ! thn_thinSatWinds
 212  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 213  subroutine thn_thinSatWinds(obsdat)
 214    !:Purpose: Main thinning subroutine for satellite winds (AMVs).
 215
 216    implicit none
 217
 218    ! Arguments:
 219    type(struct_obs), intent(inout) :: obsdat
 220
 221    ! Locals:
 222    integer :: nulnam
 223    integer :: fnom, fclos, ierr
 224
 225    ! Namelist variables
 226    integer :: deltemps ! number of time bins between adjacent observations
 227    integer :: deldist  ! minimal distance in km between adjacent observations
 228
 229    namelist /thin_satwind/deltemps, deldist
 230
 231    ! return if no satwind obs
 232    if (.not. obs_famExist(obsdat,'SW')) return
 233
 234    ! Default values for namelist variables
 235    deltemps = 6
 236    deldist  = 200
 237
 238    ! Read the namelist for SatWinds observations (if it exists)
 239    if (utl_isNamelistPresent('thin_satwind','./flnml')) then
 240      nulnam = 0
 241      ierr = fnom(nulnam,'./flnml','FTN+SEQ+R/O',0)
 242      if (ierr /= 0) call utl_abort('thn_thinSatWinds: Error opening file flnml')
 243      read(nulnam,nml=thin_satwind,iostat=ierr)
 244      if (ierr /= 0) call utl_abort('thn_thinSatWinds: Error reading thin_satwind namelist')
 245      if (mmpi_myid == 0) write(*,nml=thin_satwind)
 246      ierr = fclos(nulnam)
 247    else
 248      write(*,*)
 249      write(*,*) 'thn_thinSatWinds: Namelist block thin_satwind is missing in the namelist.'
 250      write(*,*) '                  The default value will be taken.'
 251      if (mmpi_myid == 0) write(*,nml=thin_satwind)
 252    end if
 253
 254    call utl_tmg_start(114,'--ObsThinning')
 255    call thn_satWindsByDistance(obsdat, 'SW', deltemps, deldist)
 256    call utl_tmg_stop(114)
 257
 258  end subroutine thn_thinSatWinds
 259
 260  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 261  ! thn_thinGpsRo
 262  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 263  subroutine thn_thinGpsRo(obsdat)
 264    !:Purpose: Main thinning subroutine GPS radio-occultation obs.
 265    !
 266    implicit none
 267
 268    ! Arguments:
 269    type(struct_obs), intent(inout) :: obsdat
 270
 271    ! Locals:
 272    integer :: nulnam
 273    integer :: fnom, fclos, ierr
 274
 275    ! Namelist variables
 276    real(8) :: heightMin     ! niveau a partir du quel on accepte les donnees
 277    real(8) :: heightMax     ! niveau a partir du quel on rejette les donnees
 278    real(8) :: heightSpacing ! epaisseur minimale entre deux niveaux
 279    integer :: gpsroVarNo    ! bufr element id to be used
 280
 281    namelist /thin_gpsro/heightMin, heightMax, heightSpacing, gpsroVarNo
 282
 283    ! return if no gb-gps obs
 284    if (.not. obs_famExist(obsdat,'RO')) return
 285
 286    ! Default values for namelist variables
 287    heightMin     = 1000.0d0
 288    heightMax     = 40000.0d0
 289    heightSpacing = 750.0d0
 290    gpsroVarNo    = BUFR_NERF ! default is refractivity
 291
 292    ! Read the namelist for GpsRo observations (if it exists)
 293    if (utl_isNamelistPresent('thin_gpsro','./flnml')) then
 294      nulnam = 0
 295      ierr = fnom(nulnam,'./flnml','FTN+SEQ+R/O',0)
 296      if (ierr /= 0) call utl_abort('thn_thinGpsRo: Error opening file flnml')
 297      read(nulnam,nml=thin_gpsro,iostat=ierr)
 298      if (ierr /= 0) call utl_abort('thn_thinGpsRo: Error reading thin_gpsro namelist')
 299      if (mmpi_myid == 0) write(*,nml=thin_gpsro)
 300      ierr = fclos(nulnam)
 301    else
 302      write(*,*)
 303      write(*,*) 'thn_thinGpsRo: Namelist block thin_gpsro is missing in the namelist.'
 304      write(*,*) '               The default value will be taken.'
 305      if (mmpi_myid == 0) write(*,nml=thin_gpsro)
 306    end if
 307
 308    call utl_tmg_start(114,'--ObsThinning')
 309    call thn_gpsroVertical(obsdat, heightMin, heightMax, heightSpacing, gpsroVarNo)
 310    call utl_tmg_stop(114)
 311
 312  end subroutine thn_thinGpsRo
 313
 314  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 315  ! thn_thinGbGps
 316  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 317  subroutine thn_thinGbGps(obsdat)
 318    !:Purpose: Main thinning subroutine ground-based GPS obs.
 319    !
 320    implicit none
 321
 322    ! Arguments:
 323    type(struct_obs), intent(inout) :: obsdat
 324
 325    ! Locals:
 326    integer :: nulnam
 327    integer :: fnom, fclos, ierr
 328
 329    ! Namelist variables
 330    integer :: deltemps     ! number of time bins between adjacent observations
 331    integer :: deldist      ! minimal distance in km between adjacent observations
 332    logical :: removeUncorrected ! remove obs that are not bias corrected (bit 6)
 333    logical :: rejectNoZTDScore ! reject GB-GPS obs if no ZTD quality score available
 334   
 335    namelist /thin_gbgps/deltemps, deldist, rejectNoZTDScore, removeUncorrected
 336
 337    ! return if no gb-gps obs
 338    if (.not. obs_famExist(obsdat,'GP')) return
 339
 340    ! Default values for namelist variables
 341    deltemps     = 8
 342    deldist      = 50
 343    removeUncorrected = .false.
 344    rejectNoZTDScore = .false.
 345
 346    ! Read the namelist for GbGps observations (if it exists)
 347    if (utl_isNamelistPresent('thin_gbgps','./flnml')) then
 348      nulnam = 0
 349      ierr = fnom(nulnam,'./flnml','FTN+SEQ+R/O',0)
 350      if (ierr /= 0) call utl_abort('thn_thinGbGps: Error opening file flnml')
 351      read(nulnam,nml=thin_gbgps,iostat=ierr)
 352      if (ierr /= 0) call utl_abort('thn_thinGbGps: Error reading thin_gbgps namelist')
 353      if (mmpi_myid == 0) write(*,nml=thin_gbgps)
 354      ierr = fclos(nulnam)
 355    else
 356      write(*,*)
 357      write(*,*) 'thn_thinGbGps: Namelist block thin_gbgps is missing in the namelist.'
 358      write(*,*) '               The default value will be taken.'
 359      if (mmpi_myid == 0) write(*,nml=thin_gbgps)
 360    end if
 361
 362    call utl_tmg_start(114,'--ObsThinning')
 363    call thn_gbgpsByDistance(obsdat, deltemps, deldist, removeUncorrected, rejectNoZTDScore)
 364    call utl_tmg_stop(114)
 365
 366  end subroutine thn_thinGbGps
 367
 368  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 369  ! thn_thinAladin
 370  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 371  subroutine thn_thinAladin(obsdat)
 372    !:Purpose: Main thinning subroutine for Aladin winds obs.
 373
 374    implicit none
 375
 376    ! Arguments:
 377    type(struct_obs), intent(inout) :: obsdat
 378
 379    ! Locals:
 380    integer :: nulnam
 381    integer :: fnom, fclos, ierr
 382
 383    ! Namelist variables
 384    integer :: keepNthVertical ! keep every nth vertical datum
 385
 386    namelist /thin_aladin/keepNthVertical
 387
 388    ! return if no Aladin obs
 389    if (.not. obs_famExist(obsdat,'AL')) return
 390
 391    ! Default values for namelist variables
 392    keepNthVertical=-1
 393
 394    ! Read the namelist for Aladin observations (if it exists)
 395    if (utl_isNamelistPresent('thin_aladin','./flnml')) then
 396      nulnam = 0
 397      ierr = fnom(nulnam,'./flnml','FTN+SEQ+R/O',0)
 398      if (ierr /= 0) call utl_abort('thn_thinAladin: Error opening file flnml')
 399      read(nulnam,nml=thin_aladin,iostat=ierr)
 400      if (ierr /= 0) call utl_abort('thn_thinAladin: Error reading thin_aladin namelist')
 401      if (mmpi_myid == 0) write(*,nml=thin_aladin)
 402      ierr = fclos(nulnam)
 403    else
 404      write(*,*)
 405      write(*,*) 'thn_thinAladin: Namelist block thin_aladin is missing in the namelist.'
 406      write(*,*) '                The default value will be taken.'
 407      if (mmpi_myid == 0) write(*,nml=thin_aladin)
 408    end if
 409
 410    if (keepNthVertical > 0) then
 411      call utl_tmg_start(114,'--ObsThinning')
 412      call thn_keepNthObs(obsdat, 'AL', keepNthVertical)
 413      call utl_tmg_stop(114)
 414    end if
 415
 416  end subroutine thn_thinAladin
 417
 418  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 419  ! thn_thinCSR
 420  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 421  subroutine thn_thinCSR(obsdat)
 422    !:Purpose: Main thinning subroutine for geostationary radiances (CSR).
 423
 424    implicit none
 425
 426    ! Arguments:
 427    type(struct_obs), intent(inout) :: obsdat
 428
 429    ! Locals:
 430    integer :: nulnam
 431    integer :: fnom, fclos, ierr
 432
 433    ! Namelist variables
 434    integer :: deltax     ! thinning (dimension of box sides) (in km)
 435    integer :: deltrad    ! radius around box center for chosen obs (in km)
 436
 437    namelist /thin_csr/deltax, deltrad
 438
 439    ! return if no TOVS obs
 440    if (.not. obs_famExist(obsdat,'TO')) return
 441
 442    ! Default namelist values
 443    deltax  = 150
 444    deltrad = 45
 445
 446    ! Read the namelist for CSR observations (if it exists)
 447    if (utl_isNamelistPresent('thin_csr','./flnml')) then
 448      nulnam = 0
 449      ierr = fnom(nulnam,'./flnml','FTN+SEQ+R/O',0)
 450      if (ierr /= 0) call utl_abort('thn_thinCSR: Error opening file flnml')
 451      read(nulnam,nml=thin_csr,iostat=ierr)
 452      if (ierr /= 0) call utl_abort('thn_thinCSR: Error reading thin_csr namelist')
 453      if (mmpi_myid == 0) write(*,nml=thin_csr)
 454      ierr = fclos(nulnam)
 455    else
 456      write(*,*)
 457      write(*,*) 'thn_thinCSR: Namelist block thin_csr is missing in the namelist.'
 458      write(*,*) '             The default value will be taken.'
 459      if (mmpi_myid == 0) write(*,nml=thin_csr)
 460    end if
 461
 462    write(*,*) 'Memory Used: ',get_max_rss()/1024,'Mb'
 463    call utl_tmg_start(114,'--ObsThinning')
 464    call thn_csrByLatLonBoxes(obsdat, deltax, deltrad)
 465    call utl_tmg_stop(114)
 466    write(*,*) 'Memory Used: ',get_max_rss()/1024,'Mb'
 467
 468  end subroutine thn_thinCSR
 469
 470  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 471  ! thn_thinScat
 472  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 473  subroutine thn_thinScat(obsdat)
 474    !:Purpose: Main thinning subroutine for scatterometer winds.
 475
 476    implicit none
 477
 478    ! Arguments:
 479    type(struct_obs), intent(inout) :: obsdat
 480
 481    ! Locals:
 482    integer :: nulnam
 483    integer :: fnom, fclos, ierr
 484
 485    ! Namelist variables
 486    integer :: deltax     ! thinning (dimension of box sides) (in km)
 487    integer :: deltmax    ! temporal thinning resolution (in minutes)
 488
 489    namelist /thin_scat/deltax, deltmax
 490
 491    ! return if no scat obs
 492    if (.not. obs_famExist(obsdat,'SC')) return
 493
 494    ! Default namelist values
 495    deltax = 100
 496    deltmax = 90
 497
 498    ! Read the namelist for Scat observations (if it exists)
 499    if (utl_isNamelistPresent('thin_scat','./flnml')) then
 500      nulnam = 0
 501      ierr = fnom(nulnam,'./flnml','FTN+SEQ+R/O',0)
 502      if (ierr /= 0) call utl_abort('thn_thinScat: Error opening file flnml')
 503      read(nulnam,nml=thin_scat,iostat=ierr)
 504      if (ierr /= 0) call utl_abort('thn_thinScat: Error reading thin_scat namelist')
 505      if (mmpi_myid == 0) write(*,nml=thin_scat)
 506      ierr = fclos(nulnam)
 507    else
 508      write(*,*)
 509      write(*,*) 'thn_thinScat: Namelist block thin_scat is missing in the namelist.'
 510      write(*,*) '              The default value will be taken.'
 511      if (mmpi_myid == 0) write(*,nml=thin_scat)
 512    end if
 513
 514    write(*,*) 'Memory Used: ',get_max_rss()/1024,'Mb'
 515    call utl_tmg_start(114,'--ObsThinning')
 516    call thn_scatByLatLonBoxes(obsdat, deltax, deltmax)
 517    call utl_tmg_stop(114)
 518    write(*,*) 'Memory Used: ',get_max_rss()/1024,'Mb'
 519
 520  end subroutine thn_thinScat
 521
 522  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 523  ! thn_thinTovs
 524  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 525  subroutine thn_thinTovs(obsdat)
 526    !:Purpose: Main thinning subroutine for AMSU and ATMS obs.
 527
 528    implicit none
 529
 530    ! Arguments:
 531    type(struct_obs), intent(inout) :: obsdat
 532
 533    ! Locals:
 534    integer :: nulnam
 535    integer :: fnom, fclos, ierr
 536
 537    ! Namelist variables
 538    integer :: delta    ! thinning (dimension of box sides) (in km)
 539    integer :: deltrad  ! radius around box center for chosen obs (in km)
 540
 541    namelist /thin_tovs/delta, deltrad
 542
 543    ! return if no TOVS obs
 544    if (.not. obs_famExist(obsdat,'TO')) return
 545
 546    ! Default namelist values
 547    delta   = 100
 548    deltrad = 75
 549
 550    ! Read the namelist for TOVS observations (if it exists)
 551    if (utl_isNamelistPresent('thin_tovs','./flnml')) then
 552      nulnam = 0
 553      ierr = fnom(nulnam,'./flnml','FTN+SEQ+R/O',0)
 554      if (ierr /= 0) call utl_abort('thn_thinTovs: Error opening file flnml')
 555      read(nulnam,nml=thin_tovs,iostat=ierr)
 556      if (ierr /= 0) call utl_abort('thn_thinTovs: Error reading thin_tovs namelist')
 557      if (mmpi_myid == 0) write(*,nml=thin_tovs)
 558      ierr = fclos(nulnam)
 559    else
 560      write(*,*)
 561      write(*,*) 'thn_thinTovs: Namelist block thin_tovs is missing in the namelist.'
 562      write(*,*) '              The default value will be taken.'
 563      if (mmpi_myid == 0) write(*,nml=thin_tovs)
 564    end if
 565
 566    call utl_tmg_start(114,'--ObsThinning')
 567    write(*,*) 'Memory Used: ',get_max_rss()/1024,'Mb'
 568    call thn_tovsFilt(obsdat, delta, deltrad, codtyp_get_codtyp('amsua'))
 569    write(*,*) 'Memory Used: ',get_max_rss()/1024,'Mb'
 570    call thn_tovsFilt(obsdat, delta, deltrad, codtyp_get_codtyp('amsub'), &
 571                      codtyp2_opt=codtyp_get_codtyp('mhs'))
 572    write(*,*) 'Memory Used: ',get_max_rss()/1024,'Mb'
 573    call thn_tovsFilt(obsdat, delta, deltrad, codtyp_get_codtyp('atms'))
 574    write(*,*) 'Memory Used: ',get_max_rss()/1024,'Mb'
 575    call thn_tovsFilt(obsdat, delta, deltrad, codtyp_get_codtyp('mwhs2'))
 576    write(*,*) 'Memory Used: ',get_max_rss()/1024,'Mb'
 577    call thn_tovsFilt(obsdat, delta, deltrad, codtyp_get_codtyp('ssmis'))
 578    write(*,*) 'Memory Used: ',get_max_rss()/1024,'Mb'
 579    call utl_tmg_stop(114)
 580
 581  end subroutine thn_thinTovs
 582
 583  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 584  ! thn_thinHyper
 585  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 586  subroutine thn_thinHyper(obsdat)
 587    !:Purpose: Main thinning subroutine for hyperspectral infrared radiances.
 588
 589    implicit none
 590
 591    ! Arguments:
 592    type(struct_obs), intent(inout) :: obsdat
 593
 594    ! Locals:
 595    integer :: nulnam
 596    integer :: fnom, fclos, ierr
 597
 598    ! Namelist variables
 599    logical :: removeUnCorrected ! indicate if obs without bias correction should be removed
 600    integer :: deltmax           ! time window by bin (from bin center to bin edge) (in minutes)
 601    integer :: deltax            ! thinning (dimension of box sides) (in km)
 602    integer :: deltrad           ! radius around box center for chosen obs (in km)
 603    namelist /thin_hyper/removeUnCorrected, deltmax, deltax, deltrad
 604
 605    ! return if no TOVS obs
 606    if (.not. obs_famExist(obsdat,'TO')) return
 607
 608    ! Default namelist values
 609    removeUnCorrected = .true.
 610    deltmax = 22
 611    deltax  = 150
 612    deltrad = 45
 613
 614    ! Read the namelist for Aladin observations (if it exists)
 615    if (utl_isNamelistPresent('thin_hyper','./flnml')) then
 616      nulnam = 0
 617      ierr = fnom(nulnam,'./flnml','FTN+SEQ+R/O',0)
 618      if (ierr /= 0) call utl_abort('thn_thinHyper: Error opening file flnml')
 619      read(nulnam,nml=thin_hyper,iostat=ierr)
 620      if (ierr /= 0) call utl_abort('thn_thinHyper: Error reading thin_hyper namelist')
 621      if (mmpi_myid == 0) write(*,nml=thin_hyper)
 622      ierr = fclos(nulnam)
 623    else
 624      write(*,*)
 625      write(*,*) 'thn_thinHyper: Namelist block thin_hyper is missing in the namelist.'
 626      write(*,*) '               The default value will be taken.'
 627      if (mmpi_myid == 0) write(*,nml=thin_hyper)
 628    end if
 629
 630    call utl_tmg_start(114,'--ObsThinning')
 631    write(*,*) 'Memory Used: ',get_max_rss()/1024,'Mb'
 632    call thn_hyperByLatLonBoxes(obsdat, removeUnCorrected, deltmax, deltax, deltrad, &
 633                                'TO', codtyp_get_codtyp('airs'))
 634    write(*,*) 'Memory Used: ',get_max_rss()/1024,'Mb'
 635    call thn_hyperByLatLonBoxes(obsdat, removeUnCorrected, deltmax, deltax, deltrad, &
 636                                'TO', codtyp_get_codtyp('iasi'))
 637    write(*,*) 'Memory Used: ',get_max_rss()/1024,'Mb'
 638    call thn_hyperByLatLonBoxes(obsdat, removeUnCorrected, deltmax, deltax, deltrad, &
 639                                'TO', codtyp_get_codtyp('cris'))
 640    write(*,*) 'Memory Used: ',get_max_rss()/1024,'Mb'
 641    call thn_hyperByLatLonBoxes(obsdat, removeUnCorrected, deltmax, deltax, deltrad, &
 642                                'TO', codtyp_get_codtyp('crisfsr'))
 643    write(*,*) 'Memory Used: ',get_max_rss()/1024,'Mb'
 644    call utl_tmg_stop(114)
 645
 646  end subroutine thn_thinHyper
 647
 648!_/_/_/_/_/_/_/_/_/_/_/_/_/_/_/_/_/_/_/_/_/_/_/_/_/_/_/_/_/_/_/_/_/_/_/_/_/_/_/
 649!_/
 650!_/ The following methods are intended to be general algorithms that may be
 651!_/ called by any of the observation-type-specific thinning methods.
 652!_/
 653!_/_/_/_/_/_/_/_/_/_/_/_/_/_/_/_/_/_/_/_/_/_/_/_/_/_/_/_/_/_/_/_/_/_/_/_/_/_/_/
 654
 655  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 656  ! thn_surfaceInTime
 657  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 658  subroutine thn_surfaceInTime(obsdat, obsFamily, step, deltmax, &
 659                               useBlackList, considerSHIPstnID)
 660    !
 661    !:Purpose: Original method for thinning surface data in time.
 662    !           Set bit 11 of OBS_FLG on observations that are to be rejected.
 663    !
 664    implicit none
 665
 666    ! Arguments:
 667    type(struct_obs), intent(inout)        :: obsdat
 668    character(len=*), intent(in)           :: obsFamily
 669    real(8),          intent(in)           :: step
 670    integer,          intent(in)           :: deltmax
 671    logical,          intent(in)           :: useBlackList
 672    logical,          intent(in)           :: considerSHIPstnID
 673
 674    ! Drifter removal parameters:
 675    ! Remove incomplete DRIFTER reports (using listEleBadDrifter)?
 676    logical, parameter :: removeBadDrifters = .true.
 677    ! Minimum required number elements (1 is consistent with bextrep in ops)
 678    integer, parameter :: numEleMinBadDrifter = 1
 679    ! List of required elements for codtyp 'drifter' (see ops derivate program)
 680    integer, parameter :: listEleBadDrifter(5) = (/bufr_nepn, bufr_neds, bufr_nefs, bufr_nets, bufr_sst/)
 681
 682    ! Selection parameters:
 683    integer, parameter :: numListCodtyp = 9 ! number of elements in listCodtyp
 684    ! List of codtyps to keep (what about SYNOP mobil? SA+SYNOP?)
 685    character(len=13), parameter :: listCodtypName(numListCodtyp) = &
 686                                    (/'synopnonauto', 'asynopauto', 'shipnonauto', 'ashipauto', &
 687                                      'drifter', 'saswobnonauto', 'saswobauto', 'metar', 'satob'/)
 688    ! Codtyps to which list_ele_select will be applied
 689    integer, parameter :: numListCodtypSelect = 3
 690    character(len=13), parameter :: listCodtypNameSelect(numListCodtypSelect) = &
 691                                    (/'metar', 'saswobnonauto', 'saswobauto'/)
 692    ! Elements to select (flags for all other elements will have bit 11 set)
 693    integer, parameter :: listEleSelect(14) = (/bufr_suWindSpeed, bufr_neps, bufr_nepn, bufr_neds, &
 694                                                bufr_nefs, bufr_neus, bufr_nevs, bufr_nets, &
 695                                                bufr_dewPoint2m, bufr_ness, bufr_vis, &
 696                                                bufr_logVis, bufr_gust, bufr_sst/) 
 697    ! BlackList parameters:
 698    character(len=*), parameter :: blackListFileName = 'blacklist_sf'
 699    character(len=6), parameter :: blacklistMode = 'normal' 
 700    integer, parameter :: numColBlacklist = 5  ! number of columns in blacklist file
 701    integer, parameter :: numEleBlacklist = 11 ! number of elements in listEleBlacklist
 702    integer, parameter :: listEleBlacklist(numEleBlacklist) = (/bufr_neps, bufr_neps, bufr_nepn, &
 703                                                                bufr_nepn, bufr_neds, bufr_nefs, &
 704                                                                bufr_neus, bufr_nevs, bufr_nets, &
 705                                                                bufr_dewPoint2m, bufr_ness/)
 706    integer, parameter :: listColBlackList(numEleBlacklist) = &
 707         (/     1,     2,     1,     2,     5,     5,     5,     5,     3,     4,     4 /)
 708
 709    ! Locals:
 710    integer :: countObsIn, countObsInMpi, countObsOut
 711    integer :: countObsInAllMpi(mmpi_nprocs), countObsInMyOffset
 712    integer :: numElements, codtyp, obsDateStamp, numStep
 713    integer :: listIndex, obsIndex, obsIndex2, headerIndex, bodyIndex, procIndex
 714    integer :: ierr, istat, nulfile, numRowBlacklist
 715    integer :: elemIndex, rowIndex, colIndex, obsFlag, obsVarNo
 716    integer :: rowBlackList(numColBlacklist) ! blacklist work array
 717    integer :: countObsInPerCodtyp(numListCodtyp), countObsOutPerCodtyp(numListCodtyp)
 718    integer :: numEleInPerCodtyp(numListCodtyp), numEleOutPerCodtyp(numListCodtyp)
 719    integer :: numBit8InPerCodtyp(numListCodtyp), numBit8OutPerCodtyp(numListCodtyp)
 720    integer :: numBit11InPerCodtyp(numListCodtyp), numBit11OutPerCodtyp(numListCodtyp)
 721    integer :: numBit8In, numBit8Out, numBit11In, numBit11Out
 722    integer :: numRemovedCodtyp, numRemovedCodTypPriority
 723    integer :: numRemovedTime, numRemovedDelt
 724    integer :: numEleIn, numEleOut, numRepeat1, numRepeat2, numRemovedDrifter
 725    integer, allocatable :: dataBlacklist(:,:) ! blacklist data matrix
 726    integer, allocatable :: obsLon(:), obsLat(:), obsDate(:)
 727    integer, allocatable :: obsLonMpi(:), obsLatMpi(:)
 728    integer, allocatable :: obsTime(:), obsStepIndex(:), obsStepIndexMpi(:)
 729    integer, allocatable :: obsCodtypIndex(:), obsDelT(:)
 730    integer, allocatable :: obsCodtypIndexMpi(:), obsDelTMpi(:)
 731    real(8) :: obsStepIndex_r8, deltaHours
 732    logical, allocatable :: valid(:), validMpi(:)
 733    character(len=9), allocatable :: obsStnid(:), obsStnidMpi(:), stnidBlacklist(:)
 734    integer :: listCodtypSelect(numListCodtypSelect)
 735    integer, external :: newdate
 736
 737    ! Check if any observations to be treated
 738    countObsIn = 0
 739    call obs_set_current_header_list(obsdat, obsFamily)
 740    HEADER0: do
 741      headerIndex = obs_getHeaderIndex(obsdat)      
 742      if (headerIndex < 0) exit HEADER0
 743      codtyp = obs_headElem_i(obsdat, OBS_ITY, headerIndex)
 744      if (codtyp /= codtyp_get_codtyp('satob')) countObsIn = countObsIn + 1
 745    end do HEADER0
 746
 747    call rpn_comm_allReduce(countObsIn, countObsInMpi, 1, 'mpi_integer', 'mpi_sum', 'grid', ierr)
 748    write(*,*)
 749    if (countObsInMpi == 0) then
 750      write(*,*) 'thn_surfaceInTime: no surface observations present'
 751      return
 752    else
 753      write(*,*) 'thn_surfaceInTime: countObs initial = ', countObsIn, countObsInMpi
 754    end if
 755    write(*,*)
 756
 757    ! Compute number of time steps in the window for thinning
 758    numStep = 2 * nint(((tim_windowsize - step) / 2.d0) / step) + 1
 759    write(*,*) 'thn_surfaceInTime: step, numStep = ', real(step), numStep
 760    write(*,*)
 761 
 762    ! Print some values to the listing
 763    write(*,*) 'Codtyps to which selection will be applied:'
 764    do listIndex = 1, numListCodtypSelect
 765      listCodtypSelect(listIndex) = codtyp_get_codtyp(listCodtypNameSelect(listIndex))
 766      write(*,*) listCodtypNameSelect(listIndex),': ', listCodtypSelect(listIndex)
 767    end do
 768    write(*,*) 'Elements to select from above codtyps:'
 769    do listIndex = 1, size(listEleSelect)
 770      write(*,*) listEleSelect(listIndex)
 771    end do
 772    write(*,*) 'Remove incomplete DRIFTER reports: ', removeBadDrifters
 773    write(*,*)
 774
 775    ! Allocate arrays
 776    allocate(valid(countObsIn))
 777    allocate(obsCodtypIndex(countObsIn))
 778    allocate(obsLon(countObsIn))
 779    allocate(obsLat(countObsIn))
 780    allocate(obsDate(countObsIn))
 781    allocate(obsTime(countObsIn))
 782    allocate(obsDelT(countObsIn))
 783    allocate(obsStepIndex(countObsIn))
 784    allocate(obsStnid(countObsIn))
 785
 786    ! Initialize dynamic arrays
 787    valid(:) =    .true.                     ! array which keeps track of which reports to keep
 788    obsCodtypIndex(:) = MPC_missingValue_INT ! codtyp index array (MPC_missingValue_INT means non-existent)
 789    obsLon(:)         = 0                    ! longitude corresponding to each report
 790    obsLat(:)         = 0                    ! latitude corresponding to each report
 791    obsDate(:)        = 0                    ! DATE yyyymmdd corresponding to each report
 792    obsTime(:)        = 0                    ! time hhmm corresponding to each report
 793    obsDelT(:)        = MPC_missingValue_INT ! delta t array (departure from nearest bin time)
 794    obsStepIndex(:)   = 0                    ! temporal bin corresponding to each report
 795    obsStnid(:)       = ''                   ! stnid corresponding to each report
 796
 797    ! Initialize counters and counter arrays
 798    numEleIn                 = 0 ! number of elements in input file
 799    numBit8In                = 0 ! number of input elements flagged (blacklist)
 800    numBit11In               = 0 ! number of input elements flagged (selection)
 801    numEleOut                = 0 ! number of elements in output file
 802    numBit8Out               = 0 ! number of output elements flagged (blacklist)
 803    numBit11Out              = 0 ! number of output elements flagged (selection)
 804    numRemovedCodtyp         = 0 ! number of obs removed due to network
 805    numRemovedTime           = 0 ! number of obs removed (desired time window)
 806    numRemovedCodTypPriority = 0 ! number of obs removed due to codtyp
 807    numRemovedDelt           = 0 ! number of obs removed due to delta t
 808    numRemovedDrifter        = 0 ! number of incomplete drifter reports removed
 809    numRepeat1               = 0 ! number of obs same lon/lat/date/time
 810    numRepeat2               = 0 ! number of obs same lon/lat/date/time/codtyp
 811
 812    countObsInPerCodtyp(:)  = 0 ! number of input reports for each codtyp
 813    numEleInPerCodtyp(:)    = 0 ! number of input elements for each codtyp
 814    numBit8InPerCodtyp(:)   = 0 ! number of input flags bit 8 for each codtyp
 815    numBit11InPerCodtyp(:)  = 0 ! number of input flags bit 11 for each codtyp
 816    countObsOutPerCodtyp(:) = 0 ! number of output reports for each codtyp
 817    numEleOutPerCodtyp(:)   = 0 ! number of output elements for each codtyp
 818    numBit8OutPerCodtyp(:)  = 0 ! number of output flags bit 8 for each codtyp
 819    numBit11OutPerCodtyp(:) = 0 ! number of output flags bit 11 for each codtyp
 820
 821    ! Extract needed information from obsSpaceData
 822    obsIndex = 0
 823    call obs_set_current_header_list(obsdat, obsFamily)
 824    HEADER1: do
 825      headerIndex = obs_getHeaderIndex(obsdat)
 826      if (headerIndex < 0) exit HEADER1
 827      codtyp = obs_headElem_i(obsdat, OBS_ITY, headerIndex)
 828      if (codtyp /= codtyp_get_codtyp('satob')) then
 829        obsIndex = obsIndex + 1
 830      else
 831        cycle HEADER1
 832      end if
 833
 834      ! Get index in codtyp list
 835      do listIndex = 1, numListCodtyp
 836        if (codtyp == codtyp_get_codtyp(listCodtypName(listIndex))) then
 837          obsCodtypIndex(obsIndex) = listIndex
 838        end if
 839      end do
 840
 841      ! Remove observation if not in codtyp list
 842      if (obsCodtypIndex(obsIndex) == MPC_missingValue_INT) then
 843        valid(obsIndex) = .false.
 844        numRemovedCodtyp = numRemovedCodtyp + 1
 845        cycle HEADER1
 846      end if
 847
 848      ! Check if DRIFTER reports contain required element(s), otherwise cycle
 849      if ((codtyp == codtyp_get_codtyp('drifter')) .and. removeBadDrifters) then
 850        numElements = 0
 851        call obs_set_current_body_list(obsdat, headerIndex)
 852        BODY1: do 
 853          bodyIndex = obs_getBodyIndex(obsdat)
 854          if (bodyIndex < 0) exit BODY1
 855          obsVarNo = obs_bodyElem_i(obsdat, obs_vnm, bodyIndex)
 856          if (any(listEleBadDrifter(:) == obsVarNo)) numElements = numElements + 1
 857        enddo BODY1
 858        if (numElements < numEleMinBadDrifter) then
 859          valid(obsIndex) = .false.
 860          numRemovedDrifter = numRemovedDrifter + 1
 861          cycle HEADER1
 862        end if
 863      end if
 864
 865      ! Count the number of elements
 866      numElements = 0
 867      call obs_set_current_body_list(obsdat, headerIndex)
 868      BODY2: do 
 869        bodyIndex = obs_getBodyIndex(obsdat)
 870        if (bodyIndex < 0) exit BODY2
 871
 872        obsVarNo = obs_bodyElem_i(obsdat, obs_vnm, bodyIndex)
 873        if (obsVarNo == -1) cycle BODY2
 874
 875        numElements = numElements + 1
 876
 877        obsFlag = obs_bodyElem_i(obsdat, obs_flg, bodyIndex)
 878
 879        ! Count input flags with bit 8 set
 880        if (btest(obsFlag, 8)) then
 881          numBit8InPerCodtyp(obsCodtypIndex(obsIndex)) = &
 882               numBit8InPerCodtyp(obsCodtypIndex(obsIndex)) + 1
 883          numBit8In = numBit8In + 1
 884        end if
 885
 886        ! Count input flags with bit 11 set
 887        if (btest(obsFlag, 11)) then
 888          numBit11InPerCodtyp(obsCodtypIndex(obsIndex)) = &
 889               numBit11InPerCodtyp(obsCodtypIndex(obsIndex)) + 1
 890          numBit11In = numBit11In + 1
 891        end if
 892
 893      end do BODY2
 894
 895      numEleIn = numEleIn + numElements
 896
 897      ! Counts per codtyp
 898      listIndex = obsCodtypIndex(obsIndex)
 899      countObsInPerCodtyp(listIndex) = countObsInPerCodtyp(listIndex) + 1
 900      numEleInPerCodtyp(listIndex) = numEleInPerCodtyp(listIndex) + numElements
 901
 902      obsStnid(obsIndex) = obs_elem_c(obsdat, 'STID', headerIndex)
 903
 904      obsLon(obsIndex) = nint(100.0 * MPC_DEGREES_PER_RADIAN_R8 * &
 905                              obs_headElem_r(obsdat, obs_lon, headerIndex))
 906      obsLat(obsIndex) = nint(100.0 * MPC_DEGREES_PER_RADIAN_R8 * &
 907                              obs_headElem_r(obsdat, obs_lat, headerIndex)) + 9000
 908
 909      obsDate(obsIndex) = obs_headElem_i(obsdat, obs_dat, headerIndex)
 910      obsTime(obsIndex) = obs_headElem_i(obsdat, obs_etm, headerIndex)
 911
 912      call tim_getStepObsIndex(obsStepIndex_r8, tim_getDatestamp(), &
 913                               obsDate(obsIndex), obsTime(obsIndex), numStep)
 914      obsStepIndex(obsIndex) = nint(obsStepIndex_r8)
 915      if (numStep > 1) then
 916        obsDelT(obsIndex) = nint(60.0 * step * (obsStepIndex_r8 - real(obsStepIndex(obsIndex))))
 917      else
 918        ierr = newdate(obsDateStamp, obsDate(obsIndex), obsTime(obsIndex) * 10000, 3)
 919	! Difference (in hours) between obs time
 920        call difdatr(obsDateStamp, tim_getDateStamp(), deltaHours)
 921        obsDelT(obsIndex) = nint(60.0 * deltaHours)
 922      end if
 923
 924      ! Reject if time difference larger than deltmax
 925      if (abs(obsDelT(obsIndex)) > deltmax) then
 926        valid(obsIndex) = .false.
 927        numRemovedTime = numRemovedTime + 1
 928      endif
 929
 930    end do HEADER1
 931
 932    call utl_allReduce(numRemovedDrifter)
 933    call utl_allReduce(numRemovedTime)
 934    call utl_allReduce(numRemovedCodtyp)
 935
 936    ! Read blacklist file
 937    if (useBlackList) then
 938      write(*,*) 'Opening blacklist file'
 939      numRowBlacklist = 0
 940      nulfile = 0
 941      open (unit = nulfile, file = blackListFileName, status = 'OLD', iostat = ierr)
 942      if (ierr /= 0) then
 943        write(*,*) 'Cannot open blacklist file ', trim(blackListFileName)
 944        call utl_abort('thn_surfaceInTime')
 945      end if
 946      read(nulfile, iostat = istat, fmt = '(i6)') numRowBlacklist
 947      write(*,*) 'thn_surfaceInTime: Number of stations in blacklist: ', numRowBlacklist
 948
 949      allocate(stnidBlacklist(numRowBlacklist))
 950      allocate(dataBlacklist(numRowBlacklist, numEleBlacklist))
 951      stnidBlacklist(:) = '' ! array of stnid values in blacklist file
 952      dataBlacklist(:,:) = 0 ! blacklist matrix for stnids and elements
 953
 954      do rowIndex = 1, numRowBlacklist
 955        read(nulfile, iostat = istat, fmt = '(x,a8,x,5(x,i1))') &
 956             stnidBlacklist(rowIndex), &
 957             (rowBlackList(colIndex), colIndex = 1, numColBlacklist)
 958        do elemIndex = 1, numEleBlacklist
 959          if ((blacklistMode == 'severe') .or. &
 960              (rowBlackList(listColBlackList(elemIndex))==1)) then
 961            dataBlacklist(rowIndex, elemIndex) = 1
 962          end if
 963        end do
 964      end do
 965      write(*,*) 'thn_surfaceInTime: Closing blacklist file'
 966      write(*,*)
 967      close (unit = nulfile)
 968    end if
 969
 970    ! Gather array information over all mpi tasks
 971    allocate(validMpi(countObsInMpi))
 972    allocate(obsCodtypIndexMpi(countObsInMpi))
 973    allocate(obsLonMpi(countObsInMpi))
 974    allocate(obsLatMpi(countObsInMpi))
 975    allocate(obsDelTMpi(countObsInMpi))
 976    allocate(obsStepIndexMpi(countObsInMpi))
 977    allocate(obsStnidMpi(countObsInMpi))
 978
 979    call intArrayToMpi(obsLon, obsLonMpi)
 980    call intArrayToMpi(obsLat, obsLatMpi)
 981    call intArrayToMpi(obsCodtypIndex, obsCodtypIndexMpi)
 982    call intArrayToMpi(obsStepIndex, obsStepIndexMpi)
 983    call intArrayToMpi(obsDelT, obsDelTMpi)
 984    call logicalArrayToMpi(valid, validMpi)
 985    call stringArrayToMpi(obsStnid, obsStnidMpi)
 986    
 987    ! Apply the thinning algorithm
 988    do obsIndex = 1, countObsInMpi
 989      
 990      ! If current report OK so far
 991      if (validMpi(obsIndex)) then
 992        ! Loop over previously-read reports
 993        do obsIndex2 = 1, obsIndex - 1
 994          ! If other report OK so far and both reports in same bin
 995          if ( validMpi(obsIndex2) .and. &
 996               (obsStepIndexMpi(obsIndex) == obsStepIndexMpi(obsIndex2))) then
 997            ! If reports are spatially colocated or have same stnid
 998            if ( ( (obsLonMpi(obsIndex) == obsLonMpi(obsIndex2)) .and. &
 999                   (obsLatMpi(obsIndex) == obsLatMpi(obsIndex2)) ) .or. &
1000                 ( considerSHIPstnID .and. &
1001                   (obsStnidMpi(obsIndex) == obsStnidMpi(obsIndex2)))) then
1002              ! If both reports have same codtyp
1003              if (obsCodtypIndexMpi(obsIndex) == obsCodtypIndexMpi(obsIndex2)) then
1004                ! If current report closer to bin time
1005                if (abs(obsDelTMpi(obsIndex)) < abs(obsDelTMpi(obsIndex2))) then
1006                  ! Reject other report
1007                  validMpi(obsIndex2) = .false.
1008                  numRemovedDelt = numRemovedDelt + 1
1009                else if (abs(obsDelTMpi(obsIndex)) > abs(obsDelTMpi(obsIndex2))) then
1010                  ! other report closer to bin time, so reject current report
1011                  validMpi(obsIndex) = .false.
1012                  numRemovedDelt = numRemovedDelt + 1
1013                else if (obsDelTMpi(obsIndex) >= obsDelTMpi(obsIndex2)) then
1014                  ! both reports equally far from bin time
1015                  ! If other report not more recent then reject it
1016                  validMpi(obsIndex2) = .false.
1017                  if (obsDelTMpi(obsIndex) == obsDelTMpi(obsIndex2)) then
1018                    numRepeat2 = numRepeat2 + 1
1019                  else
1020                    numRemovedDelt = numRemovedDelt + 1
1021                  end if
1022                else
1023                  ! current report less recent, reject it
1024                  validMpi(obsIndex) = .false.
1025                  numRemovedDelt = numRemovedDelt + 1
1026                end if ! delta t
1027              else
1028                ! Reports do not have same codtyp
1029                ! If current report has higher codtyp precedence
1030                if (obsCodtypIndexMpi(obsIndex) < obsCodtypIndexMpi(obsIndex2)) then
1031                  ! Reject other report
1032                  validMpi(obsIndex2) = .false.
1033                else
1034                  ! Other report has higher codtyp precedence, so reject current report
1035                  validMpi(obsIndex) = .false.
1036                end if
1037                numRemovedCodTypPriority = numRemovedCodTypPriority + 1
1038                if (obsDelTMpi(obsIndex) == obsDelTMpi(obsIndex2)) then
1039                  numRepeat1 = numRepeat1 + 1
1040                end if
1041              end if ! codtyp
1042            end if ! lon, lat, ibin
1043          end if ! other report OK
1044        end do ! obsIndex2
1045      end if ! current report OK
1046
1047    end do ! obsIndex
1048
1049    ! Transfer mpi global array 'valid' to local array
1050    call rpn_comm_allGather(countObsIn, 1, 'mpi_integer', countObsInAllMpi, 1, 'mpi_integer', 'GRID', ierr)
1051
1052    countObsInMyOffset = 0
1053    do procIndex = 1, mmpi_myid
1054      countObsInMyOffset = countObsInMyOffset + countObsInAllMpi(procIndex)
1055    end do
1056    do obsIndex = 1, countObsIn
1057      valid(obsIndex) = validMpi(obsIndex + countObsInMyOffset)
1058    end do
1059
1060    ! Do counts of kepts observations
1061    obsIndex = 0
1062    countObsOut = 0
1063    call obs_set_current_header_list(obsdat, obsFamily)
1064    HEADER2: do
1065      headerIndex = obs_getHeaderIndex(obsdat)
1066      if (headerIndex < 0) exit HEADER2
1067      codtyp = obs_headElem_i(obsdat, OBS_ITY, headerIndex)
1068      if (codtyp /= codtyp_get_codtyp('satob')) then
1069        obsIndex = obsIndex + 1
1070      else
1071        cycle HEADER2
1072      end if 
1073
1074      ! If rejected, set bit 11 for all data flags
1075      if (.not. valid(obsIndex)) then
1076        call obs_set_current_body_list(obsdat, headerIndex)
1077        BODY3: do
1078          bodyIndex = obs_getBodyIndex(obsdat)
1079          if (bodyIndex < 0) exit BODY3
1080          obsFlag  = obs_bodyElem_i(obsdat, obs_flg, bodyIndex)
1081          call obs_bodySet_i(obsdat, obs_flg, bodyIndex, ibset(obsFlag,11))
1082        end do BODY3
1083        cycle HEADER2
1084      end if
1085
1086      ! Count the number of elements
1087      numElements = 0
1088      call obs_set_current_body_list(obsdat, headerIndex)
1089      BODY4: do
1090        bodyIndex = obs_getBodyIndex(obsdat)
1091        if (bodyIndex < 0) exit BODY4
1092
1093        obsVarNo = obs_bodyElem_i(obsdat, obs_vnm, bodyIndex)
1094        if (obsVarNo == -1) cycle BODY4
1095
1096        numElements = numElements + 1
1097
1098        ! Set bit 8 according to blacklist, if blacklist present
1099        if (useBlackList) then
1100          ! Traverse rows of blacklist matrix
1101          do rowIndex = 1, numRowBlacklist
1102            ! If stnid found in blacklist, flag elements as appropriate
1103            if (obsStnid(obsIndex) == stnidBlacklist(rowIndex)) then
1104              ! Traverse columns of blacklist matrix
1105              do elemIndex = 1, numEleBlacklist
1106                ! If element is to be blacklisted, set bit 8
1107                if (obsVarNo == listEleBlacklist(elemIndex) .and. &
1108                    dataBlacklist(rowIndex,elemIndex) == 1) then
1109                  obsFlag  = obs_bodyElem_i(obsdat, obs_flg, bodyIndex)
1110                  call obs_bodySet_i(obsdat, obs_flg, bodyIndex, ibset(obsFlag,8))
1111                end if
1112              end do ! elemIndex
1113            end if ! stnid
1114          end do ! rowIndex
1115        end if ! useBlackList
1116
1117        ! Set bit 11 according to requested codtyps and elements
1118        if (any(listCodtypSelect(:) == codtyp)) then
1119          ! If current element not in select list, set bit 11
1120          if (.not. any(listEleSelect(:) == obsVarNo)) then
1121            obsFlag  = obs_bodyElem_i(obsdat, obs_flg, bodyIndex)
1122            write(*,*) 'Setting bit 11 for codtyp, elem = ', codtyp, obsVarNo
1123            call obs_bodySet_i(obsdat, obs_flg, bodyIndex, ibset(obsFlag,11))
1124          end if
1125        end if
1126
1127        obsFlag  = obs_bodyElem_i(obsdat, obs_flg, bodyIndex)
1128
1129        ! Count output flags with bit 8 set
1130        if (btest(obsFlag, 8)) then
1131          numBit8OutPerCodtyp(obsCodtypIndex(obsIndex)) = numBit8OutPerCodtyp(obsCodtypIndex(obsIndex)) + 1
1132          numBit8Out = numBit8Out + 1
1133        end if
1134
1135        ! Count output flags with bit 11 set
1136        if (btest(obsFlag, 11)) then
1137          numBit11OutPerCodtyp(obsCodtypIndex(obsIndex)) = numBit11OutPerCodtyp(obsCodtypIndex(obsIndex)) + 1
1138          numBit11Out = numBit11Out + 1
1139        end if
1140
1141      end do BODY4
1142
1143      numEleOut = numEleOut + numElements
1144      countObsOut = countObsOut + 1
1145
1146      ! Counts per codtyp
1147      listIndex = obsCodtypIndex(obsIndex)
1148      countObsOutPerCodtyp(listIndex) = countObsOutPerCodtyp(listIndex) + 1
1149      numEleOutPerCodtyp(listIndex) = numEleOutPerCodtyp(listIndex) + numElements
1150
1151    end do HEADER2
1152
1153    ! Output statistics to screen
1154
1155    ! numRepeat1 should include the case where codtyps are the same
1156    numRepeat1 = numRepeat1 + numRepeat2
1157
1158    write(*,'(a)') ' Number of reports in input file'
1159    do listIndex = 1, numListCodtyp
1160      call utl_allReduce(countObsInPerCodtyp(listIndex))
1161      write(*,'(i4,3a,i7)') codtyp_get_codtyp(listCodtypName(listIndex)), ' (', &
1162           listCodtypName(listIndex), '): ', countObsInPerCodtyp(listIndex)
1163    end do
1164
1165    write(*,*)
1166    write(*,'(a)') ' Number of elements in input file'
1167    do listIndex = 1, numListCodtyp
1168      call utl_allReduce(numEleInPerCodtyp(listIndex))
1169      call utl_allReduce(numBit8InPerCodtyp(listIndex))
1170      call utl_allReduce(numBit11InPerCodtyp(listIndex))
1171      write(*,'(i4,3a,i7,a,i7,a,i7,a)') codtyp_get_codtyp(listCodtypName(listIndex)), ' (', &
1172           listCodtypName(listIndex), '): ', numEleInPerCodtyp(listIndex), ' (', &
1173           numBit8InPerCodtyp(listIndex), ' bit 8, ', &
1174           numBit11InPerCodtyp(listIndex), ' bit 11)'
1175    end do
1176
1177    write(*,*)
1178    write(*,'(a)') ' Number of reports in output file'
1179    do listIndex = 1, numListCodtyp
1180      call utl_allReduce(countObsOutPerCodtyp(listIndex))
1181      write(*,'(i4,3a,i7)') codtyp_get_codtyp(listCodtypName(listIndex)), ' (', &
1182           listCodtypName(listIndex), '): ', countObsOutPerCodtyp(listIndex)
1183    end do
1184
1185    write(*,*)
1186    write(*,'(a)') ' Number of elements in output file'
1187    do listIndex = 1, numListCodtyp
1188      call utl_allReduce(numEleOutPerCodtyp(listIndex))
1189      call utl_allReduce(numBit8OutPerCodtyp(listIndex))
1190      call utl_allReduce(numBit11OutPerCodtyp(listIndex))
1191      write(*,'(i4,3a,i7,a,i7,a,i7,a)') codtyp_get_codtyp(listCodtypName(listIndex)), ' (', &
1192           listCodtypName(listIndex), '): ', numEleOutPerCodtyp(listIndex), ' (', &
1193           numBit8OutPerCodtyp(listIndex), ' bit 8, ', &
1194           numBit11OutPerCodtyp(listIndex), ' bit 11)'
1195    end do
1196
1197    write(*,*)
1198    call utl_allReduce(countObsIn)
1199    call utl_allReduce(countObsOut)
1200    write(*,'(a,i12)') 'Total number of reports in input file:   ', countObsIn
1201    write(*,'(a,i12)') 'Total number of reports in output file:  ', countObsOut
1202    call utl_allReduce(numEleIn)
1203    call utl_allReduce(numBit8In)
1204    call utl_allReduce(numBit11In)
1205    call utl_allReduce(numEleOut)
1206    call utl_allReduce(numBit8Out)
1207    call utl_allReduce(numBit11Out)
1208    write(*,'(a,i7,a,i7,a,i7,a)') 'Total number of elements in input file:  ', numEleIn, &
1209          ' (', numBit8In, ' bit 8, ', numBit11In, ' bit 11)'
1210    write(*,'(a,i7,a,i7,a,i7,a)') 'Total number of elements in output file: ', numEleOut, &
1211          ' (', numBit8Out, ' bit 8, ', numBit11Out, ' bit 11)'
1212    write(*,*)
1213    write(*,'(a,i7)') 'Number of repeated reports (lon/lat/date/time):        ', numRepeat1
1214    write(*,'(a,f6.2)') 'Above count as a percentage of total reports in:        ', 100.0 * numRepeat1 / countObsIn
1215    write(*,'(a,i7)') 'Number of repeated reports (lon/lat/date/time/codtyp): ', numRepeat2
1216    write(*,'(a,f6.2)') 'Above count as a percentage of total reports in:        ', 100.00 * numRepeat2 / countObsIn
1217    write(*,*)
1218    write(*,'(a,i7)') 'Number of reports removed due to codtyp:               ', numRemovedCodtyp
1219    write(*,'(a,i7)') 'Number of reports removed due to time:                 ', numRemovedTime
1220    write(*,'(a,i7)') 'Number of reports removed using codtyp precedence:     ', numRemovedCodTypPriority
1221    write(*,'(a,i7)') 'Number of reports removed using delta t:               ', numRemovedDelt
1222    write(*,'(a,i7)') 'Number of incomplete drifter reports removed:          ', numRemovedDrifter
1223    write(*,*)
1224 
1225  end subroutine thn_surfaceInTime
1226  
1227  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1228  ! thn_gpsroVertical
1229  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1230  subroutine thn_gpsroVertical(obsdat, heightMin, heightMax, heightSpacing, &
1231                               gpsroVarNo)
1232    !
1233    !:Purpose: Original method for thinning GPSRO data by vertical distance.
1234    !           Set bit 11 of OBS_FLG on observations that are to be rejected.
1235    !
1236    implicit none
1237
1238    ! Arguments:
1239    type(struct_obs), intent(inout) :: obsdat
1240    real(8),          intent(in)    :: heightMin
1241    real(8),          intent(in)    :: heightMax
1242    real(8),          intent(in)    :: heightSpacing
1243    integer,          intent(in)    :: gpsroVarNo
1244
1245    ! Locals:
1246    integer :: countObs, countObsMpi
1247    integer :: countObsReject, countObsRejectMpi, countObsTotal, countObsTotalMpi
1248    integer :: headerIndex, bodyIndex, ierr
1249    integer :: numLev
1250    integer :: levIndex, obsVarNo, obsFlag
1251    real(8) :: nextHeightMin
1252    logical :: rejectObs
1253    integer, allocatable :: bodyIndexList(:)
1254    real(8), allocatable :: obsHeights(:)
1255
1256    write(*,*)
1257    write(*,*) 'thn_gpsroVertical: Starting'
1258    write(*,*)
1259
1260    ! Check if any observations to be treated
1261    countObs = 0
1262    call obs_set_current_header_list(obsdat,'RO')
1263    HEADER0: do
1264      headerIndex = obs_getHeaderIndex(obsdat)
1265      if (headerIndex < 0) exit HEADER0
1266      countObs = countObs + 1
1267    end do HEADER0
1268
1269    call rpn_comm_allReduce(countObs, countObsMpi, 1, 'mpi_integer', &
1270                            'mpi_sum','grid',ierr)
1271    if (countObsMpi == 0) then
1272      write(*,*) 'thn_gpsroVertical: no gpsro observations present'
1273      return
1274    end if
1275
1276    countObsTotal  = 0
1277    countObsReject = 0
1278    call obs_set_current_header_list(obsdat,'RO')
1279    HEADER1: do
1280      headerIndex = obs_getHeaderIndex(obsdat)
1281      if (headerIndex < 0) exit HEADER1
1282
1283      ! count number of levels for this profile
1284      numLev = 0
1285      call obs_set_current_body_list(obsdat, headerIndex)
1286      BODY1: do 
1287        bodyIndex = obs_getBodyIndex(obsdat)
1288        if (bodyIndex < 0) exit BODY1
1289
1290        obsVarNo = obs_bodyElem_i(obsdat, OBS_VNM, bodyIndex)
1291        if (obsVarNo /= gpsroVarNo) cycle BODY1
1292
1293        numLev = numLev + 1
1294        countObsTotal = countObsTotal + 1
1295
1296      end do BODY1
1297
1298      allocate(obsHeights(numLev))
1299      allocate(bodyIndexList(numLev))
1300
1301      ! extract altitudes for this profile
1302      levIndex = 0
1303      call obs_set_current_body_list(obsdat, headerIndex)
1304      BODY2: do 
1305        bodyIndex = obs_getBodyIndex(obsdat)
1306        if (bodyIndex < 0) exit BODY2
1307        
1308        obsVarNo = obs_bodyElem_i(obsdat, OBS_VNM, bodyIndex)
1309        if (obsVarNo /= gpsroVarNo) cycle BODY2
1310
1311        levIndex = levIndex + 1
1312        obsHeights(levIndex) = obs_bodyElem_r(obsdat, OBS_PPP, bodyIndex)
1313        bodyIndexList(levIndex) = bodyIndex
1314
1315      end do BODY2
1316
1317      ! ensure altitudes are in ascending order
1318      call thn_QsortReal8(obsHeights,bodyIndexList)
1319
1320      ! apply vertical thinning
1321      nextHeightMin = heightMin
1322      LEVELS: do levIndex = 1, numLev
1323        
1324        if ( obsHeights(levIndex) >= nextHeightMin .and. &
1325             obsHeights(levIndex) < heightMax ) then
1326          nextHeightMin = obsHeights(levIndex) + heightSpacing
1327          rejectObs = .false.
1328        else
1329          rejectObs = .true.
1330        end if
1331
1332        if (rejectObs) then
1333          bodyIndex = bodyIndexList(levIndex)
1334          obsFlag = obs_bodyElem_i(obsdat, OBS_FLG, bodyIndex)
1335          call obs_bodySet_i(obsdat, OBS_FLG, bodyIndex, ibset(obsFlag,11))
1336          countObsReject = countObsReject + 1
1337        end if
1338        
1339      end do LEVELS
1340
1341      deallocate(obsHeights)
1342      deallocate(bodyIndexList)
1343
1344    end do HEADER1
1345
1346    call rpn_comm_allReduce(countObsTotal, countObsTotalMpi, 1, 'mpi_integer', &
1347                            'mpi_sum','grid',ierr)
1348    call rpn_comm_allReduce(countObsReject, countObsRejectMpi, 1, 'mpi_integer', &
1349                            'mpi_sum','grid',ierr)
1350    write(*,*)' Number of GPS-RO elements, total     --->', countObsTotalMpi
1351    write(*,*)' Number of GPS-RO elements, rejected  --->', countObsRejectMpi
1352    write(*,*)' Number of GPS-RO elements, kept      --->', countObsTotalMpi - &
1353                                                            countObsRejectMpi
1354
1355    write(*,*)
1356    write(*,*) 'thn_gpsroVertical: Finished'
1357    write(*,*)
1358
1359  end subroutine thn_gpsroVertical
1360
1361  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1362  ! thn_radiosonde
1363  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1364  subroutine thn_radiosonde(obsdat, verticalThinningES, ecmwfRejetsES, toleranceFactor)
1365    !
1366    !:Purpose: Original method for thinning radiosonde data vertically.
1367    !           We assume that each vertical level is stored in obsSpaceData
1368    !           with a separate headerIndex. That is, the 4D representation.
1369    !           Set bit 11 of OBS_FLG on observations that are to be rejected.
1370    !
1371    implicit none
1372
1373    ! Arguments:
1374    type(struct_obs), intent(inout) :: obsdat
1375    logical,          intent(in)    :: verticalThinningES
1376    logical,          intent(in)    :: ecmwfRejetsES
1377    real(4),          intent(in)    :: toleranceFactor
1378
1379    ! Locals:
1380    type(struct_hco), pointer :: hco_sfc
1381    type(struct_vco), pointer :: vco_sfc
1382    type(struct_gsv)          :: stateVectorPsfc
1383    integer :: fnom, fclos, ezgdef, ezsint, ezdefset, ezsetopt
1384    integer :: ierr, nulnam, numLevStn, numLevStnMpi, countLevel, numLevStnMax
1385    integer :: numStation, numStationMpi, stationIndex, stationIndexMpi, lastProfileIndex
1386    integer :: profileIndex, headerIndex, bodyIndex, levIndex, stepIndex, varIndex
1387    integer :: levStnIndex, levStnIndexMpi, obsFlag
1388    integer :: ig1obs, ig2obs, ig3obs, ig4obs, obsGridID
1389    real(4) :: obsValue, obsOmp, obsStepIndex
1390    real(4) :: zig1, zig2, zig3, zig4, zpresa, zpresb
1391    real(8) :: obsStepIndex_r8
1392    integer, allocatable :: obsLevOffset(:), obsType(:), obsHeadDate(:), obsHeadTime(:)
1393    integer, allocatable :: obsDate(:), obsTime(:), obsLaunchTime(:), stationFlags(:)
1394    integer, allocatable :: trajFlags(:,:), obsFlags(:,:)
1395    integer, allocatable :: obsLevOffsetMpi(:), obsHeadDateMpi(:)
1396    integer, allocatable :: obsLaunchTimeMpi(:), stationFlagsMpi(:)
1397    integer, allocatable :: trajFlagsMpi(:,:), obsFlagsMpi(:,:)
1398    integer, allocatable :: procIndexes(:), procIndexesMpi(:)
1399    real(4), allocatable :: obsLat(:), obsLon(:), surfPresInterp(:,:)
1400    real(4), allocatable :: obsValues(:,:), oMinusB(:,:), presInterp(:,:)
1401    real(4), allocatable :: obsLatMpi(:), obsLonMpi(:)
1402    real(4), allocatable :: obsValuesMpi(:,:), oMinusBMpi(:,:)
1403    real(4), pointer     :: surfPressure(:,:,:,:)
1404    character(len=4), allocatable :: varNamesPsfc(:)
1405    character(len=9), allocatable :: stnId(:), stnIdMpi(:)
1406    character(len=20) :: trlmFileName
1407    character(len=2)  :: fileNumber
1408    logical :: upperAirObs
1409    integer :: countAcc_dd, countRej_dd, countAccMpi_dd, countRejMpi_dd
1410    integer :: countAcc_ff, countRej_ff, countAccMpi_ff, countRejMpi_ff
1411    integer :: countAcc_tt, countRej_tt, countAccMpi_tt, countRejMpi_tt
1412    integer :: countAcc_es, countRej_es, countAccMpi_es, countRejMpi_es
1413
1414    ! Local parameters:
1415    integer, parameter :: numVars=5, numTraj=2, maxNumLev=300
1416
1417    ! Namelist variables:
1418    real(8) :: rprefinc        ! parameter for defining fixed set of model levels for vertical thinning
1419    real(8) :: rptopinc        ! parameter for defining fixed set of model levels for vertical thinning
1420    real(8) :: rcoefinc        ! parameter for defining fixed set of model levels for vertical thinning
1421    real(4) :: vlev(maxNumLev) ! parameter for defining fixed set of model levels for vertical thinning
1422    integer :: numlev          ! MUST NOT BE INCLUDED IN NAMELIST!
1423    namelist /namgem/rprefinc, rptopinc, rcoefinc, numlev, vlev
1424
1425    ! Check if any observations to be treated and count number of "profiles"
1426    numLevStn = 0
1427    numStation = 0
1428    lastProfileIndex = -1
1429    call obs_set_current_header_list(obsdat,'UA')
1430    HEADER0: do
1431      headerIndex = obs_getHeaderIndex(obsdat)
1432      if (headerIndex < 0) exit HEADER0
1433
1434      ! skip if this headerIndex doesn't contain upper air obs
1435      upperAirObs = .false.
1436      call obs_set_current_body_list(obsdat, headerIndex)
1437      BODY0: do 
1438        bodyIndex = obs_getBodyIndex(obsdat)
1439        if (bodyIndex < 0) exit BODY0
1440
1441        select case (obs_bodyElem_i(obsdat,OBS_VNM,bodyIndex))
1442        case (bufr_neuu, bufr_nevv, bufr_nett, bufr_nees)
1443          upperAirObs = .true.
1444        end select
1445      end do BODY0
1446      profileIndex = obs_headElem_i(obsdat, obs_prfl, headerIndex)
1447      if (.not. upperAirObs) cycle HEADER0
1448
1449      numLevStn = numLevStn + 1
1450
1451      profileIndex = obs_headElem_i(obsdat, obs_prfl, headerIndex)
1452      if (profileIndex /= lastProfileIndex) then
1453        lastProfileIndex = profileIndex
1454        numStation = numStation + 1
1455      end if
1456
1457    end do HEADER0
1458
1459    call rpn_comm_allReduce(numLevStn, numLevStnMpi, 1, 'mpi_integer', &
1460                            'mpi_sum','grid',ierr)
1461    if (numLevStnMpi == 0) then
1462      write(*,*) 'thn_radiosonde: no UA obs observations present'
1463      return
1464    end if
1465
1466    call rpn_comm_allReduce(numStation, numStationMpi, 1, 'mpi_integer', &
1467                            'mpi_sum','grid',ierr)
1468
1469    write(*,*) 'thn_radiosonde: number of obs initial = ', &
1470               numLevStn, numLevStnMpi
1471    write(*,*) 'thn_radiosonde: number of profiles    = ', &
1472               numStation, numStationMpi
1473
1474    ! Allocate some quanitities needed for each profile
1475    allocate(obsLevOffset(numStation+1))
1476    allocate(obsType(numStation))
1477    allocate(obsHeadDate(numStation))
1478    allocate(obsHeadTime(numStation))
1479    allocate(obsDate(numStation))
1480    allocate(obsTime(numStation))
1481    allocate(obsLaunchTime(numStation))
1482    allocate(stationFlags(numStation))
1483    allocate(obsLat(numStation))
1484    allocate(obsLon(numStation))
1485    allocate(stnId(numStation))
1486    allocate(presInterp(numStation,maxNumLev))
1487    allocate(trajFlags(numTraj,numLevStn))
1488    allocate(obsFlags(numVars,numLevStn))
1489    allocate(obsValues(numVars,numLevStn))
1490    allocate(oMinusB(numVars,numLevStn))
1491    obsLevOffset(:) = 0
1492    obsDate(:) = -1
1493    trajFlags(:,:) = -1
1494    obsFlags(:,:) = 0
1495    obsValues(:,:) = -999.0
1496    oMinusB(:,:) = -999.0
1497
1498    ! Fill in the arrays for each profile
1499    levStnIndex = 0
1500    stationIndex = 0
1501    lastProfileIndex = -1
1502    numLevStnMax = -1
1503    call obs_set_current_header_list(obsdat,'UA')
1504    HEADER1: do
1505      headerIndex = obs_getHeaderIndex(obsdat)
1506      if (headerIndex < 0) exit HEADER1
1507
1508      ! skip if this headerIndex doesn't contain upper air obs
1509      upperAirObs = .false.
1510      call obs_set_current_body_list(obsdat, headerIndex)
1511      BODY1: do 
1512        bodyIndex = obs_getBodyIndex(obsdat)
1513        if (bodyIndex < 0) exit BODY1
1514
1515        select case (obs_bodyElem_i(obsdat,OBS_VNM,bodyIndex))
1516        case (bufr_neuu, bufr_nevv, bufr_nett, bufr_nees)
1517          upperAirObs = .true.
1518        end select
1519      end do BODY1
1520      if (.not. upperAirObs) cycle HEADER1
1521
1522      levStnIndex = levStnIndex + 1
1523
1524      profileIndex = obs_headElem_i(obsdat, obs_prfl, headerIndex)
1525      if (profileIndex /= lastProfileIndex) then
1526        lastProfileIndex = profileIndex
1527        stationIndex = stationIndex + 1
1528        countLevel = 0
1529      end if
1530
1531      countLevel = countLevel + 1
1532      obsLevOffset(stationIndex+1) = obsLevOffset(stationIndex) + countLevel
1533
1534      if (countLevel > numLevStnMax) numLevStnMax = countLevel
1535
1536      ! Get some information from the first header in this profile
1537      if (countLevel == 1) then
1538        obsDate(stationIndex)  = obs_headElem_i(obsdat,obs_dat,headerIndex)
1539        obsTime(stationIndex)  = obs_headElem_i(obsdat,obs_etm,headerIndex)
1540        obsLat(stationIndex)   = obs_headElem_r(obsdat,obs_lat,headerIndex) * &
1541                                 MPC_DEGREES_PER_RADIAN_R8
1542        obsLon(stationIndex)   = obs_headElem_r(obsdat,obs_lon,headerIndex) * &
1543                                 MPC_DEGREES_PER_RADIAN_R8
1544        obsLat(stationIndex)   = 0.01*nint(100.0*obsLat(stationIndex))
1545        obsLon(stationIndex)   = 0.01*nint(100.0*obsLon(stationIndex))
1546      end if
1547      obsHeadDate(stationIndex)   = obs_headElem_i(obsdat,obs_hdd,headerIndex)
1548      obsHeadTime(stationIndex)   = obs_headElem_i(obsdat,obs_hdt,headerIndex)
1549      obsLaunchTime(stationIndex) = obs_headElem_i(obsdat,obs_lch,headerIndex)
1550      if (obsLaunchTime(stationIndex) == mpc_missingValue_int) then
1551        obsLaunchTime(stationIndex) = obsHeadTime(stationIndex)
1552      end if
1553      obsType(stationIndex)      = obs_headElem_i(obsdat,obs_rtp,headerIndex)
1554      stationFlags(stationIndex) = obs_headElem_i(obsdat,obs_st1,headerIndex)
1555      stnId(stationIndex)        = obs_elem_c(obsdat,'STID',headerIndex)
1556
1557      trajFlags(1,levStnIndex) = obs_headElem_i(obsdat,obs_tflg,headerIndex)
1558      trajFlags(2,levStnIndex) = obs_headElem_i(obsdat,obs_lflg,headerIndex)
1559
1560      call obs_set_current_body_list(obsdat, headerIndex)
1561      BODY2: do 
1562        bodyIndex = obs_getBodyIndex(obsdat)
1563        if (bodyIndex < 0) exit BODY2
1564
1565        obsFlag  = obs_bodyElem_i(obsdat,obs_flg,bodyIndex)
1566        obsValue = obs_bodyElem_r(obsdat,obs_var,bodyIndex)
1567        obsOmp   = obs_bodyElem_r(obsdat,obs_omp,bodyIndex)
1568        select case (obs_bodyElem_i(obsdat,OBS_VNM,bodyIndex))
1569        case (bufr_nedd)
1570          obsFlags(1,levStnIndex)  = obsFlag
1571          obsValues(1,levStnIndex) = obsValue
1572        case (bufr_neuu)
1573          oMinusB(1,levStnIndex)   = obsOmp
1574        case (bufr_neff)
1575          obsFlags(2,levStnIndex)  = obsFlag
1576          obsValues(2,levStnIndex) = obsValue
1577        case (bufr_nevv)
1578          oMinusB(2,levStnIndex)   = obsOmp
1579        case (bufr_nett)
1580          obsFlags(3,levStnIndex)  = obsFlag
1581          obsValues(3,levStnIndex) = obsValue
1582          oMinusB(3,levStnIndex)   = obsOmp
1583        case (bufr_nees)
1584          obsFlags(4,levStnIndex)  = obsFlag
1585          obsValues(4,levStnIndex) = obsValue
1586          oMinusB(4,levStnIndex)   = obsOmp
1587        end select
1588        obsValues(5,levStnIndex) = 0.01 * obs_bodyElem_r(obsdat,obs_ppp,bodyIndex)
1589      end do BODY2
1590
1591    end do HEADER1
1592
1593    ! Default namelist values
1594    numlev = MPC_missingValue_INT
1595    vlev(:) = MPC_missingValue_R4
1596    rprefinc = 0.0d0
1597    rptopinc = 0.0d0
1598    rcoefinc = 0.0d0
1599    ! Read the namelist defining the vertical levels
1600    if (utl_isNamelistPresent('namgem','./flnml')) then
1601      nulnam = 0
1602      ierr = fnom(nulnam,'./flnml','FTN+SEQ+R/O',0)
1603      if (ierr /= 0) call utl_abort('thn_radiosonde: Error opening file flnml')
1604      read(nulnam,nml=namgem,iostat=ierr)
1605      if (ierr /= 0) call utl_abort('thn_radiosonde: Error reading namgem namelist')
1606      if (numlev /= MPC_missingValue_INT) then
1607        call utl_abort('thn_radiosonde: check NAMGEM namelist section: numlev should be removed')
1608      end if
1609      numlev = 0
1610      do levIndex = 1, maxNumLev
1611        if (vlev(levIndex) == MPC_missingValue_R4) exit
1612        numlev = numlev + 1
1613      end do
1614      if (mmpi_myid == 0) write(*,nml=namgem)
1615      ierr = fclos(nulnam)
1616    else
1617      call utl_abort('thn_radiosonde: Namelist block namgem is missing in the namelist.')
1618    end if
1619
1620    ! Read the trial surface pressure
1621    nullify(vco_sfc)
1622    nullify(hco_sfc)
1623    trlmFileName = './trlm_01'
1624    call vco_setupFromFile(vco_sfc, trlmFileName)
1625    call hco_setupFromFile(hco_sfc, trlmFileName, ' ')
1626    if (vco_sfc%Vcode == 5100) then
1627      allocate(varNamesPsfc(2))
1628      varNamesPsfc = (/'P0','P0LS'/)
1629    else
1630      allocate(varNamesPsfc(1))
1631      varNamesPsfc = (/'P0'/)
1632    end if
1633    call gsv_allocate( stateVectorPsfc, tim_nstepobs, hco_sfc, vco_sfc, &
1634                       datestamp_opt=tim_getDatestamp(), mpi_local_opt=.false., &
1635                       dataKind_opt=4, varNames_opt=varNamesPsfc, &
1636                       hInterpolateDegree_opt='LINEAR' )
1637    deallocate(varNamesPsfc)
1638    do stepIndex = 1, tim_nstepobs
1639      write(fileNumber,'(I2.2)') stepIndex
1640      trlmFileName = './trlm_' // trim(fileNumber)
1641      call gio_readFromFile( stateVectorPsfc, trlmFileName, ' ', ' ',  &
1642                             stepIndex_opt=stepIndex, containsFullField_opt=.true. )
1643    end do
1644    call gsv_getField(stateVectorPsfc,surfPressure)
1645
1646    ! Setup the interpolation to obs locations of surface pressure
1647    zig1 = 0.0
1648    zig2 = 0.0
1649    zig3 = 1.0
1650    zig4 = 1.0
1651    ierr = ezsetopt('INTERP_DEGREE', 'LINEAR')
1652    call cxgaig('L',ig1obs,ig2obs,ig3obs,ig4obs,zig1,zig2,zig3,zig4)
1653    obsGridID = ezgdef(numStation,1,'Y','L',ig1obs,ig2obs,ig3obs,ig4obs,obsLon,obsLat)
1654    ierr = ezdefset(obsGridID,hco_sfc%ezScintId)
1655
1656    ! Do the interpolation of surface pressure to obs locations
1657    allocate(surfPresInterp(numStation,tim_nstepobs))
1658    do stepIndex = 1, tim_nstepobs
1659      ierr = ezsint(surfPresInterp(:,stepIndex),surfPressure(:,:,1,stepIndex))
1660    end do
1661    call gsv_deallocate(stateVectorPsfc)
1662
1663    ! Compute pressure profile at each obs location
1664    do stationIndex = 1, numStation
1665
1666      ! Calculate the stepIndex corresponding to the launch time
1667      call tim_getStepObsIndex(obsStepIndex_r8, tim_getDatestamp(), &
1668                               obsDate(stationIndex), obsTime(stationIndex), tim_nstepobs)
1669      obsStepIndex = nint(obsStepIndex_r8)
1670      if (obsStepIndex < 0) then
1671        obsStepIndex = (tim_nstepobs+1)/2
1672        write(*,*) 'thn_radiosonde: Obs outside the assimilation window, set to middle of window'
1673      end if
1674
1675      ! Calculate pressure levels for each station based on GEM3 vertical coordinate
1676      do levIndex  = 1, numLev
1677        zpresb = ((vlev(levIndex) - rptopinc/rprefinc) /  &
1678                 (1.0-rptopinc/rprefinc))**rcoefinc
1679        zpresa = rprefinc * (vlev(levIndex)-zpresb)
1680        presInterp(stationIndex,levIndex) =  &
1681             0.01 * (zpresa + zpresb*surfPresInterp(stationIndex,obsStepIndex))
1682      end do
1683
1684    end do
1685
1686    ! communicate several arrays to all MPI tasks for raobs_check_duplicated_stations
1687    allocate(obsLevOffsetMpi(numStationMpi+1))
1688    allocate(obsHeadDateMpi(numStationMpi))
1689    allocate(obsLaunchTimeMpi(numStationMpi))
1690    allocate(stationFlagsMpi(numStationMpi))
1691    allocate(obsLatMpi(numStationMpi))
1692    allocate(obsLonMpi(numStationMpi))
1693    allocate(trajFlagsMpi(numTraj,numLevStnMpi))
1694    allocate(obsFlagsMpi(numVars,numLevStnMpi))
1695    allocate(obsValuesMpi(numVars,numLevStnMpi))
1696    allocate(oMinusBMpi(numVars,numLevStnMpi))
1697    allocate(stnIdMpi(numStationMpi))
1698
1699    call intArrayToMpi(obsLevOffset, obsLevOffsetMpi, is_obsLevOffset_opt=.true.)
1700    call intArrayToMpi(obsHeadDate, obsHeadDateMpi)
1701    call intArrayToMpi(obsLaunchTime, obsLaunchTimeMpi)
1702    call intArrayToMpi(stationFlags, stationFlagsMpi)
1703    call realArrayToMpi(obsLat, obsLatMpi)
1704    call realArrayToMpi(obsLon, obsLonMpi)
1705    do varIndex = 1, numTraj
1706      call intArrayToMpi(trajFlags(varIndex,:), trajFlagsMpi(varIndex,:))
1707    end do
1708    do varIndex = 1, numVars
1709      call intArrayToMpi(obsFlags(varIndex,:), obsFlagsMpi(varIndex,:))
1710      call realArrayToMpi(obsValues(varIndex,:), obsValuesMpi(varIndex,:))
1711      call realArrayToMpi(oMinusB(varIndex,:), oMinusBMpi(varIndex,:))
1712    end do
1713    call stringArrayToMpi(stnId,stnIdMpi)
1714
1715    ! set stnIdMpi to 'NOT_VALID' for rejected duplicate stations
1716    call raobs_check_duplicated_stations( stnIdMpi, obsLevOffsetMpi, obsLatMpi, obsLonMpi, &
1717                                          obsHeadDateMpi, trajFlagsMpi, &
1718                                          obsFlagsMpi, obsValuesMpi, oMinusBMpi, &
1719                                          obsLaunchTimeMpi, stationFlagsMpi, &
1720                                          numVars, numStationMpi, toleranceFactor )
1721
1722    ! modify obs flags based on stnIdMpi
1723    do stationIndexMpi = 1, numStationMpi
1724      if (stnIdMpi(stationIndexMpi) == 'NOT_VALID') then
1725        do levStnIndex = obsLevOffsetMpi(stationIndexMpi)+1, &
1726                         obsLevOffsetMpi(stationIndexMpi+1)
1727          do varIndex = 1, numVars
1728            obsFlagsMpi(varIndex,levStnIndex) =  &
1729                 ibset(obsFlagsMpi(varIndex,levStnIndex),11)
1730          end do
1731        end do
1732      end if
1733    end do
1734
1735    ! copy global mpi flags to local copy
1736    allocate(procIndexes(numStation))
1737    allocate(procIndexesMpi(numStationMpi))
1738    procIndexes(:) = mmpi_myid
1739    call intArrayToMpi(procIndexes, procIndexesMpi)
1740    levStnIndex = 0
1741    do stationIndexMpi = 1, numStationMpi
1742      if (procIndexesMpi(stationIndexMpi) == mmpi_myid) then
1743        do levStnIndexMpi = obsLevOffsetMpi(stationIndexMpi)+1, &
1744                            obsLevOffsetMpi(stationIndexMpi+1)
1745          levStnIndex = levStnIndex + 1
1746          obsFlags(:,levStnIndex) = obsFlagsMpi(:,levStnIndexMpi)
1747        end do
1748      end if
1749    end do
1750    deallocate(procIndexes)
1751    deallocate(procIndexesMpi)
1752
1753    call raobs_thinning_model( obsFlags, obsValues, presInterp, numVars, numlev, &
1754                               numStation, numLevStnMax, obsLevOffset )
1755
1756    if ( verticalThinningES ) then
1757      call raobs_thinning_es( obsFlags, obsValues, numStation, numLevStnMax, obsLevOffset )
1758    end if
1759
1760    if ( ecmwfRejetsES ) then
1761      call raobs_blacklisting_ecmwf( obsFlags, obsValues, obsType, numStation, obsLevOffset )
1762    end if
1763
1764    countAcc_dd=0;  countRej_dd=0
1765    countAcc_ff=0;  countRej_ff=0
1766    countAcc_tt=0;  countRej_tt=0
1767    countAcc_es=0;  countRej_es=0
1768    do stationIndex = 1, numStation
1769      do levStnIndex = obsLevOffset(stationIndex)+1, obsLevOffset(stationIndex+1)
1770        if (btest(obsFlags(1,levStnIndex),11)) then
1771          countRej_dd = countRej_dd + 1
1772        else
1773          countAcc_dd = countAcc_dd + 1
1774        end if
1775        if (btest(obsFlags(2,levStnIndex),11)) then
1776          countRej_ff = countRej_ff + 1
1777        else
1778          countAcc_ff = countAcc_ff + 1
1779        end if
1780        if (btest(obsFlags(3,levStnIndex),11)) then
1781          countRej_tt = countRej_tt + 1
1782        else
1783          countAcc_tt = countAcc_tt + 1
1784        end if
1785        if (btest(obsFlags(4,levStnIndex),11) .or. btest(obsFlags(4,levStnIndex),8)) then
1786          countRej_es = countRej_es + 1
1787        else
1788          countAcc_es = countAcc_es + 1
1789        end if
1790      end do
1791    end do
1792
1793    call rpn_comm_allReduce(countRej_dd, countRejMpi_dd, 1, 'mpi_integer', &
1794                            'mpi_sum','grid',ierr)
1795    call rpn_comm_allReduce(countRej_ff, countRejMpi_ff, 1, 'mpi_integer', &
1796                            'mpi_sum','grid',ierr)
1797    call rpn_comm_allReduce(countRej_tt, countRejMpi_tt, 1, 'mpi_integer', &
1798                            'mpi_sum','grid',ierr)
1799    call rpn_comm_allReduce(countRej_es, countRejMpi_es, 1, 'mpi_integer', &
1800                            'mpi_sum','grid',ierr)
1801    call rpn_comm_allReduce(countAcc_dd, countAccMpi_dd, 1, 'mpi_integer', &
1802                            'mpi_sum','grid',ierr)
1803    call rpn_comm_allReduce(countAcc_ff, countAccMpi_ff, 1, 'mpi_integer', &
1804                            'mpi_sum','grid',ierr)
1805    call rpn_comm_allReduce(countAcc_tt, countAccMpi_tt, 1, 'mpi_integer', &
