1806                            'mpi_sum','grid',ierr)
1807    call rpn_comm_allReduce(countAcc_es, countAccMpi_es, 1, 'mpi_integer', &
1808                            'mpi_sum','grid',ierr)
1809
1810    write(*,*)
1811    write(*,*) 'DD Rej/Acc = ',countRejMpi_dd, countAccMpi_dd
1812    write(*,*) 'FF Rej/Acc = ',countRejMpi_ff, countAccMpi_ff
1813    write(*,*) 'TT Rej/Acc = ',countRejMpi_tt, countAccMpi_tt
1814    write(*,*) 'ES Rej/Acc = ',countRejMpi_es, countAccMpi_es
1815    write(*,*)
1816
1817    ! Replace obs flags in obsSpaceData with obsFlags
1818    levStnIndex = 0
1819    call obs_set_current_header_list(obsdat,'UA')
1820    HEADER2: do
1821      headerIndex = obs_getHeaderIndex(obsdat)
1822      if (headerIndex < 0) exit HEADER2
1823
1824      ! skip if this headerIndex doesn't contain upper air obs
1825      upperAirObs = .false.
1826      call obs_set_current_body_list(obsdat, headerIndex)
1827      BODY3: do 
1828        bodyIndex = obs_getBodyIndex(obsdat)
1829        if (bodyIndex < 0) exit BODY3
1830
1831        select case (obs_bodyElem_i(obsdat,OBS_VNM,bodyIndex))
1832        case (bufr_neuu, bufr_nevv, bufr_nett, bufr_nees)
1833          upperAirObs = .true.
1834        end select
1835      end do BODY3
1836      if (.not. upperAirObs) cycle HEADER2
1837
1838      levStnIndex = levStnIndex + 1
1839
1840      call obs_set_current_body_list(obsdat, headerIndex)
1841      BODY4: do 
1842        bodyIndex = obs_getBodyIndex(obsdat)
1843        if (bodyIndex < 0) exit BODY4
1844
1845        select case (obs_bodyElem_i(obsdat,OBS_VNM,bodyIndex))
1846        case (bufr_neuu)
1847          call obs_bodySet_i(obsdat, OBS_FLG, bodyIndex, obsFlags(1,levStnIndex))
1848        case (bufr_nevv)
1849          call obs_bodySet_i(obsdat, OBS_FLG, bodyIndex, obsFlags(2,levStnIndex))
1850        case (bufr_nett)
1851          call obs_bodySet_i(obsdat, OBS_FLG, bodyIndex, obsFlags(3,levStnIndex))
1852        case (bufr_nees)
1853          call obs_bodySet_i(obsdat, OBS_FLG, bodyIndex, obsFlags(4,levStnIndex))
1854        end select
1855      end do BODY4
1856
1857    end do HEADER2
1858
1859    ! Deallocate arrays
1860    deallocate(surfPresInterp)
1861    deallocate(obsLevOffset)
1862    deallocate(obsType)
1863    deallocate(obsHeadDate)
1864    deallocate(obsHeadTime)
1865    deallocate(obsDate)
1866    deallocate(obsTime)
1867    deallocate(obsLaunchTime)
1868    deallocate(stationFlags)
1869    deallocate(obsLat)
1870    deallocate(obsLon)
1871    deallocate(stnId)
1872    deallocate(presInterp)
1873    deallocate(trajFlags)
1874    deallocate(obsFlags)
1875    deallocate(obsValues)
1876    deallocate(oMinusB)
1877    deallocate(obsLevOffsetMpi)
1878    deallocate(obsHeadDateMpi)
1879    deallocate(obsLaunchTimeMpi)
1880    deallocate(stationFlagsMpi)
1881    deallocate(obsLatMpi)
1882    deallocate(obsLonMpi)
1883    deallocate(trajFlagsMpi)
1884    deallocate(obsFlagsMpi)
1885    deallocate(obsValuesMpi)
1886    deallocate(oMinusBMpi)
1887    deallocate(stnIdMpi)
1888
1889  end subroutine thn_radiosonde
1890
1891  !---------------------------------------------------------------------
1892  ! Following are several subroutines needed by thn_radiosonde
1893  !---------------------------------------------------------------------
1894
1895  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1896  ! stringArrayToMpi
1897  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1898  subroutine stringArrayToMpi(array, arrayMpi)
1899    !:Purpose: Do the equivalent of mpi_allgatherv for a string array
1900    
1901    implicit none
1902
1903    ! Arguments:
1904    character(len=*) :: array(:)
1905    character(len=*) :: arrayMpi(:)
1906
1907    ! Locals:
1908    integer :: ierr, arrayIndex, charIndex, lenString
1909    integer :: nsize, nsizeMpi, allnsize(mmpi_nprocs)
1910    integer, allocatable :: stringInt(:), stringIntMpi(:)
1911
1912    nsize = size(array)
1913    call rpn_comm_allgather( nsize,    1, 'mpi_integer',  &
1914                             allnsize, 1, 'mpi_integer', &
1915                             'GRID', ierr )
1916    nsizeMpi = sum(allnsize(:))
1917
1918    allocate(stringInt(nsize))
1919    allocate(stringIntMpi(nsizeMpi))
1920
1921    lenString = len(array(1))
1922    do charIndex = 1, lenString
1923      do arrayIndex = 1, nsize
1924        stringInt(arrayIndex) = iachar(array(arrayIndex)(charIndex:charIndex))
1925      end do
1926
1927      call intArrayToMpi(stringInt, stringIntMpi)
1928
1929      do arrayIndex = 1, nsizeMpi
1930        arrayMpi(arrayIndex)(charIndex:charIndex) = achar(stringIntMpi(arrayIndex))
1931      end do
1932    end do
1933
1934    deallocate(stringInt)
1935    deallocate(stringIntMpi)
1936    
1937  end subroutine stringArrayToMpi
1938
1939  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1940  ! intArrayToMpi
1941  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1942  subroutine intArrayToMpi(array, arrayMpi, is_obsLevOffset_opt)
1943    !:Purpose: Do the equivalent of mpi_allgatherv for an integer array,
1944    !           but with special treatment if array of obsLevOffset.
1945
1946    implicit none
1947
1948    ! Arguments:
1949    integer :: array(:)
1950    integer :: arrayMpi(:)
1951    logical, optional :: is_obsLevOffset_opt
1952
1953    ! Locals:
1954    integer :: ierr, procIndex, arrayIndex
1955    integer :: nsize, nsizeMpi, allnsize(mmpi_nprocs), displs(mmpi_nprocs)
1956    logical :: is_obsLevOffset
1957    integer, allocatable :: numLevels(:), numLevelsMpi(:)
1958
1959    if (present(is_obsLevOffset_opt)) then
1960      is_obsLevOffset = is_obsLevOffset_opt
1961    else
1962      is_obsLevOffset = .false.
1963    end if
1964
1965    if (is_obsLevOffset) then
1966
1967      ! special treatment is requirement for the variable "obsLevOffset"
1968
1969      nsize = size(array) - 1
1970      call rpn_comm_allgather( nsize,    1, 'mpi_integer',  &
1971                               allnsize, 1, 'mpi_integer', &
1972                               'GRID', ierr )
1973      nsizeMpi = sum(allnsize(:))
1974
1975      if ( mmpi_myid == 0 ) then
1976        displs(1) = 0
1977        do procIndex = 2, mmpi_nprocs
1978          displs(procIndex) = displs(procIndex-1) + allnsize(procIndex-1)
1979        end do
1980      else
1981        displs(:) = 0
1982      end if
1983
1984      allocate(numLevels(nsize))
1985      allocate(numLevelsMpi(nsizeMpi))
1986      do arrayIndex = 1, nsize
1987        numLevels(arrayIndex) = array(arrayIndex+1) - array(arrayIndex)
1988      end do
1989      call rpn_comm_gatherv( numLevels   , nsize, 'mpi_integer', &
1990                             numLevelsMpi, allnsize, displs, 'mpi_integer',  &
1991                             0, 'GRID', ierr )
1992
1993      call rpn_comm_bcast(numLevelsMpi, nsizeMpi, 'mpi_integer',  &
1994                          0, 'GRID', ierr)
1995      arrayMpi(1) = 0
1996      do arrayIndex = 1, nsizeMpi
1997        arrayMpi(arrayIndex+1) = arrayMpi(arrayIndex) + numLevelsMpi(arrayIndex)
1998      end do
1999      deallocate(numLevels)
2000      deallocate(numLevelsMpi)
2001
2002    else
2003
2004      nsize = size(array)
2005      call rpn_comm_allgather( nsize,    1, 'mpi_integer',  &
2006                               allnsize, 1, 'mpi_integer', &
2007                               'GRID', ierr )
2008      nsizeMpi = sum(allnsize(:))
2009
2010      if ( mmpi_myid == 0 ) then
2011        displs(1) = 0
2012        do procIndex = 2, mmpi_nprocs
2013          displs(procIndex) = displs(procIndex-1) + allnsize(procIndex-1)
2014        end do
2015      else
2016        displs(:) = 0
2017      end if
2018
2019      call rpn_comm_gatherv( array   , nsize, 'mpi_integer', &
2020                             arrayMpi, allnsize, displs, 'mpi_integer',  &
2021                             0, 'GRID', ierr )
2022
2023      call rpn_comm_bcast(arrayMpi, nsizeMpi, 'mpi_integer',  &
2024                          0, 'GRID', ierr)      
2025    end if
2026
2027  end subroutine intArrayToMpi
2028
2029  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
2030  ! realArrayToMpi
2031  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
2032  subroutine realArrayToMpi(array, arrayMpi)
2033    !:Purpose: Do the equivalent of mpi_allgatherv for a real array,
2034
2035    implicit none
2036
2037    ! Arguments:
2038    real(4) :: array(:)
2039    real(4) :: arrayMpi(:)
2040
2041    ! Locals:
2042    integer :: ierr, procIndex
2043    integer :: nsize, nsizeMpi, allnsize(mmpi_nprocs), displs(mmpi_nprocs)
2044
2045    nsize = size(array)
2046    call rpn_comm_allgather( nsize,    1, 'mpi_integer',  &
2047                             allnsize, 1, 'mpi_integer', &
2048                             'GRID', ierr )
2049    nsizeMpi = sum(allnsize(:))
2050
2051    if ( mmpi_myid == 0 ) then
2052      displs(1) = 0
2053      do procIndex = 2, mmpi_nprocs
2054        displs(procIndex) = displs(procIndex-1) + allnsize(procIndex-1)
2055      end do
2056    else
2057      displs(:) = 0
2058    end if
2059    
2060    call rpn_comm_gatherv( array   , nsize, 'mpi_real4', &
2061                           arrayMpi, allnsize, displs, 'mpi_real4',  &
2062                           0, 'GRID', ierr )
2063
2064    call rpn_comm_bcast(arrayMpi, nsizeMpi, 'mpi_real4',  &
2065                        0, 'GRID', ierr)
2066    
2067  end subroutine realArrayToMpi
2068
2069  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
2070  ! logicalArrayToMpi
2071  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
2072  subroutine logicalArrayToMpi(array, arrayMpi)
2073    !:Purpose: Do the equivalent of mpi_allgatherv for a logical array,
2074
2075    implicit none
2076
2077    ! Arguments:
2078    logical :: array(:)
2079    logical :: arrayMpi(:)
2080
2081    ! Locals:
2082    integer :: ierr, procIndex
2083    integer :: nsize, nsizeMpi, allnsize(mmpi_nprocs), displs(mmpi_nprocs)
2084
2085    nsize = size(array)
2086    call rpn_comm_allgather( nsize,    1, 'mpi_integer',  &
2087                             allnsize, 1, 'mpi_integer', &
2088                             'GRID', ierr )
2089    nsizeMpi = sum(allnsize(:))
2090
2091    if ( mmpi_myid == 0 ) then
2092      displs(1) = 0
2093      do procIndex = 2, mmpi_nprocs
2094        displs(procIndex) = displs(procIndex-1) + allnsize(procIndex-1)
2095      end do
2096    else
2097      displs(:) = 0
2098    end if
2099    
2100    call rpn_comm_gatherv( array   , nsize, 'mpi_logical', &
2101                           arrayMpi, allnsize, displs, 'mpi_logical',  &
2102                           0, 'GRID', ierr )
2103
2104    call rpn_comm_bcast(arrayMpi, nsizeMpi, 'mpi_logical',  &
2105                        0, 'GRID', ierr)
2106    
2107  end subroutine logicalArrayToMpi
2108
2109  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
2110  ! raobs_check_duplicated_stations
2111  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
2112  subroutine raobs_check_duplicated_stations ( stnId, obsLevOffset, obsLat, obsLon,  &
2113                                               obsHeadDate, trajFlags, obsFlags, obsValues, &
2114                                               oMinusB, obsLaunchTime, stationFlags, &
2115                                               numVars, numStation, toleranceFactor )
2116    !:Purpose: Check duplicated stations and select the best TAC/BUFR profiles
2117
2118    implicit none
2119
2120    ! Arguments:
2121    integer,           intent(in)    :: numVars, numStation
2122    integer,           intent(in)    :: obsHeadDate(:), obsLaunchTime(:), stationFlags(:)
2123    real(4),           intent(in)    :: obsLat(:), obsLon(:)
2124    real(4),           intent(in)    :: obsValues(:,:), oMinusB(:,:), toleranceFactor
2125    integer,           intent(in)    :: trajFlags(:,:)
2126    integer,           intent(in)    :: obsFlags(:,:)
2127    integer,           intent(in)    :: obsLevOffset(:)
2128    character (len=9), intent(inout) :: stnId(:)
2129
2130    ! Local parameters:
2131    integer, parameter :: maxNumStnid  = 5000
2132
2133    ! Locals:
2134    logical :: condition, sameProfile, stnidNotFound
2135    integer :: stationIndex, stationIndex2, stationIndex3, catIndex
2136    integer :: greaterNumVal, numDuplicate, numDuplicateTotal, selectStationIndex 
2137    integer :: bufrStationIndex, tacStationIndex, numChecked, numStnid, numSame
2138    character (len=9)  :: stnidList(maxNumStnid)
2139    integer            :: stationIndexList(maxNumStnid)
2140    integer :: numCriteria(5), cloche(30), selectCriteria
2141
2142    numCriteria(:) = 0
2143    cloche(:) = 0
2144
2145    ! Check for duplication of TAC or BUFR profiles
2146
2147    numDuplicateTotal = 0
2148    do stationIndex = 1, numStation
2149
2150      if ( stnId(stationIndex) /= 'NOT_VALID' ) then
2151
2152        greaterNumVal = obsLevOffset(stationIndex+1) - obsLevOffset(stationIndex) + 1
2153        selectStationIndex = stationIndex
2154        numDuplicate = 0
2155
2156        ! Verify if there exists two records with the same stnid, date, time, flgs.
2157        ! Keep the one with the greatest number of vertical levels
2158        do stationIndex2 = stationIndex+1, numStation
2159
2160          if ( stnId(stationIndex2) /= 'NOT_VALID' ) then
2161            condition = stnId(stationIndex2) == stnId(stationIndex) .and. &
2162                        obsHeadDate(stationIndex2) == obsHeadDate(stationIndex) .and. &
2163                        obsLaunchTime(stationIndex2) == obsLaunchTime(stationIndex) .and. &
2164                        obsLat(stationIndex2) == obsLat(stationIndex) .and. &
2165                        obsLon(stationIndex2) == obsLon(stationIndex) .and. &
2166                        stationFlags(stationIndex2) == stationFlags(stationIndex)
2167
2168            if ( condition ) then
2169              numDuplicate = numDuplicate + 1
2170              if ( (obsLevOffset(stationIndex2+1) - obsLevOffset(stationIndex2) + 1) > &
2171                  greaterNumVal ) then
2172                greaterNumVal = obsLevOffset(stationIndex2+1) - &
2173                                obsLevOffset(stationIndex2) + 1
2174                selectStationIndex  = stationIndex2
2175              end if
2176            end if
2177          end if
2178
2179        end do ! stationIndex2
2180
2181        ! Invalid all duplicated station except one with greatest number of levels
2182        if (numDuplicate > 0) then
2183          do stationIndex2 = stationIndex, numStation
2184            if ( stnId(stationIndex2) /= 'NOT_VALID' .and. &
2185                stnId(stationIndex2) == stnId(stationIndex) .and. &
2186                selectStationIndex /= stationIndex2 ) then
2187              write(*,'(2A20,I10,2F9.2,I10)') 'Station duplique ', stnId(stationIndex2), &
2188                   obsLevOffset(stationIndex2+1)-obsLevOffset(stationIndex2), &
2189                   obsLat(stationIndex2), obsLon(stationIndex2), &
2190                   obsLaunchTime(stationIndex2)
2191              stnId(stationIndex2) = 'NOT_VALID'
2192            end if
2193          end do
2194          numDuplicateTotal = numDuplicateTotal + numDuplicate
2195        end if
2196
2197      end if
2198
2199    end do ! stationIndex
2200
2201    ! Select best profile for collocated TAC or BUFR reports
2202    if (mmpi_myid == 0) then
2203      open(unit=11, file='./selected_stations_tac_bufr.txt', status='UNKNOWN')
2204    end if
2205
2206    numChecked = 0
2207    do stationIndex = 1, numStation
2208
2209      if ( stnId(stationIndex) /= 'NOT_VALID' ) then
2210
2211        do stationIndex2 = stationIndex+1, numStation
2212
2213          if ( stnId(stationIndex2) /= 'NOT_VALID' ) then
2214            condition = (stnId(stationIndex2) == stnId(stationIndex)) .and. &
2215                        ( btest(stationFlags(stationIndex),23) .neqv. &
2216                          btest(stationFlags(stationIndex2),23) )
2217
2218            if ( condition ) then
2219
2220              if (obsLaunchTime(stationIndex2) == obsLaunchTime(stationIndex)) then
2221                sameProfile = .true.
2222              else
2223                call raobs_check_if_same_profile(stationIndex,stationIndex2, &
2224                                                 obsValues,obsLevOffset,sameProfile)
2225              end if
2226
2227              if ( sameProfile ) then
2228
2229                numChecked  = numChecked + 1
2230
2231                call raobs_compare_profiles(stationIndex, stationIndex2, &
2232                                            stationFlags, trajFlags, obsFlags, obsValues, &
2233                                            oMinusB, obsLevOffset, &
2234                                            numVars, cloche, selectCriteria, &
2235                                            selectStationIndex, toleranceFactor)
2236
2237                numCriteria(selectCriteria) = numCriteria(selectCriteria) + 1
2238
2239                bufrStationIndex = stationIndex2
2240                if (      btest(stationFlags(stationIndex),23) ) bufrStationIndex = stationIndex
2241                tacStationIndex  = stationIndex2
2242                if ( .not.btest(stationFlags(stationIndex),23) ) tacStationIndex = stationIndex
2243
2244                if (mmpi_myid == 0) write(11,'(A9,2F10.3,3I10)') stnId(stationIndex), &
2245                     obsLat(stationIndex), obsLon(stationIndex), &
2246                     obsLevOffset(bufrStationIndex+1)-obsLevOffset(bufrStationIndex)+1, &
2247                     obsLevOffset(tacStationIndex+1)-obsLevOffset(tacStationIndex)+1, selectCriteria
2248
2249                if ( selectStationIndex == stationIndex) stnId(stationIndex2) = 'NOT_VALID'
2250                if ( selectStationIndex == stationIndex2) stnId(stationIndex) = 'NOT_VALID'
2251
2252              end if ! sameProfile
2253
2254            end if ! condition 
2255
2256          end if ! stnId(stationIndex2) /= 'NOT_VALID'
2257
2258        end do ! stationIndex2
2259
2260      end if ! stnId(stationIndex) /= 'NOT_VALID' 
2261
2262    end do ! stationIndex
2263
2264    write(*,*)
2265    write(*,*)
2266    write(*,'(a30,I10)') 'nb of total duplicates '  ,numDuplicateTotal
2267    write(*,'(a30,I10)') 'nb TAC vs BUFR checked'   ,numChecked
2268    write(*,'(a30,I10)') 'nb not selected'          ,numCriteria(1)
2269    write(*,'(a30,I10)') 'nb suspicious traj BUFR'  ,numCriteria(2)
2270    write(*,'(a30,I10)') 'nb Energy higher   BUFR'  ,numCriteria(3)
2271    write(*,'(a30,I10)') 'nb variables lower BUFR'  ,numCriteria(4)
2272    write(*,'(a30,I10)') 'nb TAC  selected'         ,numCriteria(2) + &
2273                                    numCriteria(3) + numCriteria(4)
2274    write(*,'(a30,I10)') 'nb BUFR selected'         ,numCriteria(5)
2275    write(*,*)
2276    write(*,*)
2277
2278    do catIndex = 1, 29
2279      write(*,'(a15,f4.2,a3,f4.2,I5)') 'nb e ratio ',(catIndex/10.)-.05,' - ', &
2280                                       (catIndex/10.)+.05,cloche(catIndex)
2281    end do
2282    write(*,*)
2283    write(*,'(a30,I5)') 'nb of energyTot(2)) very small  ',cloche(30)
2284    write(*,*)
2285
2286    if (mmpi_myid == 0) close(unit=11)
2287
2288    ! Check whether there is still duplications
2289    numStnid = 0
2290    do stationIndex = 1, numStation
2291
2292      if ( stnId(stationIndex) /= 'NOT_VALID' ) then
2293
2294        if (numStnid < maxNumStnid ) then
2295          stnidNotFound=.true.
2296          if ( numStnid == 0) then
2297            numStnid = numStnid + 1
2298            stnidList(numStnid) = stnId(stationIndex)
2299            stationIndexList(numStnid) = stationIndex
2300          else
2301            numSame = 0
2302            do stationIndex2 = 1, numStnid
2303              if ( stnidList(stationIndex2) == stnId(stationIndex) ) then
2304                stnidNotFound=.false.
2305                numSame = numSame + 1
2306                stationIndex3 = stationIndexList(stationIndex2)
2307              end if
2308            end do
2309            if ( stnidNotFound ) then
2310              numStnid = numStnid + 1
2311              stnidList(numStnid) = stnId(stationIndex)
2312              stationIndexList(numStnid) = stationIndex
2313            else
2314              write(*,*) 'Multi profiles found : ',stnId(stationIndex), &
2315                   stnId(stationIndex3),numSame,stationIndex,stationIndex3, &
2316                   btest(stationFlags(stationIndex),23),btest(stationFlags(stationIndex3),23)
2317              write(*,'(a30,2i10,2f10.2,i10)') 'date, lch, lat lon ', &
2318                   obsHeadDate(stationIndex),obsLaunchTime(stationIndex), &
2319                   obsLat(stationIndex), obsLon(stationIndex), &
2320                   obsLevOffset(stationIndex+1)-obsLevOffset(stationIndex)+1
2321              write(*,'(a30,2i10,2f10.2,i10)') 'date, lch, lat lon ', &
2322                   obsHeadDate(stationIndex3),obsLaunchTime(stationIndex3), &
2323                   obsLat(stationIndex3), obsLon(stationIndex3), &
2324                   obsLevOffset(stationIndex3+1)-obsLevOffset(stationIndex3)+1
2325              write(*,*)
2326
2327            end if
2328          end if
2329        else
2330          write(*,*) 'numStnid >= ',maxNumStnid
2331          call utl_abort('raobs_check_duplicated_stations')
2332        end if
2333
2334      end if
2335
2336    end do
2337
2338  end subroutine raobs_check_duplicated_stations
2339
2340  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
2341  ! raobs_check_if_same_profile
2342  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
2343  subroutine raobs_check_if_same_profile( stationIndex, stationIndex2, &
2344                                          obsValues, obsLevOffset, sameProfile )
2345    !:Purpose: Check if two raobs profiles are the same.
2346
2347    implicit none
2348
2349    ! Arguments:
2350    integer, intent(in)    :: stationIndex, stationIndex2
2351    real(4), intent(in)    :: obsValues(:,:)
2352    integer, intent(in)    :: obsLevOffset(:)
2353    logical, intent(out)   :: sameProfile
2354
2355    ! Locals:
2356    integer :: varIndex, levIndex, levStnIndex, levStnIndex1, levStnIndex2, numSum
2357    real(4) :: valSum, minDeltaP1, minDeltaP2
2358
2359    ! Local parameters:
2360    ! Standard levels
2361    integer, parameter :: numStdLevels = 16
2362    real(4) :: standardLevels(numStdLevels)
2363    standardLevels = (/ 1000.,925.,850.,700.,500.,400.,300.,250.,200.,150., &
2364                        100.,70.,50.,30.,20.,10./) 
2365
2366    valSum = 0.0
2367    numSum   = 0
2368
2369    sameProfile = .false.
2370
2371    do levIndex = 1, numStdLevels
2372
2373      minDeltaP1 = 1000.
2374      do levStnIndex = obsLevOffset(stationIndex)+1, obsLevOffset(stationIndex+1)
2375        if ( abs(standardLevels(levIndex) - obsValues(5,levStnIndex)) < minDeltaP1 ) then
2376          levStnIndex1 = levStnIndex
2377          minDeltaP1 = abs(standardLevels(levIndex) - obsValues(5,levStnIndex))
2378        end if
2379      end do
2380      minDeltaP2 = 1000.
2381      do levStnIndex = obsLevOffset(stationIndex2)+1, obsLevOffset(stationIndex2+1)
2382        if ( abs(standardLevels(levIndex) - obsValues(5,levStnIndex)) < minDeltaP2 ) then
2383          levStnIndex2 = levStnIndex
2384          minDeltaP2 = abs(standardLevels(levIndex) - obsValues(5,levStnIndex))
2385        end if
2386      end do
2387
2388      if ( minDeltaP1 < 1.0 .and. minDeltaP2 < 1.0 ) then
2389        do varIndex = 2, 4, 2
2390
2391          if ( obsValues(varIndex,levStnIndex1) /= -999.0 .and. &
2392               obsValues(varIndex,levStnIndex2) /= -999.0 ) then
2393            valSum = valSum + abs(obsValues(varIndex,levStnIndex1) - &
2394                                  obsValues(varIndex,levStnIndex2))
2395            numSum = numSum + 1
2396          end if
2397
2398        end do
2399
2400      end if
2401
2402    end do !levIndex
2403
2404    if (numSum > 0) then
2405      if (valSum/numSum < 0.5) sameProfile = .true.
2406    end if
2407
2408  end subroutine raobs_check_if_same_profile
2409
2410  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
2411  ! raobs_compare_profiles
2412  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
2413  subroutine raobs_compare_profiles( stationIndex, stationIndex2, stationFlags, trajFlags, &
2414                                     obsFlags, obsValues, oMinusB, obsLevOffset, numVars, &
2415                                     cloche, selectCriteria, selectStationIndex, toleranceFactor )
2416    !:Purpose: Perform a comparison between two raobs profiles.
2417
2418    implicit none
2419
2420    ! Arguments:
2421    integer,           intent(in)    :: stationIndex, stationIndex2, numVars
2422    integer,           intent(in)    :: trajFlags(:,:)
2423    integer,           intent(in)    :: obsFlags(:,:)
2424    real(4),           intent(in)    :: obsValues(:,:), oMinusB(:,:), toleranceFactor
2425    integer,           intent(in)    :: obsLevOffset(:), stationFlags(:)
2426    integer,           intent(inout) :: cloche(:)
2427    integer,           intent(out)   :: selectCriteria, selectStationIndex
2428
2429    ! Locals:
2430    logical :: condition, tacAndBufr, trajInfoOk
2431    integer :: raobFormatIndex, varIndex, levStnIndex, levStnIndex2, catIndex
2432    integer :: bufrStationIndex, tacStationIndex, countTimeFlag, countLatFlag, countTraj
2433    integer :: countValues(2), thisStationIndex
2434    real(4) :: presBottom, ombBottom, deltaPres, sumDeltaPres, oMinusBavg
2435    real(4) :: sumEnergy, presLower, presUpper
2436    real(4) :: percentTrajBad
2437    real(4) :: sumEnergyVar(numVars,2), energyTot(2)
2438    real(4) :: presLowerTacBufr(numVars,2), presUpperTacBufr(numVars,2)
2439
2440    percentTrajBad = 10.0
2441    catIndex = 1
2442    selectCriteria = 1
2443
2444    tacAndBufr       = .true.
2445    trajInfoOk = .true.
2446
2447    if ( btest(stationFlags(stationIndex),23) .and. &
2448         btest(stationFlags(stationIndex2),23) ) tacAndBufr = .false.
2449    if ( .not.btest(stationFlags(stationIndex),23) .and. &
2450         .not.btest(stationFlags(stationIndex2),23) ) tacAndBufr = .false.
2451
2452    if ( tacAndBufr ) then
2453
2454      bufrStationIndex = stationIndex2
2455      if (      btest(stationFlags(stationIndex),23) ) bufrStationIndex = stationIndex
2456      tacStationIndex  = stationIndex2
2457      if ( .not.btest(stationFlags(stationIndex),23) ) tacStationIndex  = stationIndex
2458      selectStationIndex = tacStationIndex
2459
2460      ! 1. Evalue si la trajectoire native est correct
2461
2462      if ( btest(stationFlags(bufrStationIndex),14) ) then
2463
2464        countTimeFlag = 0
2465        countLatFlag = 0
2466        countTraj = obsLevOffset(bufrStationIndex+1) - obsLevOffset(bufrStationIndex) + 1
2467
2468        do levStnIndex = obsLevOffset(bufrStationIndex)+1, obsLevOffset(bufrStationIndex+1)
2469          if ( btest(trajFlags(1,levStnIndex),4) ) countTimeFlag = countTimeFlag + 1
2470          if ( btest(trajFlags(2,levStnIndex),4) ) countLatFlag  = countLatFlag + 1
2471        end do
2472
2473        if (100.*countTimeFlag/countTraj > percentTrajBad .or.  &
2474            100.*countLatFlag/countTraj  > percentTrajBad) then
2475          trajInfoOk = .false.
2476          selectStationIndex = tacStationIndex
2477          selectCriteria = 2
2478        end if
2479
2480      end if
2481
2482      if (trajInfoOk) then
2483
2484        ! Cherche les pressions (bas et haut) des extremites des profils (TAC et BUFR)
2485
2486        do raobFormatIndex = 1, 2
2487
2488          if (raobFormatIndex == 1) thisStationIndex = bufrStationIndex
2489          if (raobFormatIndex == 2) thisStationIndex = tacStationIndex
2490
2491          do varIndex = 1, 3
2492
2493            presLowerTacBufr(varIndex,raobFormatIndex) = 1000.0
2494            do levStnIndex = obsLevOffset(thisStationIndex)+1, &
2495                             obsLevOffset(thisStationIndex+1)
2496              condition = oMinusB(varIndex,levStnIndex) /= -999.0 .and. &
2497                   .not.btest(obsFlags(varIndex,levStnIndex),18) .and. &
2498                   .not.btest(obsFlags(varIndex,levStnIndex),16) .and. &
2499                   .not.btest(obsFlags(varIndex,levStnIndex),9)  .and. &
2500                   .not.btest(obsFlags(varIndex,levStnIndex),8)  .and. &
2501                   .not.btest(obsFlags(varIndex,levStnIndex),2)  .and. &
2502                   .not.btest(obsFlags(varIndex,levStnIndex),11)
2503              if ( condition ) then
2504                presLowerTacBufr(varIndex,raobFormatIndex) = obsValues(5,levStnIndex)
2505                exit
2506              end if
2507 
2508            end do
2509            presUpperTacBufr(varIndex,raobFormatIndex) = &
2510                 presLowerTacBufr(varIndex,raobFormatIndex)
2511 
2512            if (levStnIndex < obsLevOffset(thisStationIndex+1) ) then
2513
2514              do levStnIndex2 = levStnIndex+1, obsLevOffset(thisStationIndex+1)
2515
2516                condition = oMinusB(varIndex,levStnIndex2) /= -999.0 .and. &
2517                     .not.btest(obsFlags(varIndex,levStnIndex2),18) .and. &
2518                     .not.btest(obsFlags(varIndex,levStnIndex2),16) .and. &
2519                     .not.btest(obsFlags(varIndex,levStnIndex2),9)  .and. &
2520                     .not.btest(obsFlags(varIndex,levStnIndex2),8)  .and. &
2521                     .not.btest(obsFlags(varIndex,levStnIndex2),2)  .and. &
2522                     .not.btest(obsFlags(varIndex,levStnIndex2),11)
2523                if ( condition ) then
2524                  presUpperTacBufr(varIndex,raobFormatIndex) = obsValues(5,levStnIndex2)
2525                end if
2526
2527              end do
2528
2529            end if
2530
2531          end do !varIndex
2532
2533        end do !raobFormatIndex
2534
2535        ! Calcul de la norme energie equivalente (NE)
2536
2537        do raobFormatIndex = 1, 2
2538
2539          if (raobFormatIndex == 1) thisStationIndex = bufrStationIndex
2540          if (raobFormatIndex == 2) thisStationIndex = tacStationIndex
2541
2542          countValues(raobFormatIndex) = 0
2543
2544          do varIndex = 1, 3
2545
2546            presLower =  presLowerTacBufr(varIndex,1)
2547            if ( presLower > presLowerTacBufr(varIndex,2) ) then
2548              presLower = presLowerTacBufr(varIndex,2)
2549            end if
2550            presUpper =  presUpperTacBufr(varIndex,1)
2551            if ( presUpper < presUpperTacBufr(varIndex,2) ) then
2552              presUpper = presUpperTacBufr(varIndex,2)
2553            end if
2554
2555            sumDeltaPres = 0.0
2556            sumEnergy = 0.0
2557            sumEnergyVar(varIndex,raobFormatIndex) = 0.0
2558
2559            do levStnIndex = obsLevOffset(thisStationIndex)+1, &
2560                             obsLevOffset(thisStationIndex+1)
2561
2562              condition = oMinusB(varIndex,levStnIndex) /= -999.0 .and. &
2563                   .not.btest(obsFlags(varIndex,levStnIndex),18) .and. &
2564                   .not.btest(obsFlags(varIndex,levStnIndex),16) .and. &
2565                   .not.btest(obsFlags(varIndex,levStnIndex),9)  .and. &
2566                   .not.btest(obsFlags(varIndex,levStnIndex),8)  .and. &
2567                   .not.btest(obsFlags(varIndex,levStnIndex),2)  .and. &
2568                   .not.btest(obsFlags(varIndex,levStnIndex),11)
2569
2570              if ( condition ) then
2571                countValues(raobFormatIndex) = countValues(raobFormatIndex) + 1
2572                if ( obsValues(5,levStnIndex) <= presLower ) then
2573                  presBottom = obsValues(   5,levStnIndex)
2574                  ombBottom = oMinusB(varIndex,levStnIndex)
2575                  exit
2576                end if
2577              end if
2578
2579            end do
2580
2581            if (levStnIndex < obsLevOffset(thisStationIndex+1) ) then
2582
2583              do levStnIndex2 = levStnIndex+1, obsLevOffset(thisStationIndex+1)
2584
2585                condition = oMinusB(varIndex,levStnIndex2) /= -999.0 .and. &
2586                     .not.btest(obsFlags(varIndex,levStnIndex2),18) .and. &
2587                     .not.btest(obsFlags(varIndex,levStnIndex2),16) .and. &
2588                     .not.btest(obsFlags(varIndex,levStnIndex2),9)  .and. &
2589                     .not.btest(obsFlags(varIndex,levStnIndex2),8)  .and. &
2590                     .not.btest(obsFlags(varIndex,levStnIndex2),2)  .and. &
2591                     .not.btest(obsFlags(varIndex,levStnIndex2),11)
2592                if ( condition ) then
2593                  countValues(raobFormatIndex) = countValues(raobFormatIndex) + 1
2594                  if ( obsValues(5,levStnIndex2) >= presUpper ) then
2595                    deltaPres = log(presBottom) - log(obsValues(5,levStnIndex2))
2596                    oMinusBavg = ( ombBottom + oMinusB(varIndex,levStnIndex2) ) / 2 
2597                    sumEnergy = sumEnergy + deltaPres * oMinusBavg**2
2598                    sumDeltaPres = sumDeltaPres + deltaPres
2599                    presBottom = obsValues(   5,levStnIndex2)
2600                    ombBottom = oMinusB(varIndex,levStnIndex2)
2601                  end if
2602                end if
2603
2604              end do
2605
2606            end if
2607            if (sumDeltaPres > 0.) then
2608              sumEnergyVar(varIndex,raobFormatIndex) = sumEnergy/sumDeltaPres
2609            end if
2610
2611          end do ! varIndex
2612
2613          energyTot(raobFormatIndex) = sumEnergyVar(1,raobFormatIndex) + &
2614                                       sumEnergyVar(2,raobFormatIndex) + &
2615                                       (1005./300.)*sumEnergyVar(3,raobFormatIndex)
2616
2617        end do ! raobFormatIndex
2618
2619        ! 2. Choisi le profil TAC (raobFormatIndex==2) si le nombre de niveaux ou
2620        !    il y a des donnees est plus grand ou egal au nombre dans le profil
2621        !    BUFR (raobFormatIndex==1)
2622
2623        if ( countValues(2) >= countValues(1) ) then
2624
2625          selectStationIndex = tacStationIndex
2626          selectCriteria = 4
2627
2628        else
2629
2630          ! 3. Choisi le profil BUFR si la norme energie equivalente du profil
2631          !    ne depasse pas 'toleranceFactor'
2632
2633          if (abs(energyTot(2)) > 1.e-6) catIndex = nint(10.*energyTot(1)/energyTot(2)) + 1
2634          if (catIndex > 30) catIndex = 30 
2635
2636          cloche(catIndex) = cloche(catIndex) + 1
2637
2638          if ( energyTot(1) <= toleranceFactor*energyTot(2) ) then
2639
2640            selectStationIndex = bufrStationIndex
2641            selectCriteria = 5
2642
2643          else
2644
2645            selectStationIndex = tacStationIndex
2646            selectCriteria = 3
2647
2648          end if
2649
2650        end if
2651
2652      end if ! trajInfoOk
2653
2654    else
2655
2656      write(*,*) 'MEME TYPE DE FICHIER' 
2657
2658    end if !tacAndBufr
2659
2660  end subroutine raobs_compare_profiles
2661
2662  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
2663  ! raobs_thinning_model
2664  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
2665  subroutine raobs_thinning_model( obsFlags, obsValues, presInterp, numVars, numLev, &
2666                                   numStation, numLevStnMax, obsLevOffset )
2667    !:Purpose: Perform raobs thinning by comparing with a set of model levels.
2668
2669    implicit none
2670
2671    ! Arguments:
2672    integer,           intent(in)    :: numVars, numLev, numStation, numLevStnMax
2673    integer,           intent(in)    :: obsLevOffset(:)
2674    integer,           intent(inout) :: obsFlags(:,:)
2675    real(4),           intent(in)    :: obsValues(:,:)
2676    real(4),           intent(in)    :: presInterp(:,:)
2677
2678    ! Locals:
2679    logical :: condition, debug
2680    integer :: stationIndex, levIndex, levStnIndex, stdLevelIndex, varIndex
2681    integer :: varIndexDD, varIndexFF, varIndexPres
2682    integer :: levSelectIndex, levSelectIndex2, numLevSelect, levStnIndexValid
2683    integer :: numLevSelectBest, tempInt
2684    real(4) :: presTop, presBottom, deltaPres, deltaPresMin
2685    integer, allocatable :: levStnIndexList(:), numValidObs(:), listIndex(:)
2686
2687    ! Local parameters:
2688    ! Standard levels including 925 hPa
2689    integer, parameter :: numStdLevels = 16
2690    real(4) :: standardLevels(numStdLevels)
2691    standardLevels(1:numStdLevels) = (/ 1000.,925.,850.,700.,500.,400.,300.,250.,200.,150., &
2692                                        100.,70.,50.,30.,20.,10./) 
2693
2694    varIndexDD = 1
2695    varIndexFF = 2
2696    varIndexPres = 5
2697    debug = .false.
2698
2699    allocate(levStnIndexList(numLevStnMax))
2700    allocate(numValidObs(numLevStnMax))
2701    allocate(listIndex(numLevStnMax))
2702
2703    do stationIndex = 1, numStation
2704
2705      ! If one obsFlags is set to 0 but not the other then make the obsFlagss consistent
2706      ! and obsFlags wind direction and module if one of these wind variables is missing
2707
2708      do levStnIndex = obsLevOffset(stationIndex)+1, obsLevOffset(stationIndex+1)
2709
2710        if ( obsFlags(varIndexDD,levStnIndex) == 0  .and. &
2711             obsFlags(varIndexFF,levStnIndex) /= 0 ) then
2712          obsFlags(varIndexDD,levStnIndex) = obsFlags(varIndexFF,levStnIndex)
2713        end if
2714        if ( obsFlags(varIndexDD,levStnIndex) /= 0  .and. &
2715             obsFlags(varIndexFF,levStnIndex) == 0 ) then
2716          obsFlags(varIndexFF,levStnIndex) = obsFlags(varIndexDD,levStnIndex)
2717        end if
2718
2719        if ( (obsValues(varIndexDD,levStnIndex)  < 0. .and. &
2720              obsValues(varIndexFF,levStnIndex) >= 0.) .or. &
2721             (obsValues(varIndexDD,levStnIndex) >= 0. .and. &
2722              obsValues(varIndexFF,levStnIndex)  < 0.) ) then
2723          obsFlags(varIndexDD,levStnIndex) = ibset(obsFlags(varIndexDD,levStnIndex),11)
2724          obsFlags(varIndexFF,levStnIndex) = ibset(obsFlags(varIndexFF,levStnIndex),11)
2725        end if
2726
2727      end do
2728
2729      do levIndex = 1, numLev
2730
2731        ! Pressures at the bottom and top of the model layer
2732
2733        if (levIndex == 1) then
2734          presTop = presInterp(stationIndex,levIndex)
2735          presBottom = exp( 0.5*alog(presInterp(stationIndex,levIndex+1) * &
2736                       presInterp(stationIndex,levIndex)) )
2737        else if (levIndex == numLev) then
2738          presTop = exp( 0.5*alog(presInterp(stationIndex,levIndex-1) * &
2739                       presInterp(stationIndex,levIndex)) )
2740          presBottom = presInterp(stationIndex,levIndex)
2741        else
2742          presTop = exp( 0.5*alog(presInterp(stationIndex,levIndex-1) * &
2743                       presInterp(stationIndex,levIndex)) )
2744          presBottom = exp( 0.5*alog(presInterp(stationIndex,levIndex+1) * &
2745                       presInterp(stationIndex,levIndex)) )
2746        end if
2747
2748        ! Select the observation levels between presTop and presBottom
2749
2750        numLevSelect = 0
2751        do levStnIndex = obsLevOffset(stationIndex)+1, obsLevOffset(stationIndex+1)
2752
2753          if (obsValues(varIndexPres,levStnIndex) > presTop  .and. &
2754              obsValues(varIndexPres,levStnIndex) <= presBottom) then
2755
2756            numLevSelect = numLevSelect + 1
2757            levStnIndexList(numLevSelect) = levStnIndex
2758            numValidObs(numLevSelect) = 0
2759
2760            ! numValidObs(numLevSelect) contains number of valid obs at each level selected
2761
2762            do varIndex = 1, numVars
2763              condition = obsValues(varIndex,levStnIndex) >= 0. .and. &
2764                   .not.btest(obsFlags(varIndex,levStnIndex),18) .and. &
2765                   .not.btest(obsFlags(varIndex,levStnIndex),16) .and. &
2766                   .not.btest(obsFlags(varIndex,levStnIndex),9)  .and. &
2767                   .not.btest(obsFlags(varIndex,levStnIndex),8)  .and. &
2768                   .not.btest(obsFlags(varIndex,levStnIndex),2)  .and. &
2769                   .not.btest(obsFlags(varIndex,levStnIndex),11)
2770              if ( condition ) numValidObs(numLevSelect) = numValidObs(numLevSelect) + 1
2771            end do
2772
2773          end if
2774
2775        end do ! levStnIndex
2776
2777        if ( numLevSelect > 0 ) then
2778
2779          ! Sort the observation levels by greatest numbers of valid observations
2780
2781          do levSelectIndex = 1, numLevSelect
2782            listIndex(levSelectIndex) = levSelectIndex
2783          end do
2784          do levSelectIndex = 1, numLevSelect
2785            do levSelectIndex2 = levSelectIndex, numLevSelect
2786              if ( numValidObs(levSelectIndex2) > numValidObs(levSelectIndex) ) then
2787                tempInt     = numValidObs(levSelectIndex)
2788                numValidObs(levSelectIndex) = numValidObs(levSelectIndex2)
2789                numValidObs(levSelectIndex2) = tempInt
2790                tempInt     = listIndex(levSelectIndex)
2791                listIndex(levSelectIndex) = listIndex(levSelectIndex2)
2792                listIndex(levSelectIndex2) = tempInt 
2793              end if
2794            end do
2795          end do
2796          numLevSelectBest = 1
2797          if ( numLevSelect > 1 ) then
2798            do levSelectIndex = 2, numLevSelect
2799              if (numValidObs(levSelectIndex) == numValidObs(1)) then
2800                numLevSelectBest = numLevSelectBest + 1
2801              end if
2802            end do
2803          end if
2804
2805          do varIndex = 1, numVars
2806
2807            levStnIndexValid = 0
2808
2809            ! Rule #1 : get valid the observation at the standard level if one
2810            !           is found in the layer
2811
2812            do levSelectIndex = 1, numLevSelect
2813
2814              levStnIndex = levStnIndexList(levSelectIndex)
2815
2816              condition = obsValues(varIndex,levStnIndex) >= 0. .and. &
2817                   .not.btest(obsFlags(varIndex,levStnIndex),18) .and. &
2818                   .not.btest(obsFlags(varIndex,levStnIndex),16) .and. &
2819                   .not.btest(obsFlags(varIndex,levStnIndex),9)  .and. &
2820                   .not.btest(obsFlags(varIndex,levStnIndex),8)  .and. &
2821                   .not.btest(obsFlags(varIndex,levStnIndex),2)  .and. &
2822                   .not.btest(obsFlags(varIndex,levStnIndex),11)
2823
2824              do stdLevelIndex = 1, numStdLevels
2825                if ( (obsValues(varIndexPres,levStnIndex) == &
2826                      standardLevels(stdLevelIndex)) .and. &
2827                     condition ) then
2828                  levStnIndexValid = levStnIndex
2829                end if
2830              end do
2831
2832            end do ! levSelectIndex
2833
2834            if ( levStnIndexValid == 0 ) then
2835
2836              ! Rule #2 : get the closest valid observation to the model level
2837              !           and most complete
2838
2839              deltaPresMin = presBottom - presTop
2840              do levSelectIndex = 1, numLevSelectBest
2841
2842                levStnIndex = levStnIndexList(listIndex(levSelectIndex))
2843
2844                deltaPres = abs(obsValues(varIndexPres,levStnIndex) - &
2845                                presInterp(stationIndex,levIndex))
2846                condition = obsValues(varIndex,levStnIndex) >= 0. .and. &
2847                     .not.btest(obsFlags(varIndex,levStnIndex),18) .and. &
2848                     .not.btest(obsFlags(varIndex,levStnIndex),16) .and. &
2849                     .not.btest(obsFlags(varIndex,levStnIndex),9)  .and. &
2850                     .not.btest(obsFlags(varIndex,levStnIndex),8)  .and. &
2851                     .not.btest(obsFlags(varIndex,levStnIndex),2)  .and. &
2852                     .not.btest(obsFlags(varIndex,levStnIndex),11)
2853
2854                if ( deltaPres < deltaPresMin .and. condition) then
2855                  deltaPresMin = deltaPres
2856                  levStnIndexValid = levStnIndex
2857                end if
2858
2859              end do ! levSelectIndex
2860
2861            end if  ! levStnIndexValid == 0
2862
2863            if ( levStnIndexValid == 0 ) then
2864
2865              ! Rule #3 : get the closest valid observation if not previously selected
2866
2867              deltaPresMin = presBottom - presTop
2868              do levSelectIndex = 1, numLevSelect
2869
2870                levStnIndex = levStnIndexList(levSelectIndex)
2871
2872                deltaPres = abs(obsValues(varIndexPres,levStnIndex) - &
2873                                presInterp(stationIndex,levIndex))
2874                condition = obsValues(varIndex,levStnIndex) >= 0. .and. &
2875                     .not.btest(obsFlags(varIndex,levStnIndex),18) .and. &
2876                     .not.btest(obsFlags(varIndex,levStnIndex),16) .and. &
2877                     .not.btest(obsFlags(varIndex,levStnIndex),9)  .and. &
2878                     .not.btest(obsFlags(varIndex,levStnIndex),8)  .and. &
2879                     .not.btest(obsFlags(varIndex,levStnIndex),2)  .and. &
2880                     .not.btest(obsFlags(varIndex,levStnIndex),11)
2881
2882                if ( deltaPres < deltaPresMin .and. condition) then
2883                  deltaPresMin = deltaPres
2884                  levStnIndexValid = levStnIndex
2885                end if
2886
2887              end do ! levSelectIndex
2888
2889            end if  ! levStnIndexValid == 0
2890
2891            ! Apply thinning obsFlags to all obs except the one on level levStnIndexValid
2892
2893            do levSelectIndex = 1, numLevSelect
2894
2895              levStnIndex = levStnIndexList(levSelectIndex)
2896
2897              if ( levStnIndex /= levStnIndexValid .and. &
2898                   obsValues(varIndex,levStnIndex) >= 0. ) then
2899                obsFlags(varIndex,levStnIndex) = ibset(obsFlags(varIndex,levStnIndex),11)
2900              end if
2901
2902            end do
2903
2904          end do !varIndex
2905
2906        end if !numLevSelect > 0
2907
2908      end do !levIndex
2909
2910      ! Following lines for debugging purposes
2911
2912      if ( debug ) then
2913
2914        levIndex = numLev
2915        presBottom = presInterp(stationIndex,levIndex)
2916        write (*,*) ' '
2917        write (*,'(a40,I8,a40)') '      ==================== Station no. ', &
2918             stationIndex,' =============================='
2919        write (*,*) ' '
2920        write (*,'(a80,f10.2,i10)') 'lowest model layer-------------> ',presBottom,levIndex
2921        do while(obsValues(varIndexPres,obsLevOffset(stationIndex)+1) < presBottom)
2922          levIndex = levIndex - 1
2923          presBottom = exp(0.5 * alog(presInterp(stationIndex,levIndex+1) * &
2924                           presInterp(stationIndex,levIndex)))
2925        end do
2926        if (levIndex == numLev) levIndex = numLev - 1
2927
2928        do levStnIndex = obsLevOffset(stationIndex)+1, obsLevOffset(stationIndex+1)
2929
2930          presBottom = exp( 0.5*alog(presInterp(stationIndex,levIndex+1) * &
2931                       presInterp(stationIndex,levIndex)) )
2932          do while(obsValues(varIndexPres,levStnIndex) < presBottom)
2933            write (*,'(a80,f10.2,i10)') 'model layer---------------> ',presBottom,levIndex
2934            levIndex = levIndex - 1
2935            presBottom = exp( 0.5*alog(presInterp(stationIndex,levIndex+1) * &
2936                         presInterp(stationIndex,levIndex)) )
2937          end do
2938          write (*,'(5f8.2,4i8)') obsValues(varIndexPres,levStnIndex), &
2939               obsValues(1,levStnIndex), obsValues(2,levStnIndex), &
2940               obsValues(3,levStnIndex), obsValues(4,levStnIndex), &
2941               obsFlags(1,levStnIndex), obsFlags(2,levStnIndex), &
2942               obsFlags(3,levStnIndex), obsFlags(4,levStnIndex)
2943
2944        end do
2945
2946      end if
2947
2948    end do !stationIndex
2949
2950    deallocate(levStnIndexList, numValidObs, listIndex)
2951
2952  end subroutine raobs_thinning_model
2953
2954  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
2955  ! raobs_thinning_es
2956  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
2957  subroutine raobs_thinning_es( obsFlags, obsValues, numStation, &
2958                                numLevStnMax, obsLevOffset )
2959    !:Purpose: Perform thinning of T-Td raobs observations.
2960
2961    implicit none
2962
2963    ! Arguments:
2964    integer,           intent(in)    :: numStation, numLevStnMax
2965    integer,           intent(in)    :: obsLevOffset(:)
2966    integer,           intent(inout) :: obsFlags(:,:)
2967    real(4),           intent(in)    :: obsValues(:,:)
2968
2969    ! Local parameters:
2970    integer, parameter  :: numLevES = 42
2971
2972    ! Locals:
2973    logical :: condition
2974    integer :: stationIndex, levIndex, levStnIndex, levSelectIndex, varIndexES, varIndexPres
2975    integer :: numLevSelect, levStnIndexValid
2976    real(4) :: levelsES(numLevES), deltaPres, deltaPresMin, presBottom, presTop
2977    integer, allocatable :: levStnIndexList(:)
2978
2979    ! Selected pressure levels for additional thinning to humitidy observations
2980
2981    levelsES(1:numLevES) = (/ 1025.,1000.,975.,950.,925.,900.,875.,850.,825., &
2982                              800.,775.,750.,725.,700.,675.,650.,625.,600.,575., &
2983                              550.,525.,500.,475.,450.,425.,400.,375.,350.,325., &
2984                              300.,275.,250.,225.,200.,175.,150.,100., 70., 50., &
2985                              30., 20., 10./)
2986
2987    varIndexES = 4
2988    varIndexPres = 5
2989
2990    allocate(levStnIndexList(numLevStnMax))
2991
2992    do stationIndex = 1, numStation
2993
2994      ! Retain nearest observations to selected pressure levels in levelsES
2995
2996      do levIndex = 1, numLevES
2997
2998        ! Pressures at the bottom and top of the ES layer
2999
3000        if (levIndex == 1) then
3001          presBottom = levelsES(levIndex)
3002          presTop = exp(0.5*alog(levelsES(levIndex+1)*levelsES(levIndex)))
3003        else if (levIndex == numLevES) then
3004          presBottom = exp(0.5*alog(levelsES(levIndex-1)*levelsES(levIndex)))
3005          presTop = levelsES(levIndex)
3006        else
3007          presBottom = exp(0.5*alog(levelsES(levIndex-1)*levelsES(levIndex)))
3008          presTop = exp(0.5*alog(levelsES(levIndex+1)*levelsES(levIndex)))
3009        end if
3010   
3011        ! Select the levels between presTop and presBottom
3012
3013        numLevSelect = 0
3014
3015        do levStnIndex = obsLevOffset(stationIndex)+1, obsLevOffset(stationIndex+1)
3016
3017          if ( obsValues(varIndexPres,levStnIndex) > presTop .and. &
3018               obsValues(varIndexPres,levStnIndex) <= presBottom ) then
3019            numLevSelect  = numLevSelect + 1
3020            levStnIndexList(numLevSelect) = levStnIndex
3021          end if
3022
3023        end do ! levStnIndex
3024
3025        ! Get the closest valid observation to the selected pressure level
3026
3027        levStnIndexValid = 0
3028        deltaPresMin = presBottom - presTop
3029
3030        do levSelectIndex = 1, numLevSelect
3031
3032          levStnIndex = levStnIndexList(levSelectIndex)
3033
3034          deltaPres = abs(obsValues(varIndexPres,levStnIndex) - levelsES(levIndex))
3035          condition = .not.btest(obsFlags(varIndexES,levStnIndex),18) .and. &
3036               .not.btest(obsFlags(varIndexES,levStnIndex),16) .and. &
3037               .not.btest(obsFlags(varIndexES,levStnIndex),9)  .and. &
3038               .not.btest(obsFlags(varIndexES,levStnIndex),8)  .and. &
3039               .not.btest(obsFlags(varIndexES,levStnIndex),2)  .and. &
3040               .not.btest(obsFlags(varIndexES,levStnIndex),11) .and. &
3041               obsValues(varIndexES,levStnIndex) >= 0.         .and. &
3042               deltaPres < deltaPresMin
3043
3044          if ( condition ) then
3045            deltaPresMin = deltaPres
3046            levStnIndexValid = levStnIndex
3047          end if
3048
3049        end do !levSelectIndex
3050
3051        ! Apply thinning obsFlags to all obs except the one selected with levStnIndexValid
3052
3053        do levSelectIndex = 1, numLevSelect
3054
3055          levStnIndex = levStnIndexList(levSelectIndex)
3056
3057          if ( (levStnIndex /= levStnIndexValid) .and. &
3058               (obsValues(varIndexES,levStnIndex) >= 0.) ) then
3059            obsFlags(varIndexES,levStnIndex) = ibset(obsFlags(varIndexES,levStnIndex),11)
3060          end if
3061
3062        end do
3063
3064      end do !levIndex
3065
3066    end do !stationIndex
3067
3068    deallocate(levStnIndexList)
3069
3070  end subroutine raobs_thinning_es
3071
3072  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
3073  ! raobs_blacklisting_ecmwf
3074  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
3075  subroutine raobs_blacklisting_ecmwf( obsFlags, obsValues, obsType, numStation, obsLevOffset )
3076    !:Purpose: Perform filtering of T-Td raobs observations based on
3077    !           approach inspired by ECMWF approach
3078
3079    implicit none
3080
3081    ! Arguments:
3082    integer, intent(in)    :: numStation
3083    integer, intent(in)    :: obsLevOffset(:), obsType(:)
3084    integer, intent(inout) :: obsFlags(:,:)
3085    real(4), intent(in)    :: obsValues(:,:)
3086
3087    ! Locals:
3088    logical :: conditionTT, conditionES, rejectES
3089    integer :: ierr, stationIndex, levStnIndex, varIndexES, varIndexTT, varIndexPres
3090    integer :: type, countReject0p, countReject0t, countReject1p, countReject1t
3091    integer :: countReject0pMpi, countReject0tMpi, countReject1pMpi, countReject1tMpi
3092    integer :: countTotalES, countTotalESMpi
3093
3094    countReject0p = 0
3095    countReject0t = 0
3096    countReject1p = 0
3097    countReject1t = 0
3098    countTotalES = 0
3099
3100    varIndexTT = 3
3101    varIndexES = 4
3102    varIndexPres = 5
3103
3104    do stationIndex = 1, numStation
3105      type = 0
3106
3107      if ( obsType(stationIndex) /= -1 ) then
3108
3109        if ( obsType(stationIndex) == 14  .or.  &
3110             obsType(stationIndex) == 24  .or.  &
3111             obsType(stationIndex) == 41  .or.  &
3112             obsType(stationIndex) == 42  .or.  &
3113             obsType(stationIndex) == 52  .or.  &
3114             obsType(stationIndex) == 79  .or.  &
3115             obsType(stationIndex) == 80  .or.  &
3116             obsType(stationIndex) == 81  .or.  &
3117             obsType(stationIndex) == 83  .or.  &
3118             obsType(stationIndex) == 141 .or.  &
3119             obsType(stationIndex) == 142 ) then
3120
3121          type = 1
3122
3123        end if
3124
3125      end if
3126
3127      do levStnIndex = obsLevOffset(stationIndex)+1, obsLevOffset(stationIndex+1)
3128
3129        conditionTT =  &
3130             .not.btest(obsFlags(varIndexTT,levStnIndex),18) .and. &
3131             .not.btest(obsFlags(varIndexTT,levStnIndex),16) .and. &
3132             .not.btest(obsFlags(varIndexTT,levStnIndex),9)  .and. &
3133             .not.btest(obsFlags(varIndexTT,levStnIndex),8)  .and. &
3134             .not.btest(obsFlags(varIndexTT,levStnIndex),2)  .and. &
3135             .not.btest(obsFlags(varIndexTT,levStnIndex),11) .and. &
3136             obsValues(varIndexTT,levStnIndex) >= 0.0
3137        conditionES =  &
3138             .not.btest(obsFlags(varIndexES,levStnIndex),18) .and. &
3139             .not.btest(obsFlags(varIndexES,levStnIndex),16) .and. &
3140             .not.btest(obsFlags(varIndexES,levStnIndex),9)  .and. &
3141             .not.btest(obsFlags(varIndexES,levStnIndex),8)  .and. &
3142             .not.btest(obsFlags(varIndexES,levStnIndex),2)  .and. &
3143             .not.btest(obsFlags(varIndexES,levStnIndex),11) .and. &
3144             obsValues(varIndexES,levStnIndex) >= 0.0
3145
3146        if ( conditionTT ) then
3147
3148          rejectES = .false. 
3149          if (conditionES) countTotalES = countTotalES + 1
3150
3151          if ( type == 0 ) then
3152
3153            if ( .not.rejectES .and. obsValues(varIndexPres,levStnIndex) < 300.0 ) then
3154              if (conditionES) countReject0p = countReject0p + 1
3155              rejectES = .true. 
3156            end if
3157            if ( .not.rejectES .and. obsValues(varIndexTT,levStnIndex) < 233.15 ) then
3158              if (conditionES) countReject0t = countReject0t + 1
3159              rejectES = .true. 
3160            end if
3161    
3162          else if  ( type == 1 ) then
3163
3164            if ( .not.rejectES .and. obsValues(varIndexPres,levStnIndex) < 100.0 ) then
3165              if (conditionES) countReject1p = countReject1p + 1
3166              rejectES = .true. 
3167            end if
3168            if ( .not.rejectES .and. obsValues(varIndexTT,levStnIndex) < 213.15 ) then
3169              if (conditionES)  countReject1t = countReject1t + 1
3170              rejectES = .true. 
3171            end if
3172
3173          end if
3174
3175          if ( rejectES ) then
3176            obsFlags(varIndexES,levStnIndex) = ibset(obsFlags(varIndexES,levStnIndex),11)
3177          end if
3178
3179        else
3180
3181          obsFlags(varIndexES,levStnIndex) = obsFlags(varIndexTT,levStnIndex)
3182
3183        end if
3184
3185      end do !levStnIndex
3186
3187    end do !stationIndex
3188
3189    
3190    call rpn_comm_allReduce(countTotalES, countTotalESMpi, 1, 'mpi_integer', &
3191                            'mpi_sum','grid',ierr)
3192    call rpn_comm_allReduce(countReject0p, countReject0pMpi, 1, 'mpi_integer', &
3193                            'mpi_sum','grid',ierr)
3194    call rpn_comm_allReduce(countReject0t, countReject0tMpi, 1, 'mpi_integer', &
3195                            'mpi_sum','grid',ierr)
3196    call rpn_comm_allReduce(countReject1p, countReject1pMpi, 1, 'mpi_integer', &
3197                            'mpi_sum','grid',ierr)
3198    call rpn_comm_allReduce(countReject1t, countReject1tMpi, 1, 'mpi_integer', &
3199                            'mpi_sum','grid',ierr)
3200    write(*,*)
3201    write(*,*) ' Rejet des donnees ES inspire de ECMWF'
3202    write(*,*)
3203    write(*,'(a30,I10)') 'nb total donnees es        ',countTotalESMpi
3204    write(*,'(a30,I10)') 'nb rejet type 0 pression   ',countReject0pMpi
3205    write(*,'(a30,I10)') 'nb rejet type 0 temperature',countReject0tMpi
3206    write(*,'(a30,I10)') 'nb rejet type 1 pression   ',countReject1pMpi
3207    write(*,'(a30,I10)') 'nb rejet type 1 temperature',countReject1tMpi
3208    write(*,*)
3209    if (countTotalESMpi > 0) then
3210      write(*,'(a30,I10,f10.2)') 'nb rejet total et %', &
3211           countReject0pMpi + countReject0tMpi + countReject1pMpi + countReject1tMpi, &
3212           100.0 * (countReject0pMpi + countReject0tMpi + countReject1pMpi + &
3213                    countReject1tMpi) / countTotalESMpi
3214    end if
3215    write(*,*)
3216
3217  end subroutine raobs_blacklisting_ecmwf
3218  
3219  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
3220  ! thn_gbGpsByDistance
3221  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
3222  subroutine thn_gbGpsByDistance(obsdat, deltemps, deldist, removeUncorrected, rejectNoZTDScore)
3223    !
3224    !:Purpose: Original method for thinning GB-GPS data by the distance method.
3225    !           Set bit 11 of OBS_FLG on observations that are to be rejected.
3226    !
3227    implicit none
3228
3229    ! Arguments:
3230    type(struct_obs), intent(inout) :: obsdat
3231    integer,          intent(in)    :: deltemps
3232    integer,          intent(in)    :: deldist
3233    logical,          intent(in)    :: removeUncorrected
3234    logical,          intent(in)    :: rejectNoZTDScore
3235
3236    ! Local parameters:
3237    real(4), parameter :: normZtdScore = 50.0 ! normalization factor for zdscores
3238    integer, parameter :: nullValue = 9999 ! Value representing a non-value or null Value
3239    character(len=3), parameter :: winpos='mid' ! Preference to obs close to middle of window
3240
3241    ! Locals:
3242    integer :: ierr, numHeader, numHeaderMpi, numHeaderMaxMpi, bodyIndex, headerIndex
3243    integer :: countObs, countObsOutMpi, countObsInMpi
3244    integer :: obsDate, obsTime, obsVarno, ztdObsFlag, obsFlag, nsize
3245    integer :: bgckCount, bgckCountMpi, blackListCount, blackListCountMpi
3246    integer :: unCorrectCount, unCorrectCountMpi, badTimeCount, badTimeCountMpi
3247    integer :: ztdScoreCount, ztdScoreCountMpi
3248    integer :: numSelected, middleStep
3249    integer :: obsIndex1, obsIndex2, headerIndex1, headerIndex2
3250    integer :: headerIndexBeg, headerIndexEnd
3251    real(4) :: thinDistance, deltaLat, deltaLon, obsLat1, obsLat2
3252    real(4) :: normFormalErr, missingFormalErr, formalError, finalZtdScore, ztdScore
3253    real(8) :: obsLonInDegrees, obsLatInDegrees, obsStepIndex_r8
3254    character(len=12)  :: stnId
3255    logical :: skipThisObs, thisStnIdNoaa
3256    integer, allocatable :: quality(:), qualityMpi(:)
3257    integer, allocatable :: obsLonBurpFile(:), obsLatBurpFile(:)
3258    integer, allocatable :: obsLonBurpFileMpi(:), obsLatBurpFileMpi(:)
3259    integer, allocatable :: obsStepIndex(:), obsStepIndexMpi(:)
3260    integer, allocatable :: headerIndexSelected(:), headerIndexSorted(:)
3261    logical, allocatable :: valid(:), validMpi(:)
3262
3263    write(*,*)
3264    write(*,*) 'thn_gbGpsByDistance: Starting'
3265    write(*,*)
3266
3267    numHeader = obs_numHeader(obsdat)
3268    call rpn_comm_allReduce(numHeader, numHeaderMaxMpi, 1, 'mpi_integer', &
3269                            'mpi_max', 'grid', ierr)
3270    numHeaderMpi = numHeaderMaxMpi * mmpi_nprocs
3271
3272    ! Check if any observations to be treated
3273    countObs = 0
3274    call obs_set_current_header_list(obsdat,'GP')
3275    HEADER0: do
3276      headerIndex = obs_getHeaderIndex(obsdat)
3277      if (headerIndex < 0) exit HEADER0
3278      countObs = countObs + 1
3279    end do HEADER0
3280
3281    call rpn_comm_allReduce(countObs, countObsInMpi, 1, 'mpi_integer', &
3282                            'mpi_sum','grid',ierr)
3283    if (countObsInMpi == 0) then
3284      write(*,*) 'thn_gbGpsByDistance: no gb-gps observations present'
3285      return
3286    end if
3287
3288    write(*,*) 'thn_gbGpsByDistance: number of obs initial = ', &
3289               countObs, countObsInMpi
3290
3291    thinDistance = real(deldist)
3292    write(*,*)
3293    write(*,*) 'Minimum thinning distance ', thinDistance
3294
3295    middleStep   = nint( ((tim_windowSize/2.0d0) - tim_dstepobs/2.d0) / &
3296                   tim_dstepobs) + 1
3297
3298    write(*,*)
3299    write(*,*) 'Number of time bins                     = ', tim_nstepobs
3300    write(*,*) 'Minimum number of time bins between obs = ', deltemps
3301    write(*,*) 'Central time bin                        = ', middleStep
3302    write(*,*)
3303
3304    ! Allocations: 
3305    allocate(obsLatBurpFile(numHeaderMaxMpi))
3306    allocate(obsLonBurpFile(numHeaderMaxMpi))
3307    allocate(obsStepIndex(numHeaderMaxMpi))
3308    allocate(quality(numHeaderMaxMpi))
3309    allocate(valid(numHeaderMaxMpi))
3310
3311    allocate(obsLatBurpFileMpi(numHeaderMpi))
3312    allocate(obsLonBurpFileMpi(numHeaderMpi))
3313    allocate(obsStepIndexMpi(numHeaderMpi))
3314    allocate(qualityMpi(numHeaderMpi))
3315
3316    allocate(headerIndexSorted(numHeaderMpi))
3317    allocate(headerIndexSelected(numHeaderMpi))
3318    allocate(validMpi(numHeaderMpi))
3319
3320    validMpi(:) = .false.
3321
3322    quality(:)        = nullValue
3323    obsLatBurpFile(:) = 0
3324    obsLonBurpFile(:) = 0
3325    obsStepIndex(:)   = 0
3326
3327    qualityMpi(:)        = nullValue
3328    obsLatBurpFileMpi(:) = 0
3329    obsLonBurpFileMpi(:) = 0
3330    obsStepIndexMpi(:)   = 0
3331
3332    badTimeCount = 0
3333    bgckCount = 0
3334    blackListCount = 0
3335    unCorrectCount = 0
3336    ztdScoreCount = 0
3337
3338    ! First pass through observations
3339    call obs_set_current_header_list(obsdat,'GP')
3340    HEADER1: do
3341      headerIndex = obs_getHeaderIndex(obsdat)
3342      if (headerIndex < 0) exit HEADER1
3343
3344      ! convert and store stnId as integer array
3345      stnId = obs_elem_c(obsdat,'STID',headerIndex)
3346
3347      ! get latitude and longitude
3348      obsLonInDegrees = MPC_DEGREES_PER_RADIAN_R8 * obs_headElem_r(obsdat, OBS_LON, headerIndex)
3349      obsLatInDegrees = MPC_DEGREES_PER_RADIAN_R8 * obs_headElem_r(obsdat, OBS_LAT, headerIndex)
3350      obsLonBurpFile(headerIndex) = nint(100.0*obsLonInDegrees)
3351      obsLatBurpFile(headerIndex) = 9000 + nint(100.0*obsLatInDegrees)
3352      if (obsLonBurpFile(headerIndex) >= 18000) then
3353        obsLonBurpFile(headerIndex) = obsLonBurpFile(headerIndex) - 18000
3354      else
3355        obsLonBurpFile(headerIndex) = obsLonBurpFile(headerIndex) + 18000
3356      end if
3357
3358      ! get step bin
3359      obsDate = obs_headElem_i(obsdat, OBS_DAT, headerIndex)
3360      obsTime = obs_headElem_i(obsdat, OBS_ETM, headerIndex)
3361      call tim_getStepObsIndex(obsStepIndex_r8, tim_getDatestamp(), &
3362                               obsDate, obsTime, tim_nstepobs)
3363      obsStepIndex(headerIndex) = nint(obsStepIndex_r8)
3364
3365      ! thisStnIdNoaa==TRUE means obs has collocated GPS met (Psfc) observations
3366      thisStnIdNoaa = ((index(stnId,'FSL_') + index(stnId,'-NOAA') + index(stnId,'-UCAR')) > 0)
3367      ! normalization factor (Units = mm) for ZTD formal error (formalError) 
3368      if (thisStnIdNoaa) then
3369        normFormalErr  = 15.0
3370        missingFormalErr =  7.0
3371      else
3372        normFormalErr  = 5.0
3373        missingFormalErr = 3.0
3374      end if
3375
3376      ! get ztd flag and formal error value, element 15032
3377      formalError = -1.0
3378      ztdScore = -1.0
3379      ztdObsFlag = -1
3380      call obs_set_current_body_list(obsdat, headerIndex)
3381      BODY1: do 
3382        bodyIndex = obs_getBodyIndex(obsdat)
3383        if (bodyIndex < 0) exit BODY1
3384        obsVarno = obs_bodyElem_i(obsdat, OBS_VNM, bodyIndex)
3385        if (obsVarno == bufr_nezd) then
3386          ! convert units from m to mm
3387          formalError = 1000.0*obs_bodyElem_r(obsdat, OBS_OER, bodyIndex)
3388        end if
3389        if (obsVarno == bufr_ztdScore) then
3390          ztdScore = obs_bodyElem_r(obsdat, OBS_VAR, bodyIndex)
3391        end if
3392        if (obsVarno == bufr_nezd) then
3393          ztdObsFlag = obs_bodyElem_i(obsdat, OBS_FLG, bodyIndex)
3394        end if
3395      end do BODY1
3396      if (formalError == -1.0 .or. formalError == 1000.0*MPC_missingValue_R4) then
3397        formalError = missingFormalErr
3398      end if
3399      if (ztdScore == -1.0) then
3400        ztdScore = 999.0
3401      end if
3402      if (ztdObsFlag == -1) then
3403        call utl_abort('thn_gbGpsByDistance: ztd not found')
3404      end if
3405
3406      ! ZTD quality estimate using monitoring zdscore and the formal error
3407      finalZtdScore = 80*(ztdScore/normZtdScore) + 20*(formalError/normFormalErr)
3408    
3409      ! Give preference to FSL/UCAR ZTD observations (usually include collocated GPS met Psfc)
3410      if (.not. thisStnIdNoaa) finalZtdScore = finalZtdScore + 5.0
3411    
3412      ! Give preference to obs near middle or end of the assimilation window
3413      if (winpos == 'mid') then
3414        finalZtdScore = finalZtdScore + 25.0*float(abs(middleStep-obsStepIndex(headerIndex))) / &
3415                        float(middleStep-1)
3416      else if (winpos == 'end') then
3417        finalZtdScore = finalZtdScore + 25.0*float(tim_nstepobs-obsStepIndex(headerIndex)) / &
3418                        float(tim_nstepobs-1)
3419      end if
3420
3421      ! Quality (lower is better), typical values 20->100, if no zdscore then > 1600
3422      quality(headerIndex) = nint(finalZtdScore)
3423
3424      ! obs is outside time window
3425      if(obsStepIndex(headerIndex) == -1.0d0) then
3426        badTimeCount = badTimeCount + 1
3427        quality(headerIndex) = nullValue
3428      end if
3429
3430      ! ZTD O-P failed background/topography checks, ZTD is blacklisted, ZTD is not bias corrected
3431      if (       btest(ztdObsFlag,16) ) bgckCount = bgckCount + 1
3432      if (       btest(ztdObsFlag,8) )  blackListCount = blackListCount + 1
3433      if ( btest(ztdObsFlag,16) .or. btest(ztdObsFlag,18) .or. &
3434           btest(ztdObsFlag,8) ) then
3435        quality(headerIndex) = nullValue
3436      end if
3437      if (removeUncorrected) then
3438        if ( .not. btest(ztdObsflag,6) ) then
3439          unCorrectCount = unCorrectCount + 1
3440          quality(headerIndex) = nullValue
3441        end if
3442      end if
3443
3444      ! ZTD quality is unknown (missing ztd score)
3445      if (ztdScore == 999.0) then
3446        ztdScoreCount = ztdScoreCount + 1
3447        if ( rejectNoZTDScore ) then
3448          quality(headerIndex) = 9999
3449        end if
3450      end if
3451
3452    end do HEADER1
3453
3454    ! Gather needed information from all MPI tasks
3455    nsize = numHeaderMaxMpi
3456    call rpn_comm_allgather(quality,    nsize, 'mpi_integer',  &
3457                            qualityMpi, nsize, 'mpi_integer', 'grid', ierr)
3458    call rpn_comm_allgather(obsLatBurpFile,    nsize, 'mpi_integer',  &
3459                            obsLatBurpFileMpi, nsize, 'mpi_integer', 'grid', ierr)
3460    call rpn_comm_allgather(obsLonBurpFile,    nsize, 'mpi_integer',  &
3461                            obsLonBurpFileMpi, nsize, 'mpi_integer', 'grid', ierr)
3462    call rpn_comm_allgather(obsStepIndex,    nsize, 'mpi_integer',  &
3463                            obsStepIndexMpi, nsize, 'mpi_integer', 'grid', ierr)
3464
3465    do obsIndex1 = 1, numHeaderMpi
3466      headerIndexSorted(obsIndex1)  = obsIndex1
3467    end do
3468
3469    call thn_QsortIntIgnoringNullValues(qualityMpi,headerIndexSorted,nullValue)
3470
3471    numSelected       = 0   ! number of obs selected so far
3472    OBS_LOOP: do obsIndex1 = 1, numHeaderMpi
3473
3474      if ( qualityMpi(obsIndex1) /= nullValue ) then
3475
3476        headerIndex1 = headerIndexSorted(obsIndex1)
3477
3478        ! Check if any of the obs already selected are close in space/time to this obs
3479        ! If no, then keep (select) this obs        
3480        if( numSelected >= 1 ) then
3481          skipThisObs = .false.
3482          LOOP2: do obsIndex2 = 1, numSelected
3483            headerIndex2 = headerIndexSelected(obsIndex2)
3484            if ( abs(obsStepIndexMpi(headerIndex1) -  &
3485                     obsStepIndexMpi(headerIndex2)) < deltemps  ) then
3486              deltaLat = abs(obsLatBurpFileMpi(headerIndex1) -  &
3487                             obsLatBurpFileMpi(headerIndex2))/100.
3488              deltaLon = abs(obsLonBurpFileMpi(headerIndex1) -  &
3489                             obsLonBurpFileMpi(headerIndex2))/100.
3490              if (deltaLon > 180.) deltaLon = 360. - deltaLon
3491              obsLat1 = ((obsLatBurpFileMpi(headerIndex1) - 9000)/100.)
3492              obsLat2  = ((obsLatBurpFileMpi(headerIndex2) - 9000)/100.)
3493              if ( thn_distanceArc(deltaLat,deltaLon,obsLat1,obsLat2) < thinDistance ) then
3494                skipThisObs = .true.
3495                exit LOOP2
3496              end if
3497            end if
3498          end do LOOP2
3499        else
3500          skipThisObs = .false.
3501        end if
3502
3503        if (.not. skipThisObs) then
3504          numSelected = numSelected + 1
3505          headerIndexSelected(numSelected) = headerIndex1
3506        end if
3507
3508      end if
3509
3510    end do OBS_LOOP
3511
3512    do obsIndex1 = 1, numSelected
3513      obsIndex2 = headerIndexSelected(obsIndex1)
3514      validMpi(obsIndex2) = .true.
3515    end do
3516
3517    ! Update local copy of valid from global mpi version
3518    headerIndexBeg = 1 + mmpi_myid * numHeaderMaxMpi
3519    headerIndexEnd = headerIndexBeg + numHeaderMaxMpi - 1
3520    valid(:) = validMpi(headerIndexBeg:headerIndexEnd)
3521
3522    countObs = count(valid)
3523    call rpn_comm_allReduce(countObs, countObsOutMpi, 1, 'mpi_integer', &
3524                            'mpi_sum','grid',ierr)
3525    write(*,*) 'thn_gbGpsByDistance: number of obs after thinning = ', &
3526               countObs, countObsOutMpi
3527
3528    ! modify the obs flags and count number of obs kept for each stnId
3529    call obs_set_current_header_list(obsdat,'GP')
3530    HEADER3: do
3531      headerIndex = obs_getHeaderIndex(obsdat)
3532      if (headerIndex < 0) exit HEADER3
3533
3534      ! do not keep this obs: set bit 11 and jump to the next obs
3535      if (.not. valid(headerIndex)) then
3536        call obs_set_current_body_list(obsdat, headerIndex)
3537        BODY3: do 
3538          bodyIndex = obs_getBodyIndex(obsdat)
3539          if (bodyIndex < 0) exit BODY3
3540          obsFlag = obs_bodyElem_i(obsdat, OBS_FLG, bodyIndex)
3541          call obs_bodySet_i(obsdat, OBS_FLG, bodyIndex, ibset(obsFlag,11))
3542        end do BODY3
3543        cycle HEADER3
3544      end if
3545
3546    end do HEADER3
3547
3548    call rpn_comm_allReduce(badTimeCount, badTimeCountMpi, 1, 'mpi_integer', &
3549                            'mpi_sum','grid',ierr)
3550    call rpn_comm_allReduce(unCorrectCount, unCorrectCountMpi, 1, 'mpi_integer', &
3551                            'mpi_sum','grid',ierr)
3552    call rpn_comm_allReduce(blackListCount, blackListCountMpi, 1, 'mpi_integer', &
3553                            'mpi_sum','grid',ierr)
3554    call rpn_comm_allReduce(bgckCount, bgckCountMpi, 1, 'mpi_integer', &
3555                            'mpi_sum','grid',ierr)
3556    call rpn_comm_allReduce(ztdScoreCount, ztdScoreCountMpi, 1, 'mpi_integer', &
3557                            'mpi_sum','grid',ierr)
3558
3559    write(*,*)
3560    write(*,'(a50,i10)') 'Number of input obs                  = ', countObsInMpi
3561    write(*,'(a50,i10)') 'Total number of rejected/thinned obs = ', countObsInMpi - countObsOutMpi
3562    write(*,'(a50,i10)') 'Number of output obs                 = ', countObsOutMpi
3563    write(*,*)
3564    write(*,*)
3565    write(*,'(a50,i10)') 'Number of blacklisted obs            = ', blackListCountMpi
3566    write(*,'(a50,i10)') 'Number of obs without bias correction= ', unCorrectCountMpi
3567    write(*,'(a50,i10)') 'Number of obs with no ztdScore       = ', ztdScoreCountMpi
3568    write(*,'(a60,4i10)') 'Number of rejects outside time window, BGCK, thinning ', &
3569         badTimeCountMpi, bgckCountMpi, &
3570         countObsInMpi - countObsOutMpi - &
3571         bgckCountMpi - badTimeCountMpi - blackListCountMpi - unCorrectCountMpi - ztdScoreCountMpi
3572
3573    write(*,*)
3574    write(*,*) 'thn_gbGpsByDistance: Finished'
3575    write(*,*)
3576
3577  end subroutine thn_gbGpsByDistance
3578
3579  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
3580  ! thn_satWindsByDistance
3581  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
3582  subroutine thn_satWindsByDistance(obsdat, familyType, deltemps, deldist)
3583    !
3584    !:Purpose: Original method for thinning SatWinds data by the distance method.
3585    !           Set bit 11 of OBS_FLG on observations that are to be rejected.
3586    !
3587    implicit none
3588
3589    ! Arguments:
3590    type(struct_obs), intent(inout) :: obsdat
3591    character(len=*), intent(in)    :: familyType
3592    integer,          intent(in)    :: deltemps
3593    integer,          intent(in)    :: deldist
3594
3595    ! Local parameters:
3596    integer, parameter :: numStnIdMax = 100
3597    integer, parameter :: numLayers = 11
3598    integer, parameter :: nullValue = -1
3599    real(4), parameter :: layer(numLayers) = (/ 100000., 92500., 85000., 70000., &
3600                                                50000., 40000., 30000., 25000., &
3601                                                20000., 15000., 10000. /)
3602
3603    ! Locals:
3604    integer :: ierr, numHeader, numHeaderMaxMpi, bodyIndex, headerIndex, stnIdIndex
3605    integer :: numStnId, stnIdIndexFound, lenStnId, charIndex
3606    integer :: obsDate, obsTime, layerIndex, obsVarno, obsFlag, uObsFlag, vObsFlag
3607    integer :: bgckCount, bgckCountMpi, missingCount, missingCountMpi, nsize
3608    integer :: countObs, countObsOutMpi, countObsInMpi, numSelected, numHeaderMpi
3609    integer :: obsIndex1, obsIndex2, headerIndex1, headerIndex2
3610    integer :: headerIndexBeg, headerIndexEnd, mpiTaskId
3611    real(4) :: thinDistance, deltaLat, deltaLon, obsLat1, obsLat2
3612    real(4) :: obsPressure
3613    real(8) :: obsLonInDegrees, obsLatInDegrees
3614    real(8) :: obsStepIndex_r8, deltaPress, deltaPressMin
3615    character(len=12)  :: stnId, stnidList(numStnIdMax)
3616    logical :: obsAlreadySameStep, skipThisObs
3617    integer :: numObsStnIdOut(numStnIdMax)
3618    integer :: numObsStnIdInMpi(numStnIdMax), numObsStnIdOutMpi(numStnIdMax)
3619    integer, allocatable :: stnIdInt(:,:), stnIdIntMpi(:,:), obsMethod(:), obsMethodMpi(:)
3620    integer, allocatable :: quality(:), qualityMpi(:)
3621    integer, allocatable :: obsLonBurpFile(:), obsLatBurpFile(:)
3622    integer, allocatable :: obsLonBurpFileMpi(:), obsLatBurpFileMpi(:)
3623    integer, allocatable :: obsStepIndex(:), obsStepIndexMpi(:)
3624    integer, allocatable :: obsLayerIndex(:), obsLayerIndexMpi(:)
3625    integer, allocatable :: headerIndexSorted(:), headerIndexSelected(:)
3626    logical, allocatable :: valid(:), validMpi(:), validMpi2(:)
3627
3628    write(*,*)
3629    write(*,*) 'thn_satWindsByDistance: Starting'
3630    write(*,*)
3631
3632    numHeader = obs_numHeader(obsdat)
3633    call rpn_comm_allReduce(numHeader, numHeaderMaxMpi, 1, 'mpi_integer', &
3634                            'mpi_max', 'grid', ierr)
3635
3636    ! Check if any observations to be treated
3637    countObs = 0
3638    call obs_set_current_header_list(obsdat,trim(familyType))
3639    HEADER0: do
3640      headerIndex = obs_getHeaderIndex(obsdat)
3641      if (headerIndex < 0) exit HEADER0
3642      countObs = countObs + 1
3643    end do HEADER0
3644
3645    call rpn_comm_allReduce(countObs, countObsInMpi, 1, 'mpi_integer', &
3646                            'mpi_sum','grid',ierr)
3647    if (countObsInMpi == 0) then
3648      write(*,*) 'thn_satWindsByDistance: no satwind observations present'
3649      return
3650    end if
3651
3652    write(*,*) 'thn_satWindsByDistance: number of obs initial = ', &
3653               countObs, countObsInMpi
3654
3655    thinDistance = real(deldist)
3656    write(*,*) 'Minimun thinning distance ',thinDistance
3657
3658    ! Allocations:
