3659    allocate(valid(numHeaderMaxMpi))
3660    allocate(quality(numHeaderMaxMpi))
3661    allocate(obsLatBurpFile(numHeaderMaxMpi))
3662    allocate(obsLonBurpFile(numHeaderMaxMpi))
3663    allocate(obsStepIndex(numHeaderMaxMpi))
3664    allocate(obsLayerIndex(numHeaderMaxMpi))
3665    allocate(obsMethod(numHeaderMaxMpi))
3666    lenStnId = len(stnId)
3667    allocate(stnIdInt(lenStnId,numHeaderMaxMpi))
3668
3669    ! Initializations:
3670    valid(:) = .false.
3671    quality(:) = nullValue
3672    obsLatBurpFile(:) = 0
3673    obsLonBurpFile(:) = 0
3674    obsLayerIndex(:) = 0
3675    obsStepIndex(:) = 0
3676    obsMethod(:) = 0
3677    stnIdInt(:,:) = 0
3678    numObsStnIdInMpi(:) = 0
3679    numObsStnIdOut(:) = 0
3680    numObsStnIdOutMpi(:) = 0
3681    bgckCount = 0
3682    missingCount = 0
3683
3684    ! First pass through observations
3685    numStnId = 0
3686    call obs_set_current_header_list(obsdat,trim(familyType))
3687    HEADER1: do
3688      headerIndex = obs_getHeaderIndex(obsdat)
3689      if (headerIndex < 0) exit HEADER1
3690
3691      ! convert and store stnId as integer array
3692      stnId = obs_elem_c(obsdat,'STID',headerIndex)
3693      do charIndex = 1, lenStnId
3694        stnIdInt(charIndex,headerIndex) = iachar(stnId(charIndex:charIndex))
3695      end do
3696
3697      ! get latitude and longitude
3698      obsLonInDegrees = MPC_DEGREES_PER_RADIAN_R8 * obs_headElem_r(obsdat, OBS_LON, headerIndex)
3699      obsLatInDegrees = MPC_DEGREES_PER_RADIAN_R8 * obs_headElem_r(obsdat, OBS_LAT, headerIndex)
3700      obsLonBurpFile(headerIndex) = nint(100.0*obsLonInDegrees)
3701      obsLatBurpFile(headerIndex) = 9000 + nint(100.0*obsLatInDegrees)
3702
3703      ! get step bin
3704      obsDate = obs_headElem_i(obsdat, OBS_DAT, headerIndex)
3705      obsTime = obs_headElem_i(obsdat, OBS_ETM, headerIndex)
3706      call tim_getStepObsIndex(obsStepIndex_r8, tim_getDatestamp(), &
3707                               obsDate, obsTime, tim_nstepobs)
3708      obsStepIndex(headerIndex) = nint(obsStepIndex_r8)
3709
3710      ! find layer (assumes 1 level only per headerIndex)
3711      obsPressure = -1.0
3712      call obs_set_current_body_list(obsdat, headerIndex)
3713      BODY1: do 
3714        bodyIndex = obs_getBodyIndex(obsdat)
3715        if (bodyIndex < 0) exit BODY1
3716        
3717        if (obsPressure <= 0.0) then
3718          obsPressure = obs_bodyElem_r(obsdat, OBS_PPP, bodyIndex)
3719          exit BODY1
3720        end if
3721      end do BODY1
3722      ! modify obsPressure to be consistent with operational pgm
3723      obsPressure = 100.0*nint(obsPressure/100.0)
3724      deltaPressMin = abs( log(obsPressure) - log(layer(1)) )
3725      obsLayerIndex(headerIndex) = 1
3726      do layerIndex = 2, numLayers
3727        deltaPress = abs( log(obsPressure) - log(layer(layerIndex)) )
3728        if ( deltaPress < deltaPressMin ) then
3729          deltaPressMin = deltaPress
3730          obsLayerIndex(headerIndex) = layerIndex
3731        end if
3732      end do
3733
3734      ! extract additional information
3735      obsMethod(headerIndex) = obs_headElem_i(obsdat, OBS_SWMT, headerIndex)
3736
3737      ! set the observation quality based on QI1
3738      quality(headerIndex) = obs_headElem_i(obsdat, OBS_SWQ1, headerIndex)
3739
3740      ! find observation flags (assumes 1 level only per headerIndex)
3741      uObsFlag = nullValue
3742      vObsFlag = nullValue
3743      call obs_set_current_body_list(obsdat, headerIndex)
3744      BODY2: do 
3745        bodyIndex = obs_getBodyIndex(obsdat)
3746        if (bodyIndex < 0) exit BODY2
3747        obsVarno = obs_bodyElem_i(obsdat, OBS_VNM, bodyIndex)
3748        if (obsVarno == bufr_neuu) then
3749          uObsFlag = obs_bodyElem_i(obsdat, OBS_FLG, bodyIndex)
3750        else if (obsVarno == bufr_nevv) then
3751          vObsFlag = obs_bodyElem_i(obsdat, OBS_FLG, bodyIndex)
3752        end if
3753      end do BODY2
3754
3755      ! modify quality based on flags
3756      if (uObsFlag /= nullValue .and. vObsFlag /= nullValue ) then
3757        if ( btest(uObsFlag,16) .or. btest(vObsFlag,16) ) bgckCount = bgckCount + 1
3758        if ( btest(uObsFlag,16) .or. btest(vObsFlag,16) .or. &
3759             btest(uObsFlag,18) .or. btest(vObsFlag,18) ) then
3760          quality(headerIndex) = 0
3761        end if
3762      else
3763        quality(headerIndex) = 0
3764        MissingCount = MissingCount + 1
3765      end if
3766
3767    end do HEADER1
3768
3769    ! Gather needed information from all MPI tasks
3770    allocate(validMpi(numHeaderMaxMpi*mmpi_nprocs))
3771    allocate(validMpi2(numHeaderMaxMpi*mmpi_nprocs))
3772    allocate(qualityMpi(numHeaderMaxMpi*mmpi_nprocs))
3773    allocate(obsLatBurpFileMpi(numHeaderMaxMpi*mmpi_nprocs))
3774    allocate(obsLonBurpFileMpi(numHeaderMaxMpi*mmpi_nprocs))
3775    allocate(obsStepIndexMpi(numHeaderMaxMpi*mmpi_nprocs))
3776    allocate(obsLayerIndexMpi(numHeaderMaxMpi*mmpi_nprocs))
3777    allocate(obsMethodMpi(numHeaderMaxMpi*mmpi_nprocs))
3778    allocate(stnIdIntMpi(lenStnId,numHeaderMaxMpi*mmpi_nprocs))
3779
3780    nsize = numHeaderMaxMpi
3781    call rpn_comm_allgather(quality,    nsize, 'mpi_integer',  &
3782                            qualityMpi, nsize, 'mpi_integer', 'grid', ierr)
3783    call rpn_comm_allgather(obsLatBurpFile,    nsize, 'mpi_integer',  &
3784                            obsLatBurpFileMpi, nsize, 'mpi_integer', 'grid', ierr)
3785    call rpn_comm_allgather(obsLonBurpFile,    nsize, 'mpi_integer',  &
3786                            obsLonBurpFileMpi, nsize, 'mpi_integer', 'grid', ierr)
3787    call rpn_comm_allgather(obsStepIndex,    nsize, 'mpi_integer',  &
3788                            obsStepIndexMpi, nsize, 'mpi_integer', 'grid', ierr)
3789    call rpn_comm_allgather(obsLayerIndex,    nsize, 'mpi_integer',  &
3790                            obsLayerIndexMpi, nsize, 'mpi_integer', 'grid', ierr)
3791    call rpn_comm_allgather(obsMethod,    nsize, 'mpi_integer',  &
3792                            obsMethodMpi, nsize, 'mpi_integer', 'grid', ierr)
3793    nsize = lenStnId * numHeaderMaxMpi
3794    call rpn_comm_allgather(stnIdInt,    nsize, 'mpi_integer',  &
3795                            stnIdIntMpi, nsize, 'mpi_integer', 'grid', ierr)
3796
3797    ! build a global list of stnId over all mpi tasks
3798    numHeaderMpi = numHeaderMaxMpi * mmpi_nprocs
3799    HEADER: do headerIndex = 1, numHeaderMpi
3800      if (all(stnIdIntMpi(:,headerIndex) == 0)) cycle HEADER
3801
3802      ! Station ID converted back to character string
3803      do charIndex = 1, lenStnId
3804        stnId(charIndex:charIndex) = achar(stnIdIntMpi(charIndex,headerIndex))
3805      end do
3806
3807      if (numStnId < numStnIdMax ) then
3808        stnIdIndexFound = nullValue
3809        do stnIdIndex = 1, numStnId
3810          if ( stnidList(stnIdIndex) == stnid ) stnIdIndexFound = stnIdIndex
3811        end do
3812        if ( stnIdIndexFound == nullValue ) then
3813          numStnId = numStnId + 1
3814          stnidList(numStnId) = stnid
3815          stnIdIndexFound = numStnId
3816        end if
3817        numObsStnIdInMpi(stnIdIndexFound) = numObsStnIdInMpi(stnIdIndexFound) + 1
3818      else
3819        call utl_abort('thn_satWindsByDistance: numStnId too large')
3820      end if
3821    end do HEADER
3822
3823    allocate(headerIndexSorted(numHeaderMaxMpi*mmpi_nprocs))
3824    do headerIndex = 1, numHeaderMaxMpi*mmpi_nprocs
3825      headerIndexSorted(headerIndex) = headerIndex
3826    end do
3827    allocate(headerIndexSelected(numHeaderMaxMpi*mmpi_nprocs))
3828    headerIndexSelected(:) = 0
3829
3830    ! Thinning procedure
3831    call thn_QsortIntIgnoringNullValues(qualityMpi,headerIndexSorted,nullValue)
3832
3833    validMpi(:) = .false.
3834    STNIDLOOP: do stnIdIndex = 1, numStnId
3835      write(*,*) 'thn_satWindsByDistance: applying thinning for: ', &
3836                 trim(stnidList(stnIdIndex))
3837
3838      LAYERLOOP: do layerIndex = 1, numLayers
3839
3840        ! do selection of obs for 1 satellite and layer at a time, on separate mpi tasks
3841        mpiTaskId = mod((stnIdIndex-1)*numLayers + layerIndex - 1, mmpi_nprocs)
3842        if (mmpi_myid /= mpiTaskId) cycle LAYERLOOP
3843
3844        numSelected       = 0
3845        OBSLOOP1: do obsIndex1 = 1, numHeaderMpi
3846          headerIndex1 = headerIndexSorted(numHeaderMpi-obsIndex1+1)
3847
3848          ! only consider obs with current layer being considered
3849          if (obsLayerIndexMpi(headerIndex1) /= layerIndex) cycle OBSLOOP1
3850
3851          ! only consider obs with high quality
3852          if (qualityMpi(numHeaderMpi-obsIndex1+1) <= 10) cycle OBSLOOP1
3853
3854          ! only consider obs from current satellite
3855          do charIndex = 1, lenStnId
3856            stnId(charIndex:charIndex) = achar(stnIdIntMpi(charIndex,headerIndex1))
3857          end do
3858          if (stnidList(stnIdIndex) /= stnId) cycle OBSLOOP1
3859
3860          ! On compte le nombre d'observations qui sont deja
3861          ! selectionnees avec les memes parametres 'obsStepIndex' et 'obsLayerIndex'
3862          ! que l'observation consideree ici.
3863          obsAlreadySameStep = .false.
3864          OBSLOOP2: do obsIndex2 = 1, numSelected
3865            headerIndex2 = headerIndexSelected(obsIndex2)
3866            if ( obsStepIndexMpi(headerIndex1) == obsStepIndexMpi(headerIndex2) ) then
3867              if ( (obsLatBurpFileMpi(headerIndex1) == obsLatBurpFileMpi(headerIndex2)) .and. &
3868                   (obsLonBurpFileMpi(headerIndex1) == obsLonBurpFileMpi(headerIndex2)) ) then
3869                ! Si une observation selectionnee porte deja le meme lat, lon, layer et step.
3870                cycle OBSLOOP1
3871              end if
3872              obsAlreadySameStep = .true.
3873              exit OBSLOOP2
3874            end if
3875          end do OBSLOOP2
3876
3877          if ( obsAlreadySameStep ) then
3878            ! Calcule les distances entre la donnee courante et toutes celles choisies 
3879            ! precedemment.
3880            skipThisObs = .false.
3881            OBSLOOP3: do obsIndex2 = 1, numSelected
3882              headerIndex2 = headerIndexSelected(obsIndex2)
3883              if ( abs( obsStepIndexMpi(headerIndex1) - &
3884                        obsStepIndexMpi(headerIndex2) ) < deltemps ) then
3885                deltaLat = abs( obsLatBurpFileMpi(headerIndex1) - &
3886                                obsLatBurpFileMpi(headerIndex2) ) / 100.
3887                deltaLon = abs( obsLonBurpFileMpi(headerIndex1) - &
3888                                obsLonBurpFileMpi(headerIndex2) ) / 100.
3889                if(deltaLon > 180.) deltaLon = 360. - deltaLon
3890                obsLat1 = ((obsLatBurpFileMpi(headerIndex1) - 9000)/100.)
3891                obsLat2 = ((obsLatBurpFileMpi(headerIndex2) - 9000)/100.)
3892                if ( thn_distanceArc(deltaLat,deltaLon,obsLat1,obsLat2) < thinDistance ) then
3893                  skipThisObs = .true.
3894                  exit OBSLOOP3
3895                end if
3896              end if
3897            end do OBSLOOP3
3898
3899            if ( .not. skipThisObs ) then
3900
3901              ! On selectionne la donnee si toutes celles choisies sont au-dela
3902              ! de thinDistance. Cet evaluation est faite dan la boucle
3903              ! 'check_list' precedante.
3904              numSelected = numSelected + 1
3905              headerIndexSelected(numSelected) = headerIndex1
3906
3907            end if
3908
3909          else
3910
3911            ! On selectionne la donnee s'il y en a aucune choisie dans les intervalles 
3912            ! layer et step.
3913            numSelected = numSelected + 1
3914            headerIndexSelected(numSelected) = headerIndex1
3915
3916          end if
3917
3918        end do OBSLOOP1
3919
3920        do obsIndex1 = 1, numSelected
3921          validMpi(headerIndexSelected(obsIndex1)) = .true.
3922        end do
3923      
3924      end do LAYERLOOP
3925    end do STNIDLOOP
3926
3927    ! communicate values of validMpi computed on each mpi task
3928    nsize = numHeaderMaxMpi * mmpi_nprocs
3929    call rpn_comm_allReduce(validMpi, validMpi2, nsize, 'mpi_logical', &
3930                            'mpi_lor','grid',ierr)
3931
3932    ! Update local copy of valid from global mpi version
3933    headerIndexBeg = 1 + mmpi_myid * numHeaderMaxMpi
3934    headerIndexEnd = headerIndexBeg + numHeaderMaxMpi - 1
3935    valid(:) = validMpi2(headerIndexBeg:headerIndexEnd)
3936    
3937    countObs = count(valid)
3938    call rpn_comm_allReduce(countObs, countObsOutMpi, 1, 'mpi_integer', &
3939                            'mpi_sum','grid',ierr)
3940    write(*,*) 'thn_satWindsByDistance: number of obs after thinning = ', &
3941               countObs, countObsOutMpi
3942
3943    ! modify the obs flags and count number of obs kept for each stnId
3944    call obs_set_current_header_list(obsdat,trim(familyType))
3945    HEADER3: do
3946      headerIndex = obs_getHeaderIndex(obsdat)
3947      if (headerIndex < 0) exit HEADER3
3948
3949      ! do not keep this obs: set bit 11 and jump to the next obs
3950      if (.not. valid(headerIndex)) then
3951        call obs_set_current_body_list(obsdat, headerIndex)
3952        BODY3: do 
3953          bodyIndex = obs_getBodyIndex(obsdat)
3954          if (bodyIndex < 0) exit BODY3
3955          obsFlag = obs_bodyElem_i(obsdat, OBS_FLG, bodyIndex)
3956          call obs_bodySet_i(obsdat, OBS_FLG, bodyIndex, ibset(obsFlag,11))
3957        end do BODY3
3958        cycle HEADER3
3959      end if
3960
3961      stnId = obs_elem_c(obsdat,'STID',headerIndex)
3962      stnIdIndexFound = nullValue
3963      do stnIdIndex = 1, numStnId
3964        if (stnidList(stnIdIndex) == stnId) stnIdIndexFound = stnIdIndex
3965      end do
3966      if (stnIdIndexFound == nullValue) call utl_abort('stnid not found in list')
3967      numObsStnIdOut(stnIdIndexFound) = numObsStnIdOut(stnIdIndexFound) + 1
3968    end do HEADER3
3969
3970    call rpn_comm_allReduce(numObsStnIdOut, numObsStnIdOutMpi, &
3971                            numStnIdMax, 'mpi_integer', 'mpi_sum', 'grid', ierr)
3972    call rpn_comm_allReduce(bgckCount, bgckCountMpi, 1, &
3973                            'mpi_integer', 'mpi_sum', 'grid', ierr)
3974    call rpn_comm_allReduce(missingCount, missingCountMpi, 1, &
3975                            'mpi_integer', 'mpi_sum', 'grid', ierr)
3976
3977    ! Print counts
3978    write(*,*)
3979    write(*,'(a30, i10)') ' Number of obs in  = ', countObsInMpi
3980    write(*,'(a30, i10)') ' Total number of reject = ', countObsInMpi - countObsOutMpi
3981    write(*,'(a30, i10)') ' Number of obs out = ', countObsOutMpi
3982    write(*,*)
3983    write(*,'(a30,4i10)') ' Number of rejects from bgck, thinned, missing obs ', &
3984         bgckCountMpi, &
3985         countObsInMpi - countObsOutMpi - bgckCountMpi - missingCountMpi, &
3986         missingCountMpi
3987    write(*,*)
3988    write(*,'(a30,i10)') 'Number of satellites found = ',numStnId
3989    write(*,*)
3990
3991    write(*,'(a30,2a15)') 'Satellite', 'nb AMVs in'
3992    write(*,*)
3993    do stnIdIndex = 1, numStnId
3994      write(*,'(a30,2i15)') stnidList(stnIdIndex), numObsStnIdInMpi(stnIdIndex)
3995    end do
3996    write(*,*)
3997    write(*,'(a30,2i10,f10.4)') 'Total number of obs in : ',sum(numObsStnIdInMpi)
3998
3999    write(*,*)
4000    write(*,'(a30,2a15)') 'Satellite', 'nb AMVs out'
4001    write(*,*)
4002    do stnIdIndex = 1, numStnId
4003      write(*,'(a30,2i15)') stnidList(stnIdIndex), numObsStnIdOutMpi(stnIdIndex)
4004    end do
4005    write(*,*)
4006    write(*,'(a30,2i10,f10.4)') 'Total number of obs out : ',sum(numObsStnIdOutMpi)
4007
4008    ! Deallocations:
4009    deallocate(valid)
4010    deallocate(quality)
4011    deallocate(obsLatBurpFile)
4012    deallocate(obsLonBurpFile)
4013    deallocate(obsStepIndex)
4014    deallocate(obsLayerIndex)
4015    deallocate(obsMethod)
4016    deallocate(stnIdInt)
4017    deallocate(validMpi)
4018    deallocate(validMpi2)
4019    deallocate(qualityMpi)
4020    deallocate(obsLatBurpFileMpi)
4021    deallocate(obsLonBurpFileMpi)
4022    deallocate(obsStepIndexMpi)
4023    deallocate(obsLayerIndexMpi)
4024    deallocate(obsMethodMpi)
4025    deallocate(stnIdIntMpi)
4026    deallocate(headerIndexSorted)
4027    deallocate(headerIndexSelected)
4028
4029    write(*,*)
4030    write(*,*) 'thn_satWindsByDistance: Finished'
4031    write(*,*)
4032
4033  end subroutine thn_satWindsByDistance
4034
4035  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
4036  ! thn_QsortIntIgnoringNullValues
4037  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
4038  subroutine thn_QsortIntIgnoringNullValues(A,B,nullValue)
4039    !:Purpose: Quick sort algorithm for integer data
4040    !           Calling 'thn_QsortInt' on array without missing values (-1)
4041    !           The 'QuickSort' algorithm gives different results
4042    !           depending on the size of the input array.  The same
4043    !           values won't be put in the same order if null values
4044    !           are inserted in the array.  So this routine filters
4045    !           the input array and asks for 'thn_QsortInt' to sort
4046    !           the filtered array and then insert back the values to
4047    !           respect the order of the original input array.
4048
4049    implicit none
4050
4051    ! Arguments:
4052    integer, intent(inout) :: A(:)
4053    integer, intent(inout) :: B(:)
4054    integer, intent(in)    :: nullValue
4055
4056    ! Locals:
4057    integer :: numSelected, indexSelected, index
4058    integer, allocatable :: buffer(:), indices(:)
4059
4060    ! Compute the number of non-null values in array 'A'
4061    indexSelected = 0
4062    do index = 1, size(A)
4063      if ( A(index) /= nullValue ) then
4064        indexSelected = indexSelected + 1
4065      end if
4066    end do
4067    numSelected = indexSelected
4068
4069    ! Allocate temporary arrays
4070    allocate(buffer(numSelected))
4071    allocate(indices(numSelected))
4072
4073    ! Initialize the temporary arrays
4074    indexSelected = 0
4075    do index = 1, size(A)
4076      if ( A(index) /= nullValue ) then
4077        indexSelected = indexSelected + 1
4078        buffer(indexSelected) = A(index)
4079        ! keep the index of the value in the original array
4080        indices(indexSelected) = index
4081      end if
4082    end do
4083
4084    call thn_QsortInt(buffer,indices)
4085
4086    ! Populate again the array 'A' with the data from 'buffer'
4087    ! Populate again the array 'B' with the data from 'indices'
4088    indexSelected = 0
4089    do index = 1, size(A)
4090      if ( A(index) /= nullValue ) then
4091        indexSelected = indexSelected + 1
4092        A(index) = buffer(indexSelected)
4093        B(index) = indices(indexSelected)
4094      else
4095        B(index) = index
4096      end if
4097    end do
4098
4099    deallocate(buffer)
4100    deallocate(indices)
4101
4102  end subroutine thn_QsortIntIgnoringNullValues
4103
4104  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
4105  ! thn_QsortInt
4106  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
4107  recursive subroutine thn_QsortInt(A,B)
4108    !:Purpose: Quick sort algorithm for integer data.
4109
4110    implicit none
4111
4112    integer, intent(inout) :: A(:)
4113    integer, intent(inout) :: B(:)
4114    integer :: iq
4115
4116    if (size(A) > 1) then
4117      call thn_QsortIntpartition(A,B,iq)
4118      call thn_QsortInt(A(:iq-1),B(:iq-1))
4119      call thn_QsortInt(A(iq:),B(iq:))
4120    end if
4121
4122  end subroutine thn_QsortInt
4123
4124  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
4125  ! thn_QsortIntpartition
4126  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
4127  subroutine thn_QsortIntpartition(A,B,marker)
4128    !:Purpose: Subroutine called in quick sort for integers.
4129
4130    implicit none
4131
4132    ! Arguments:
4133    integer, intent(inout) :: A(:)
4134    integer, intent(inout) :: B(:)
4135    integer, intent(out)   :: marker
4136
4137    ! Locals:
4138    integer :: i, j, tmpi
4139    integer :: temp
4140    integer :: x      ! pivot point
4141
4142    x = A(1)
4143    i= 0
4144    j= size(A) + 1
4145
4146    do
4147      j = j-1
4148      do
4149        if (A(j) <= x) exit
4150        j = j-1
4151      end do
4152      i = i+1
4153      do
4154        if (A(i) >= x) exit
4155        i = i+1
4156      end do
4157      if (i < j) then
4158        ! exchange A(i) and A(j)
4159        temp = A(i)
4160        A(i) = A(j)
4161        A(j) = temp
4162        tmpi = B(i)
4163        B(i) = B(j)
4164        B(j) = tmpi
4165      else if (i == j) then
4166        marker = i+1
4167        return
4168      else
4169        marker = i
4170        return
4171      end if
4172    end do
4173
4174  end subroutine thn_QsortIntpartition
4175
4176  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
4177  ! thn_QsortReal8
4178  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
4179  recursive subroutine thn_QsortReal8(A,B)
4180    !:Purpose: Quick sort algorithm for real8 data.
4181
4182    implicit none
4183
4184    ! Arguments:
4185    real(8), intent(inout) :: A(:)
4186    integer, intent(inout) :: B(:)
4187
4188    ! Locals:
4189    integer :: iq
4190
4191    if (size(A) > 1) then
4192      call thn_QsortReal8partition(A,B,iq)
4193      call thn_QsortReal8(A(:iq-1),B(:iq-1))
4194      call thn_QsortReal8(A(iq:),B(iq:))
4195    end if
4196
4197  end subroutine thn_QsortReal8
4198
4199  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
4200  ! thn_QsortReal8partition
4201  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
4202  subroutine thn_QsortReal8partition(A,B,marker)
4203    !:Purpose: Subroutine called for quick sort of real8 data.
4204
4205    implicit none
4206
4207    ! Arguments:
4208    real(8), intent(inout) :: A(:)
4209    integer, intent(inout) :: B(:)
4210    integer, intent(out) :: marker
4211
4212    ! Locals:
4213    integer :: i, j, tmpi
4214    real(8) :: temp
4215    real(8) :: x      ! pivot point
4216
4217    x = A(1)
4218    i= 0
4219    j= size(A) + 1
4220
4221    do
4222      j = j-1
4223      do
4224        if (A(j) <= x) exit
4225        j = j-1
4226      end do
4227      i = i+1
4228      do
4229        if (A(i) >= x) exit
4230        i = i+1
4231      end do
4232      if (i < j) then
4233        ! exchange A(i) and A(j)
4234        temp = A(i)
4235        A(i) = A(j)
4236        A(j) = temp
4237        tmpi = B(i)
4238        B(i) = B(j)
4239        B(j) = tmpi
4240      else if (i == j) then
4241        marker = i+1
4242        return
4243      else
4244        marker = i
4245        return
4246      end if
4247    end do
4248
4249  end subroutine thn_QsortReal8partition
4250
4251  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
4252  ! thn_distanceArc
4253  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
4254  real(4) function thn_distanceArc( deltaLat, deltaLon, lat1, lat2 )
4255    !:Purpose: Compute arc distance.
4256
4257    implicit none
4258
4259    ! Arguments:
4260    real(4), intent(in) :: deltaLat, deltaLon, lat1, lat2
4261
4262    ! Local parameters:
4263    real(4), parameter :: PI = 3.141592654
4264    real(4), parameter :: RT = 6374.893
4265
4266    ! Locals:
4267    real(4) :: lat1_r, lat2_r, deltaLat_r, deltaLon_r, term_a
4268
4269    lat1_r = lat1*PI/180.
4270    lat2_r = lat2*PI/180.
4271    deltaLat_r = deltaLat*PI/180.
4272    deltaLon_r = deltaLon*PI/180.
4273
4274    term_a  = sin(deltaLat_r/2)*sin(deltaLat_r/2) +  &
4275              cos(lat1_r)*cos(lat2_r)*sin(deltaLon_r/2)*sin(deltaLon_r/2)
4276    if(term_a < 0.0) term_a = 0.0
4277    if(term_a > 1.0) term_a = 1.0
4278
4279    thn_distanceArc = 2*RT*asin(sqrt(term_a))
4280
4281  end function thn_distanceArc
4282
4283  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
4284  ! thn_aircraftByBoxes
4285  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
4286  subroutine thn_aircraftByBoxes(obsdat, familyType, deltmax)
4287    !
4288    !:Purpose: Original method for thinning aircraft data by lat-lon boxes.
4289    !           Set bit 11 of OBS_FLG on observations that are to be rejected.
4290    !
4291    implicit none
4292
4293    ! Arguments:
4294    type(struct_obs), intent(inout) :: obsdat
4295    character(len=*), intent(in)    :: familyType
4296    integer,          intent(in)    :: deltmax
4297
4298    ! Locals:
4299    character(len=4), allocatable :: varNamesPsfc(:)
4300    character(len=20) :: trlmFileName
4301    character(len=2)  :: fileNumber
4302    type(struct_hco), pointer :: hco_thinning
4303    type(struct_vco), pointer :: vco_sfc
4304    type(struct_gsv)          :: stateVectorPsfc
4305    integer :: numLon, numLat, nsize, headerIndexBeg, headerIndexEnd
4306    integer :: nulnam, ierr, lonIndex, latIndex, levIndex, stepIndex, codtyp
4307    integer :: obsLonIndex, obsLatIndex, obsLevIndex, obsStepIndex
4308    integer :: numHeader, numHeaderMaxMpi, headerIndex, bodyIndex
4309    integer :: aiTypeCount(4), aiTypeCountMpi(4)
4310    integer :: obsFlag, obsVarno, obsDate, obsTime, countObs, countObsMpi
4311    logical :: ttMissing, huMissing, uuMissing, vvMissing, ddMissing, ffMissing
4312    real(8) :: zpresa, zpresb, obsPressure, delMinutes, obsStepIndex_r8
4313    real(8) :: obsLonInRad, obsLatInRad, obsLonInDegrees, obsLatInDegrees
4314    real(8) :: deltaLon, deltaLat, deltaPress, midDistance, score
4315    real(4), allocatable :: gridLat(:), gridLon(:)
4316    integer, allocatable :: rejectCount(:), rejectCountMpi(:)
4317    real(8), allocatable :: gridPressure(:,:,:,:)
4318    real(8), pointer     :: surfPressure(:,:,:,:)
4319    logical, allocatable :: valid(:), validMpi(:), isAircraft(:)
4320    integer, allocatable :: obsLatIndexVec(:), obsLonIndexVec(:)
4321    integer, allocatable :: obsTimeIndexVec(:), obsLevIndexVec(:)
4322    integer, allocatable :: obsLatIndexMpi(:), obsLonIndexMpi(:)
4323    integer, allocatable :: obsTimeIndexMpi(:), obsLevIndexMpi(:)
4324    logical, allocatable :: obsUVPresent(:), obsTTPresent(:)
4325    logical, allocatable :: obsUVPresentMpi(:), obsTTPresentMpi(:)
4326    real(4), allocatable :: obsDistance(:), obsUU(:), obsVV(:), obsTT(:)
4327    real(4), allocatable :: obsDistanceMpi(:), obsUUMpi(:), obsVVMpi(:), obsTTMpi(:)
4328    integer, allocatable :: handlesGrid(:,:,:), numObsGrid(:,:,:)
4329    real(4), allocatable :: minScoreGrid(:,:,:), minDistGrid(:,:,:), maxDistGrid(:,:,:)
4330    real(4), allocatable :: uuSumGrid(:,:,:), vvSumGrid(:,:,:), ttSumGrid(:,:,:)
4331
4332    integer, external :: fnom, fclos
4333
4334    ! Local parameters:
4335    integer, parameter :: maxLev = 500
4336
4337    ! Namelist variables:
4338    real(8) :: rprefinc      ! parameter for defining fixed set of model levels for vertical thinning
4339    real(8) :: rptopinc      ! parameter for defining fixed set of model levels for vertical thinning
4340    real(8) :: rcoefinc      ! parameter for defining fixed set of model levels for vertical thinning
4341    real(4) :: vlev(maxLev)  ! parameter for defining fixed set of model levels for vertical thinning
4342    integer :: numlev        ! MUST NOT BE INCLUDED IN NAMELIST!
4343    namelist /namgem/rprefinc, rptopinc, rcoefinc, numlev, vlev
4344
4345    write(*,*)
4346    write(*,*) 'thn_aircraftByBoxes: Starting'
4347    write(*,*)
4348
4349    numHeader = obs_numHeader(obsdat)
4350    call rpn_comm_allReduce(numHeader, numHeaderMaxMpi, 1, 'mpi_integer', &
4351                            'mpi_max','grid',ierr)
4352
4353    allocate(valid(numHeaderMaxMpi))
4354    allocate(isAircraft(numHeaderMaxMpi))
4355    valid(:) = .false.
4356    aiTypeCount(:) = 0
4357
4358    call obs_set_current_header_list(obsdat,trim(familyType))
4359    HEADER0: do
4360      headerIndex = obs_getHeaderIndex(obsdat)
4361      if (headerIndex < 0) exit HEADER0
4362
4363      ! check observation type
4364      codtyp = obs_headElem_i(obsdat, OBS_ITY, headerIndex)
4365      if ( codtyp == codtyp_get_codtyp('airep') ) then
4366        aiTypeCount(1) = aiTypeCount(1) + 1
4367        valid(headerIndex) = .true.
4368      else if ( codtyp == codtyp_get_codtyp('amdar')  ) then
4369        aiTypeCount(2) = aiTypeCount(2) + 1
4370        valid(headerIndex) = .true.
4371      else if ( codtyp == codtyp_get_codtyp('acars') ) then
4372        aiTypeCount(3) = aiTypeCount(3) + 1
4373        valid(headerIndex) = .true.
4374      else if ( codtyp == codtyp_get_codtyp('ads') ) then
4375        aiTypeCount(4) = aiTypeCount(4) + 1
4376        valid(headerIndex) = .true.
4377      end if
4378    end do HEADER0
4379    isAircraft(:) = valid(:)
4380
4381    ! Return if no aircraft obs to thin
4382    allocate(validMpi(numHeaderMaxMpi*mmpi_nprocs))
4383    nsize = numHeaderMaxMpi
4384    call rpn_comm_allgather(valid,    nsize, 'mpi_logical',  &
4385                            validMpi, nsize, 'mpi_logical', 'grid', ierr)
4386    if (count(validMpi(:)) == 0) then
4387      write(*,*) 'thn_aircraftByBoxes: no aircraft observations present'
4388      return
4389    end if
4390
4391    write(*,*) 'thn_aircraftByBoxes: numHeader, numHeaderMaxMpi = ', &
4392         numHeader, numHeaderMaxMpi
4393
4394    countObs = count(valid(:))
4395    call rpn_comm_allReduce(countObs, countObsMpi, 1, 'mpi_integer', &
4396                            'mpi_sum','grid',ierr)
4397    write(*,*) 'thn_aircraftByBoxes: number of obs initial = ', countObs, countObsMpi
4398
4399    ! Setup horizontal thinning grid
4400    nullify(hco_thinning)
4401    call hco_SetupFromFile(hco_thinning, './analysisgrid_thinning_ai', &
4402                           'ANALYSIS', 'Analysis')
4403
4404    ! Default namelist values
4405    numlev = MPC_missingValue_INT
4406    vlev(:) = -1
4407    rprefinc = 0.0d0
4408    rptopinc = 0.0d0
4409    rcoefinc = 0.0d0
4410    ! Read the namelist defining the vertical levels
4411    if (utl_isNamelistPresent('namgem','./flnml')) then
4412      nulnam = 0
4413      ierr = fnom(nulnam,'./flnml','FTN+SEQ+R/O',0)
4414      if (ierr /= 0) call utl_abort('thn_aircraftByBoxes: Error opening file flnml')
4415      read(nulnam,nml=namgem,iostat=ierr)
4416      if (ierr /= 0) call utl_abort('thn_aircraftByBoxes: Error reading namgem namelist')
4417      if (mmpi_myid == 0) write(*,nml=namgem)
4418      ierr = fclos(nulnam)
4419      if (numlev /= MPC_missingValue_INT) then
4420        call utl_abort('thn_aircraftByBoxes: check NAMGEM namelist section: numlev should be removed')
4421      end if
4422      numlev = 0
4423      do levIndex = 1, maxLev
4424        if (vlev(levIndex) == -1) exit
4425        numlev = numlev + 1
4426      end do
4427    else
4428      call utl_abort('thn_aircraftByBoxes: Namelist block namgem is missing in the namelist.')
4429    end if
4430
4431    ! Setup thinning grid parameters
4432    numLon = hco_thinning%ni
4433    numLat = hco_thinning%nj
4434    allocate(gridLat(numLat))
4435    allocate(gridLon(numLon))
4436    gridLon(:) = hco_thinning%lon(:) * MPC_DEGREES_PER_RADIAN_R8
4437    gridLat(:) = hco_thinning%lat(:) * MPC_DEGREES_PER_RADIAN_R8
4438    write(*,*) 'thinning grid vlev = '
4439    write(*,*) vlev(1:numLev)
4440
4441    ! Allocate vectors
4442    allocate(rejectCount(tim_nstepObs))
4443    allocate(obsLatIndexVec(numHeaderMaxMpi))
4444    allocate(obsLonIndexVec(numHeaderMaxMpi))
4445    allocate(obsLevIndexVec(numHeaderMaxMpi))
4446    allocate(obsTimeIndexVec(numHeaderMaxMpi))
4447    allocate(obsDistance(numHeaderMaxMpi))
4448    allocate(obsUU(numHeaderMaxMpi))
4449    allocate(obsVV(numHeaderMaxMpi))
4450    allocate(obsTT(numHeaderMaxMpi))
4451    allocate(obsUVPresent(numHeaderMaxMpi))
4452    allocate(obsTTPresent(numHeaderMaxMpi))
4453
4454    ! Allocate mpi global vectors
4455    allocate(rejectCountMpi(tim_nstepObs))
4456    allocate(obsLatIndexMpi(numHeaderMaxMpi*mmpi_nprocs))
4457    allocate(obsLonIndexMpi(numHeaderMaxMpi*mmpi_nprocs))
4458    allocate(obsLevIndexMpi(numHeaderMaxMpi*mmpi_nprocs))
4459    allocate(obsTimeIndexMpi(numHeaderMaxMpi*mmpi_nprocs))
4460    allocate(obsDistanceMpi(numHeaderMaxMpi*mmpi_nprocs))
4461    allocate(obsUUMpi(numHeaderMaxMpi*mmpi_nprocs))
4462    allocate(obsVVMpi(numHeaderMaxMpi*mmpi_nprocs))
4463    allocate(obsTTMpi(numHeaderMaxMpi*mmpi_nprocs))
4464    allocate(obsUVPresentMpi(numHeaderMaxMpi*mmpi_nprocs))
4465    allocate(obsTTPresentMpi(numHeaderMaxMpi*mmpi_nprocs))
4466
4467    ! Initialize vectors
4468    rejectCount(:) = 0
4469    obsLatIndexVec(:) = 0
4470    obsLonIndexVec(:) = 0
4471    obsLevIndexVec(:) = 0
4472    obsTimeIndexVec(:) = 0
4473    obsDistance(:) = 0.
4474    obsUU(:) = 0.
4475    obsVV(:) = 0.
4476    obsTT(:) = 0.
4477    obsUVPresent(:) = .true.
4478    obsTTPresent(:) = .true.
4479
4480    ! Read and interpolate the trial surface pressure
4481    nullify(vco_sfc)
4482    trlmFileName = './trlm_01'
4483    call vco_setupFromFile(vco_sfc, trlmFileName)
4484    if (vco_sfc%Vcode == 5100) then
4485      allocate(varNamesPsfc(2))
4486      varNamesPsfc = (/'P0','P0LS'/)
4487    else
4488      allocate(varNamesPsfc(1))
4489      varNamesPsfc = (/'P0'/)
4490    end if
4491    call gsv_allocate( stateVectorPsfc, tim_nstepobs, hco_thinning, vco_sfc, &
4492                       datestamp_opt=tim_getDatestamp(), mpi_local_opt=.false., &
4493                       varNames_opt=varNamesPsfc, hInterpolateDegree_opt='LINEAR' )
4494    deallocate(varNamesPsfc)
4495    do stepIndex = 1, tim_nstepobs
4496      write(fileNumber,'(I2.2)') stepIndex
4497      trlmFileName = './trlm_' // trim(fileNumber)
4498      call gio_readFromFile( stateVectorPsfc, trlmFileName, ' ', ' ',  &
4499                             stepIndex_opt=stepIndex, containsFullField_opt=.true. )
4500    end do
4501
4502    ! compute pressure of each model level using p0
4503    allocate(gridPressure(numLon,numLat,numLev,tim_nstepobs))
4504    gridPressure(:,:,:,:) = -1.0
4505    call gsv_getField(stateVectorPsfc,surfPressure)
4506    do stepIndex = 1, tim_nstepobs
4507      do levIndex  = 1, numLev
4508        zpresb = ( (vlev(levIndex) - rptopinc/rprefinc) /  &
4509                   (1.0D0-rptopinc/rprefinc) )**rcoefinc
4510        zpresa = rprefinc * (vlev(levIndex)-zpresb)
4511        do latIndex = 1, numLat
4512          do lonIndex = 1, numLon
4513            gridPressure(lonIndex,latIndex,levIndex,stepIndex) =  &
4514                 zpresa + zpresb*surfPressure(lonIndex,latIndex,1,stepIndex)
4515          end do
4516        end do
4517      end do
4518    end do
4519    call gsv_deallocate(stateVectorPsfc)
4520
4521    call obs_set_current_header_list(obsdat,trim(familyType))
4522    HEADER1: do
4523      headerIndex = obs_getHeaderIndex(obsdat)
4524      if (headerIndex < 0) exit HEADER1
4525
4526      ! find time difference
4527      obsDate = obs_headElem_i(obsdat, OBS_DAT, headerIndex)
4528      obsTime = obs_headElem_i(obsdat, OBS_ETM, headerIndex)
4529      call tim_getStepObsIndex(obsStepIndex_r8, tim_getDatestamp(), &
4530                               obsDate, obsTime, tim_nstepobs)
4531      obsStepIndex = nint(obsStepIndex_r8)
4532      delMinutes = abs(nint(60.0 * tim_dstepobs * abs(real(obsStepIndex) - obsStepIndex_r8)))
4533
4534      ! check time window
4535      if ( delMinutes > deltmax ) then
4536        valid(headerIndex) = .false.
4537        rejectCount(obsStepIndex) = rejectCount(obsStepIndex) + 1
4538      end if
4539
4540      ! Only accept obs below 175hPa
4541      obsPressure = -1.0d0
4542      call obs_set_current_body_list(obsdat, headerIndex)
4543      BODY: do 
4544        bodyIndex = obs_getBodyIndex(obsdat)
4545        if (bodyIndex < 0) exit BODY
4546        
4547        if (obsPressure < 0.0d0) then
4548          obsPressure = obs_bodyElem_r(obsdat, OBS_PPP, bodyIndex)
4549          if ( obsPressure < 17500.0 .or. obsPressure > 110000.0 ) valid(headerIndex) = .false.
4550        end if
4551      end do BODY
4552
4553      ttMissing = .true.
4554      huMissing = .true.
4555      uuMissing = .true.
4556      vvMissing = .true.
4557      ddMissing = .true.
4558      ffMissing = .true.      
4559      call obs_set_current_body_list(obsdat, headerIndex)
4560      BODY2: do 
4561        bodyIndex = obs_getBodyIndex(obsdat)
4562        if (bodyIndex < 0) exit BODY2
4563        
4564        obsFlag  = obs_bodyElem_i(obsdat, OBS_FLG, bodyIndex)
4565        obsVarno = obs_bodyElem_i(obsdat, OBS_VNM, bodyIndex)
4566
4567        ! find number of elements availables
4568        if (obsVarno == BUFR_NETT) then
4569          if ( .not. (btest(obsFlag,18) .or. btest(obsFlag,16) .or. &
4570                      btest(obsFlag,9)  .or. btest(obsFlag,8)  .or. &
4571                      btest(obsFlag,2)) ) then
4572            ttMissing = .false.
4573            obsTT(headerIndex) = obs_bodyElem_r(obsdat, OBS_VAR, bodyIndex)
4574          end if
4575        else if (obsVarno == BUFR_NEES) then
4576          if ( .not. (btest(obsFlag,18) .or. btest(obsFlag,16) .or. &
4577                      btest(obsFlag,9)  .or. btest(obsFlag,8)  .or. &
4578                      btest(obsFlag,2)) ) huMissing = .false.
4579        else if (obsVarno == BUFR_NEUU) then
4580          if ( .not. (btest(obsFlag,18) .or. btest(obsFlag,16) .or. &
4581                      btest(obsFlag,9)  .or. btest(obsFlag,8)  .or. &
4582                      btest(obsFlag,2)) ) then
4583            uuMissing = .false.
4584            obsUU(headerIndex) = obs_bodyElem_r(obsdat, OBS_VAR, bodyIndex)
4585          end if
4586        else if (obsVarno == BUFR_NEVV) then
4587          if ( .not. (btest(obsFlag,18) .or. btest(obsFlag,16) .or. &
4588                      btest(obsFlag,9)  .or. btest(obsFlag,8)  .or. &
4589                      btest(obsFlag,2)) ) then
4590            vvMissing = .false.
4591            obsVV(headerIndex) = obs_bodyElem_r(obsdat, OBS_VAR, bodyIndex)
4592          end if
4593        else if (obsVarno == BUFR_NEDD) then
4594          if ( .not. (btest(obsFlag,18) .or. btest(obsFlag,16) .or. &
4595                      btest(obsFlag,9)  .or. btest(obsFlag,8)  .or. &
4596                      btest(obsFlag,2)) ) ddMissing = .false.
4597        else if (obsVarno == BUFR_NEFF) then
4598          if ( .not. (btest(obsFlag,18) .or. btest(obsFlag,16) .or. &
4599                      btest(obsFlag,9)  .or. btest(obsFlag,8)  .or. &
4600                      btest(obsFlag,2)) ) ffMissing = .false.
4601        end if
4602
4603      end do BODY2
4604
4605      ! wind components are rejected if speed or direction 
4606      if (ddMissing .or. ffMissing) then
4607        uuMissing = .true.
4608        vvMissing = .true.
4609      end if
4610
4611      ! eliminate records with nothing to assimilate
4612      if (ttMissing .and. huMissing .and. uuMissing .and. vvMissing) then
4613        rejectCount(obsStepIndex) = rejectCount(obsStepIndex) + 1
4614        valid(headerIndex) = .false.
4615      end if
4616
4617      if( uuMissing .or. vvMissing ) obsUVPresent(headerIndex) = .false.
4618      if( ttMissing )                obsTTPresent(headerIndex) = .false.
4619
4620      ! Lat and Lon for each observation
4621      obsLonInRad = obs_headElem_r(obsdat, OBS_LON, headerIndex)
4622      obsLatInRad = obs_headElem_r(obsdat, OBS_LAT, headerIndex)
4623      obsLonInDegrees = MPC_DEGREES_PER_RADIAN_R8 * obsLonInRad
4624      obsLatInDegrees = MPC_DEGREES_PER_RADIAN_R8 * obsLatInRad
4625
4626      ! latitude index
4627      deltaLat = abs(gridLat(1) - obsLatInDegrees)
4628      obsLatIndex = 1
4629      do latIndex = 2, numLat
4630        if (abs(gridLat(latIndex) - obsLatInDegrees) < deltaLat) then
4631          deltaLat = abs(gridLat(latIndex) - obsLatInDegrees)
4632          obsLatIndex = latIndex
4633        end if
4634      end do
4635
4636      ! longitude index
4637      deltaLon = abs(gridLon(1) - obsLonInDegrees)
4638      obsLonIndex = 1
4639      do lonIndex = 2, numLon
4640        if ( abs(gridLon(lonIndex) - obsLonInDegrees) < deltaLon ) then
4641          deltaLon = abs(gridLon(lonIndex) - obsLonInDegrees)
4642          obsLonIndex = lonIndex
4643        end if
4644      end do
4645
4646      ! layer index
4647      deltaPress = abs(gridPressure(obsLonIndex,obsLatIndex,1,obsStepIndex) - obsPressure)
4648      obsLevIndex = 1
4649      do levIndex = 2, numLev
4650        if ( abs(gridPressure(obsLonIndex,obsLatIndex,levIndex,obsStepIndex) - obsPressure) < &
4651             deltaPress ) then
4652          deltaPress = abs( gridPressure(obsLonIndex,obsLatIndex,levIndex,obsStepIndex) - &
4653                            obsPressure )
4654          obsLevIndex = levIndex
4655        end if
4656      end do
4657
4658      obsLatIndexVec(headerIndex) = obsLatIndex
4659      obsLonIndexVec(headerIndex) = obsLonIndex
4660      obsLevIndexVec(headerIndex) = obsLevIndex
4661      obsTimeIndexVec(headerIndex) = obsStepIndex
4662      obsDistance(headerIndex) = sqrt((deltaLon*3)**2 + (deltaLat*3)**2 + (deltaPress/100.0)**2)
4663
4664    end do HEADER1
4665
4666    call rpn_comm_allReduce(aiTypeCount, aiTypeCountMpi, 4, 'mpi_integer', &
4667                            'mpi_sum','grid',ierr)
4668    call rpn_comm_allReduce(rejectCount, rejectCountMpi, tim_nstepObs, 'mpi_integer', &
4669                            'mpi_sum','grid',ierr)
4670
4671    write(*,*)
4672    write(*,'(a50,i10)') ' Total number of obs = ', sum(aiTypeCountMpi(:))
4673    write(*,*)
4674    do stepIndex = 1, tim_nstepobs
4675      write(*,'(a50,2i10)')' Number of rejects for bin = ', stepIndex, rejectCountMpi(stepIndex)
4676    end do
4677    write(*,'(a50,i10)')' Total number of rejects = ', sum(rejectCountMpi)
4678    write(*,*)
4679    write(*,'(a50,i10)') '====nb AIREP = ', aiTypeCountMpi(1)
4680    write(*,'(a50,i10)') '====nb AMDAR = ', aiTypeCountMpi(2)
4681    write(*,'(a50,i10)') '====nb ACARS = ', aiTypeCountMpi(3)
4682    write(*,'(a50,i10)') '====nb ADS = ',   aiTypeCountMpi(4)
4683    write(*,*)
4684
4685    allocate(handlesGrid(numLat,numLon,numLev))
4686    allocate(minScoreGrid(numLat,numLon,numLev))
4687    allocate(minDistGrid(numLat,numLon,numLev))
4688    allocate(maxDistGrid(numLat,numLon,numLev))
4689    allocate(numObsGrid(numLat,numLon,numLev))
4690    allocate(uuSumGrid(numLat,numLon,numLev))
4691    allocate(vvSumGrid(numLat,numLon,numLev))
4692    allocate(ttSumGrid(numLat,numLon,numLev))
4693
4694    ! Make all inputs to the following tests mpiglobal
4695    nsize = numHeaderMaxMpi
4696    call rpn_comm_allgather(valid,    nsize, 'mpi_logical',  &
4697                            validMpi, nsize, 'mpi_logical', 'grid', ierr)
4698    call rpn_comm_allgather(obsLatIndexVec, nsize, 'mpi_integer',  &
4699                            obsLatIndexMpi, nsize, 'mpi_integer', 'grid', ierr)
4700    call rpn_comm_allgather(obsLonIndexVec, nsize, 'mpi_integer',  &
4701                            obsLonIndexMpi, nsize, 'mpi_integer', 'grid', ierr)
4702    call rpn_comm_allgather(obsLevIndexVec, nsize, 'mpi_integer',  &
4703                            obsLevIndexMpi, nsize, 'mpi_integer', 'grid', ierr)
4704    call rpn_comm_allgather(obsTimeIndexVec,nsize, 'mpi_integer',  &
4705                            obsTimeIndexMpi,nsize, 'mpi_integer', 'grid', ierr)
4706    call rpn_comm_allgather(obsDistance,    nsize, 'mpi_real4',  &
4707                            obsDistanceMpi, nsize, 'mpi_real4', 'grid', ierr)
4708    call rpn_comm_allgather(obsUU,    nsize, 'mpi_real4',  &
4709                            obsUUMpi, nsize, 'mpi_real4', 'grid', ierr)
4710    call rpn_comm_allgather(obsVV,    nsize, 'mpi_real4',  &
4711                            obsVVMpi, nsize, 'mpi_real4', 'grid', ierr)
4712    call rpn_comm_allgather(obsTT,    nsize, 'mpi_real4',  &
4713                            obsTTMpi, nsize, 'mpi_real4', 'grid', ierr)
4714    call rpn_comm_allgather(obsUVPresent,    nsize, 'mpi_logical',  &
4715                            obsUVPresentMpi, nsize, 'mpi_logical', 'grid', ierr)
4716    call rpn_comm_allgather(obsTTPresent,    nsize, 'mpi_logical',  &
4717                            obsTTPresentMpi, nsize, 'mpi_logical', 'grid', ierr)
4718
4719    STEP: do stepIndex = 1, tim_nstepobs
4720      handlesGrid(:,:,:) = -1
4721      minScoreGrid(:,:,:) = 1000000.
4722      minDistGrid(:,:,:) = 1000000.
4723      maxDistGrid(:,:,:) = 0.
4724      numObsGrid(:,:,:) = 0 
4725      uuSumGrid(:,:,:) = 0. 
4726      vvSumGrid(:,:,:) = 0. 
4727      ttSumGrid(:,:,:) = 0. 
4728
4729      ! Calcul des distances min et max du centre la boite des rapports 
4730      ! contenus dans les boites
4731      do headerIndex = 1, numHeaderMaxMpi*mmpi_nprocs
4732        if( .not. validMpi(headerIndex) ) cycle
4733        if( obsTimeIndexMpi(headerIndex) /= stepIndex ) cycle
4734        latIndex = obsLatIndexMpi(headerIndex)
4735        lonIndex = obsLonIndexMpi(headerIndex)
4736        levIndex = obsLevIndexMpi(headerIndex)
4737        if ( obsDistanceMpi(headerIndex) < minDistGrid(latIndex,lonIndex,levIndex) ) then
4738          minDistGrid(latIndex,lonIndex,levIndex) = obsDistanceMpi(headerIndex)
4739        end if
4740        if ( obsDistanceMpi(headerIndex) > maxDistGrid(latIndex,lonIndex,levIndex) ) then
4741          maxDistGrid(latIndex,lonIndex,levIndex) = obsDistanceMpi(headerIndex)
4742        end if
4743      end do
4744
4745      ! Calcul des sommes de u, v et t des observations situees a une distance midDistance
4746      ! du centre de la boite
4747      do headerIndex = 1, numHeaderMaxMpi*mmpi_nprocs
4748        if( .not. validMpi(headerIndex) ) cycle
4749        if( obsTimeIndexMpi(headerIndex) /= stepIndex ) cycle
4750        latIndex = obsLatIndexMpi(headerIndex)
4751        lonIndex = obsLonIndexMpi(headerIndex)
4752        levIndex = obsLevIndexMpi(headerIndex)
4753        midDistance = ( minDistGrid(latIndex,lonIndex,levIndex) + &
4754                        maxDistGrid(latIndex,lonIndex,levIndex) )/2.
4755        if ( (obsDistanceMpi(headerIndex) < midDistance) .and. &
4756             obsTTPresentMpi(headerIndex) .and. &
4757             obsUVPresentMpi(headerIndex) ) then
4758          numObsGrid(latIndex,lonIndex,levIndex) =  &
4759               numObsGrid(latIndex,lonIndex,levIndex) + 1
4760          uuSumGrid(latIndex,lonIndex,levIndex) =  &
4761               uuSumGrid(latIndex,lonIndex,levIndex) + obsUUMpi(headerIndex)
4762          vvSumGrid(latIndex,lonIndex,levIndex) =  &
4763               vvSumGrid(latIndex,lonIndex,levIndex) + obsVVMpi(headerIndex)
4764          ttSumGrid(latIndex,lonIndex,levIndex) =  &
4765               ttSumGrid(latIndex,lonIndex,levIndex) + obsTTMpi(headerIndex)
4766        end if
4767      end do
4768
4769      ! Calcul la moyenne de u, v et t s'il y a plus de 3 rapports dans la boite
4770      do latIndex = 1, numLat
4771        do lonIndex = 1, numLon
4772          do levIndex = 1, numLev
4773            if(numObsGrid(latIndex,lonIndex,levIndex) >= 3) then
4774              uuSumGrid(latIndex,lonIndex,levIndex) =  &
4775                   uuSumGrid(latIndex,lonIndex,levIndex)/numObsGrid(latIndex,lonIndex,levIndex)
4776              vvSumGrid(latIndex,lonIndex,levIndex) =  &
4777                   vvSumGrid(latIndex,lonIndex,levIndex)/numObsGrid(latIndex,lonIndex,levIndex)
4778              ttSumGrid(latIndex,lonIndex,levIndex) =  &
4779                   ttSumGrid(latIndex,lonIndex,levIndex)/numObsGrid(latIndex,lonIndex,levIndex)
4780            end if
4781          end do
4782        end do
4783      end do
4784
4785      ! S'il y a plus de 3 rapports dans la boite, le rapport dont le score est le plus
4786      ! petit est retenu. S'il y a 2 rapports ou moins, le rapport le plus pres du centre
4787      ! de la boite est retenu.
4788      do headerIndex = 1, numHeaderMaxMpi*mmpi_nprocs
4789        if( .not. validMpi(headerIndex) ) cycle
4790        if( obsTimeIndexMpi(headerIndex) /= stepIndex ) cycle
4791        latIndex = obsLatIndexMpi(headerIndex)
4792        lonIndex = obsLonIndexMpi(headerIndex)
4793        levIndex = obsLevIndexMpi(headerIndex)
4794
4795        if(numObsGrid(latIndex,lonIndex,levIndex) >= 3) then
4796
4797          midDistance = ( minDistGrid(latIndex,lonIndex,levIndex) + &
4798                          maxDistGrid(latIndex,lonIndex,levIndex) )/2.
4799          if ((obsDistanceMpi(headerIndex) < midDistance) .and. &
4800               obsTTPresentMpi(headerIndex) .and. &
4801               obsUVPresentMpi(headerIndex) ) then
4802            score = sqrt( (uuSumGrid(latIndex,lonIndex,levIndex) - &
4803                           obsUUMpi(headerIndex))**2/(1.4**2) +   &
4804                          (vvSumGrid(latIndex,lonIndex,levIndex) - &
4805                           obsVVMpi(headerIndex))**2/(1.4**2) ) + &
4806                    (ttSumGrid(latIndex,lonIndex,levIndex) - &
4807                     obsTTMpi(headerIndex))**2/(0.9**2)
4808
4809            if ( handlesGrid(latIndex,lonIndex,levIndex) /= -1 ) then
4810              if ( score >= minScoreGrid(latIndex,lonIndex,levIndex) ) then
4811                validMpi(headerIndex) = .false.
4812              end if
4813            end if
4814          
4815            if ( validMpi(headerIndex) ) then
4816              if ( handlesGrid(latIndex,lonIndex,levIndex) /= -1 ) then
4817                validMpi(handlesGrid(latIndex,lonIndex,levIndex)) = .false.
4818              end if
4819              minScoreGrid(latIndex,lonIndex,levIndex) = score
4820              validMpi(headerIndex) = .true.
4821              handlesGrid(latIndex,lonIndex,levIndex) = headerIndex
4822            end if
4823
4824          else
4825            validMpi(headerIndex) = .false.
4826          end if
4827
4828        else ! if(numObsGrid(latIndex,lonIndex,levIndex) < 3)
4829
4830          if ( handlesGrid(latIndex,lonIndex,levIndex) /= -1 ) then
4831            if ( obsDistanceMpi(headerIndex) > minDistGrid(latIndex,lonIndex,levIndex) ) then
4832              validMpi(headerIndex) = .false.
4833            end if
4834          end if
4835
4836          if ( validMpi(headerIndex) ) then
4837            if ( handlesGrid(latIndex,lonIndex,levIndex) /= -1 ) then
4838              validMpi(handlesGrid(latIndex,lonIndex,levIndex)) = .false.
4839            end if
4840            validMpi(headerIndex) = .true.
4841            handlesGrid(latIndex,lonIndex,levIndex) = headerIndex
4842          end if
4843
4844        end if
4845
4846      end do ! headerIndex
4847
4848    end do  STEP
4849
4850    ! Update local copy of valid from global mpi version
4851    headerIndexBeg = 1 + mmpi_myid * numHeaderMaxMpi
4852    headerIndexEnd = headerIndexBeg + numHeaderMaxMpi - 1
4853    valid(:) = validMpi(headerIndexBeg:headerIndexEnd)
4854
4855    deallocate(handlesGrid)
4856    deallocate(minScoreGrid)
4857    deallocate(minDistGrid)
4858    deallocate(maxDistGrid)
4859    deallocate(numObsGrid)
4860    deallocate(uuSumGrid)
4861    deallocate(vvSumGrid)
4862    deallocate(ttSumGrid)
4863
4864    write(*,*)
4865    write(*,'(a50,i10)') ' Number of obs in  = ', sum(aiTypeCountMpi(:))
4866    write(*,'(a50,i10)') ' Number of obs out = ', count(validMpi(:))
4867    write(*,'(a50,i10)') ' Number of obs not out = ', &
4868         sum(aiTypeCountMpi(:)) - count(validMpi(:))
4869    write(*,*)
4870
4871    ! Modify the flags for rejected observations
4872    do headerIndex = 1, numHeader
4873      ! skip observation if we're not supposed to consider it
4874      if (.not. isAirCraft(headerIndex)) cycle
4875     
4876      if (.not. valid(headerIndex)) then
4877        call obs_set_current_body_list(obsdat, headerIndex)
4878        BODY3: do 
4879          bodyIndex = obs_getBodyIndex(obsdat)
4880          if (bodyIndex < 0) exit BODY3
4881        
4882          obsFlag = obs_bodyElem_i(obsdat, OBS_FLG, bodyIndex)
4883          call obs_bodySet_i(obsdat, OBS_FLG, bodyIndex, ibset(obsFlag,11))
4884
4885        end do BODY3
4886      end if
4887    end do
4888
4889    ! Deallocation
4890    deallocate(valid)
4891    deallocate(isAircraft)
4892    deallocate(validMpi)
4893    deallocate(gridLat)
4894    deallocate(gridLon)
4895    deallocate(rejectCount)
4896    deallocate(obsLatIndexVec)
4897    deallocate(obsLonIndexVec)
4898    deallocate(obsLevIndexVec)
4899    deallocate(obsTimeIndexVec)
4900    deallocate(obsDistance)
4901    deallocate(obsUU)
4902    deallocate(obsVV)
4903    deallocate(obsTT)
4904    deallocate(obsUVPresent)
4905    deallocate(obsTTPresent)
4906    deallocate(rejectCountMpi)
4907    deallocate(obsLatIndexMpi)
4908    deallocate(obsLonIndexMpi)
4909    deallocate(obsLevIndexMpi)
4910    deallocate(obsTimeIndexMpi)
4911    deallocate(obsDistanceMpi)
4912    deallocate(obsUUMpi)
4913    deallocate(obsVVMpi)
4914    deallocate(obsTTMpi)
4915    deallocate(obsUVPresentMpi)
4916    deallocate(obsTTPresentMpi)
4917    deallocate(gridPressure)
4918
4919    write(*,*)
4920    write(*,*) 'thn_aircraftByBoxes: Finished'
4921    write(*,*)
4922
4923  end subroutine thn_aircraftByBoxes
4924
4925  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
4926  ! thn_keepNthObs
4927  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
4928  subroutine thn_keepNthObs(obsdat, familyType, keepNthVertical)
4929    !:Purpose: Of the observations in a column that have not already been
4930    !           rejected, keep every nth observation and throw out the rest.
4931    !           Set bit 11 of OBS_FLG on observations that are to be rejected.
4932
4933    implicit none
4934
4935    ! Arguments:
4936    type(struct_obs), intent(inout) :: obsdat
4937    character(len=*), intent(in) :: familyType
4938    integer,          intent(in) :: keepNthVertical
4939
4940    ! Local parameters:
4941    integer, parameter :: PROFILE_NOT_FOUND=-1
4942
4943    ! Locals:
4944    integer :: headerIndex, bodyIndex
4945    integer :: flag
4946    integer :: countKeepN ! count to keep every Nth observation in the column
4947    integer :: newProfileId
4948
4949    write(*,*)
4950    write(*,*) 'thn_keepNthObs: Starting'
4951    write(*,*)
4952
4953    countKeepN=0
4954
4955    ! Loop over all body indices (columns) of the family of interest and
4956    ! thin each column independently of the others
4957    call obs_set_current_body_list(obsdat, familyType)
4958    BODY: do 
4959      bodyIndex = obs_getBodyIndex(obsdat)
4960      if (bodyIndex < 0) exit BODY
4961
4962      ! If datum already rejected, ignore it
4963      flag = obs_bodyElem_i(obsdat, OBS_FLG, bodyIndex)
4964      if ( btest(flag,9) .or. &
4965           btest(flag,11) ) cycle BODY
4966
4967      headerIndex  = obs_bodyElem_i(obsdat, OBS_HIND, bodyIndex  )
4968      newProfileId = obs_headElem_i(obsdat, OBS_PRFL, headerIndex)
4969
4970      countKeepN=countKeepN + 1
4971      if ( countKeepN == keepNthVertical .or. &
4972           new_column() ) then
4973        ! Reset the counter and keep this observation
4974        countKeepN=0
4975      else
4976        ! Reject this observation
4977        call obs_bodySet_i(obsdat, OBS_FLG, bodyIndex, ibset(flag,11))
4978      end if
4979
4980    end do BODY
4981
4982    write(*,*)
4983    write(*,*) 'thn_keepNthObs: Finished'
4984    write(*,*)
4985
4986  contains
4987    function new_column()
4988      !:Purpose: Determine whether the current observation begins a new vertical column
4989      !           (Assume that observations are in chronological order)
4990      !
4991      !:Note:  This method has been written with aladin observations in mind.
4992      !         It might be necessary to generalize the method.
4993      implicit none
4994
4995      ! Locals:
4996      logical :: new_column
4997
4998      integer, save :: previousProfileId=huge(previousProfileId)
4999
5000      if (newProfileId == PROFILE_NOT_FOUND) then
5001        ! The profile ID for this element is missing.
5002        ! Assume that it is the same as the previous element
5003        newProfileId = previousProfileId
5004      end if
5005
5006      if (newProfileId /= previousProfileId) then
5007        previousProfileId = newProfileId
5008        new_column=.true.
5009      else
5010        new_column=.false.
5011      end if
5012    end function new_column
5013
5014  end subroutine thn_keepNthObs
5015
5016  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
5017  ! thn_tovsFilt
5018  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
5019  subroutine thn_tovsFilt(obsdat, delta, deltrad, codtyp, codtyp2_opt)
5020    !:Purpose: Thinning algorithm used for AMSU and ATMS radiance obs.
5021    !           Set bit 11 of OBS_FLG on observations that are to be rejected.
5022
5023    implicit none
5024
5025    ! Arguments:
5026    type(struct_obs), intent(inout) :: obsdat
5027    integer, intent(in)             :: delta
5028    integer, intent(in)             :: deltrad
5029    integer, intent(in)             :: codtyp
5030    integer, optional, intent(in)   :: codtyp2_opt
5031
5032    ! Locals:
5033    integer :: numLat, numLon, headerIndex, headerIndexKeep, latIndex, lonIndex, latIndex2
5034    integer :: gridIndex, numGridLonsTotal, obsTime, obsDate, numHeader, numHeaderMaxMpi, ierr
5035    integer :: bodyIndex, stepIndex, obsIndex, obsFov
5036    integer :: loscan, hiscan, obsFlag, numObs, minLonBurpFileMpi(mmpi_nprocs)
5037    integer :: procIndex, procIndexKeep, minLonBurpFile, countObs, countObsMpi
5038    integer :: countQc, countKept, countOther, countKeptMpi, countQcMpi, countGridPoints
5039    real(4) :: obsLatInRad, obsLonInRad, obsLat, obsLon, distance
5040    real(4) :: obsLatInDegrees, obsLonInDegrees, minDistance, minDistanceMpi(mmpi_nprocs)
5041    real(4) :: rejectRate, gridLat, gridLon
5042    real(4) :: percentTotal, percentQc, percentOther, percentKept
5043    real(8), allocatable :: stepObsIndex(:)
5044    real(4), allocatable :: gridLats(:), gridLatsAll(:), gridLonsAll(:), obsDistance(:)
5045    logical, allocatable :: valid(:)
5046    integer, allocatable :: numGridLons(:), numObsGrid(:), obsGridIndex(:)
5047    integer, allocatable :: obsLonBurpFile(:), obsLatBurpFile(:), numObsAssim(:)
5048    integer, allocatable :: headerIndexList(:), headerIndexList2(:)
5049    integer, allocatable :: obsIndexGrid(:), obsIndexLink(:)
5050    character(len=codtyp_name_length) :: instrumName
5051
5052    ! Local parameters:
5053    integer, parameter :: latLength=10000
5054    integer, parameter :: lonLength=40000
5055    integer, parameter :: mxscanamsua=30
5056    integer, parameter :: mxscanamsub=90
5057    integer, parameter :: mxscanatms =96
5058    integer, parameter :: mxscanmwhs2=98
5059    integer, parameter :: mxscanssmis=90
5060
5061    instrumName = codtyp_get_name(codtyp)
5062    write(*,*)
5063    write(*,*) 'thn_tovsFilt: Starting, ', trim(instrumName)
5064    write(*,*)
5065
5066    numHeader = obs_numHeader(obsdat)
5067    call rpn_comm_allReduce(numHeader, numHeaderMaxMpi, 1, 'mpi_integer', &
5068                            'mpi_max','grid',ierr)
5069
5070    ! Check if we have any observations to process
5071    allocate(valid(numHeaderMaxMpi))
5072    valid(:) = .false.
5073    do headerIndex = 1, numHeader
5074      if (obs_headElem_i(obsdat, OBS_ITY, headerIndex) == codtyp) then
5075        valid(headerIndex) = .true.
5076      else if (present(codtyp2_opt)) then
5077        if (obs_headElem_i(obsdat, OBS_ITY, headerIndex) == codtyp2_opt) then
5078          valid(headerIndex) = .true.
5079        end if
5080      end if
5081    end do
5082
5083    countObs = count(valid(:))
5084    call rpn_comm_allReduce(countObs, countObsMpi, 1, 'mpi_integer', &
5085                            'mpi_sum','grid',ierr)
5086    if (countObsMpi == 0) then
5087      write(*,*) 'thn_tovsFilt: no observations for this instrument'
5088      deallocate(valid)
5089      return
5090    end if
5091
5092    write(*,*) 'thn_tovsFilt: countObs initial                        = ', &
5093               countObs, countObsMpi
5094
5095    ! Remove RARS obs that are also present from a global originating centre
5096    call thn_removeRarsDuplicates(obsdat, valid)
5097
5098    countObs = count(valid(:))
5099    call rpn_comm_allReduce(countObs, countObsMpi, 1, 'mpi_integer', &
5100                            'mpi_sum','grid',ierr)
5101    write(*,*) 'thn_tovsFilt: countObs after thn_removeRarsDuplicates = ', &
5102               countObs, countObsMpi
5103
5104    numLat = 2*latLength/delta
5105    numLon = lonLength/delta
5106
5107    ! Allocations
5108    allocate(gridLats(numLat))
5109    allocate(gridLatsAll(numLat*numLon))
5110    allocate(gridLonsAll(numLat*numLon))
5111    allocate(numObsGrid(numLat*numLon))
5112    allocate(obsIndexGrid(numLat*numLon))
5113    allocate(obsIndexLink(numHeader))
5114    allocate(headerIndexList(numHeader))
5115    allocate(headerIndexList2(numHeader))
5116    allocate(numGridLons(numLat))
5117    allocate(obsGridIndex(numHeader))
5118    allocate(obsLonBurpFile(numHeader))
5119    allocate(obsLatBurpFile(numHeader))
5120    allocate(numObsAssim(numHeader))
5121    allocate(obsDistance(numHeader))
5122    allocate(stepObsIndex(numHeader))
5123
5124    ! Initialize arrays
5125    gridLats(:) = 0.0
5126    gridLatsAll(:) = 0.0
5127    gridLonsAll(:) = 0.0
5128    obsDistance(:) = 0.0
5129    numObsGrid(:) = 0
5130    obsIndexGrid(:) = 0
5131    obsIndexLink(:) = 0
5132    headerIndexList(:) = 0
5133    headerIndexList2(:) = 0
5134    numGridLons(:) = 0
5135    obsGridIndex(:) = 0
5136    obsLonBurpFile(:) = 0
5137    obsLatBurpFile(:) = 0
5138    numObsAssim(:) = 0
5139    stepObsIndex(:) = 0.0d0
5140
5141    ! Set up the grid used for thinning
5142    numGridLonsTotal = 0
5143    do latIndex = 1, numLat
5144      gridLats(latIndex)    = (latIndex*180./numLat) - 90.
5145      distance              = lonLength * cos(gridLats(latIndex) * mpc_pi_r4 / 180.)
5146      numGridLons(latIndex) = nint(distance/delta)
5147      numGridLons(latIndex) = max(numGridLons(latIndex),1)
5148      numGridLonsTotal      = numGridLonsTotal + numGridLons(latIndex)
5149    end do
5150
5151    gridIndex = 0
5152    do latIndex = 1, numLat
5153      do lonIndex = 1, numGridLons(latIndex)
5154        gridLatsAll(gridIndex+lonIndex) = gridLats(latIndex)
5155        gridLonsAll(gridIndex+lonIndex) = (lonIndex-1) * 360. / numGridLons(latIndex)
5156      end do
5157      gridIndex = gridIndex + numGridLons(latIndex)
5158    end do
5159
5160    ! Loop over all observation locations
5161    do headerIndex = 1, numHeader
5162      if ( .not. valid(headerIndex) ) cycle
5163
5164      ! Lat and Lon for each observation
5165      obsLonInRad = obs_headElem_r(obsdat, OBS_LON, headerIndex)
5166      obsLatInRad = obs_headElem_r(obsdat, OBS_LAT, headerIndex)
5167
5168      obsLonInDegrees = MPC_DEGREES_PER_RADIAN_R8 * obsLonInRad
5169      obsLatInDegrees = MPC_DEGREES_PER_RADIAN_R8 * obsLatInRad
5170      obsLonBurpFile(headerIndex) = nint(100.0*(obsLonInDegrees - 180.0))
5171      if(obsLonBurpFile(headerIndex) < 0) then
5172        obsLonBurpFile(headerIndex) = obsLonBurpFile(headerIndex) + 36000
5173      end if
5174      obsLatBurpFile(headerIndex) = 9000+nint(100.0*obsLatInDegrees)
5175
5176      obsDate = obs_headElem_i(obsdat, OBS_DAT, headerIndex)
5177      obsTime = obs_headElem_i(obsdat, OBS_ETM, headerIndex)
5178      call tim_getStepObsIndex(stepObsIndex(headerIndex), tim_getDatestamp(), &
5179                               obsDate, obsTime, tim_nstepobs)
5180
5181      ! Associate each observation to a grid point
5182      obsLat = (obsLatBurpFile(headerIndex) - 9000.) / 100.
5183      obsLon = obsLonBurpFile(headerIndex) / 100.
5184      do latIndex = 1, numLat-1
5185        if (obsLat <  gridLats(1))      obsLat = gridLats(1)
5186        if (obsLat >= gridLats(numLat)) obsLat = gridLats(numLat) - 0.5
5187        if (obsLat >= gridLats(latIndex) .and. obsLat < gridLats(latIndex+1)) then
5188          gridIndex = 1
5189          do latIndex2 = 1, latIndex-1
5190            gridIndex = gridIndex + numGridLons(latIndex2)
5191          end do
5192          gridIndex = gridIndex + ifix(obsLon/(360./numGridLons(latIndex)))
5193          exit
5194        end if
5195      end do
5196      obsGridIndex(headerIndex) = gridIndex
5197      numObsGrid(gridIndex) = numObsGrid(gridIndex) + 1
5198
5199    end do ! headerIndex
5200
5201    if      ( codtyp == codtyp_get_codtyp('amsua') ) then
5202      loscan   = 1
5203      hiscan   = mxscanamsua
5204    else if ( codtyp == codtyp_get_codtyp('amsub') ) then
5205      loscan   = 1
5206      hiscan   = mxscanamsub
5207    else if ( codtyp == codtyp_get_codtyp('atms') ) then
5208      loscan   = 2
5209      hiscan   = mxscanatms - 1
5210    else if ( codtyp == codtyp_get_codtyp('mwhs2') ) then
5211      loscan   = 1
5212      hiscan   = mxscanmwhs2
5213    else if ( codtyp == codtyp_get_codtyp('ssmis') ) then
5214      loscan   = 1
5215      hiscan   = mxscanssmis
5216   else
5217      write(*,*) 'codtyp = ', codtyp
5218      call utl_abort('thn_tovsFilt: Invalid codtyp')
5219    end if
5220
5221    countQc = 0
5222    numObsAssim(:) = 0
5223    do headerIndex = 1, numHeader
5224
5225      if ( .not. valid(headerIndex) ) cycle
5226
5227      ! Look at the obs flags
5228      rejectRate = 0.
5229
5230      call obs_set_current_body_list(obsdat, headerIndex)
5231      BODY: do 
5232        bodyIndex = obs_getBodyIndex(obsdat)
5233        if (bodyIndex < 0) exit BODY
5234        
5235        ! If not a blacklisted channel (note that bit 11 is set in 
5236        ! satqc_amsu*.f for blacklisted channels)
5237        obsFlag = obs_bodyElem_i(obsdat, OBS_FLG, bodyIndex)
5238        if ( .not. btest(obsFlag,11) ) then
5239          numObsAssim(headerIndex) = numObsAssim(headerIndex) + 1
5240          if ( btest(obsFlag,9) ) then
5241            rejectRate = rejectRate + 1.0
5242          end if
5243        end if
5244      end do BODY
5245
5246      ! fixer le % de rejets a 100% si aucun canal n'est assimilable         
5247      if ( rejectRate == 0. .and. numObsAssim(headerIndex) == 0 ) then
5248        rejectRate = 1.
5249      else
5250        rejectRate = rejectRate / max(numObsAssim(headerIndex),1)  
5251      end if
5252
5253      obsFov = obs_headElem_i(obsdat, OBS_FOV, headerIndex)
5254      if ( rejectRate >= 0.80 ) then
5255        countQc = countQc + 1
5256        valid(headerIndex) = .false.
5257      else if (obsFov < loscan .or.  &
5258               obsFov > hiscan ) then
5259        countQc = countQc + 1
5260        valid(headerIndex) = .false.
5261      end if
5262
5263    end do
5264
5265    countObs = count(valid(:))
5266    call rpn_comm_allReduce(countObs, countObsMpi, 1, 'mpi_integer', &
5267                            'mpi_sum','grid',ierr)
5268    write(*,*) 'thn_tovsFilt: countObs after QC                       = ', &
5269               countObs, countObsMpi
5270
5271    ! Calculate distance of obs. from center of its grid box center
5272    do headerIndex = 1, numHeader
5273      if ( .not. valid(headerIndex) ) cycle
5274
5275      gridIndex = obsGridIndex(headerIndex)
5276      if (numObsGrid(gridIndex) /= 0) then
5277        latIndex = (gridLatsAll(gridIndex)+90.)/(180./numLat)
5278        gridLat = gridLatsAll(gridIndex) + 0.5*(180./numLat)
5279        gridLon = gridLonsAll(gridIndex) + 0.5*360./numGridLons(latIndex)
5280        obsLat = (obsLatBurpFile(headerIndex) - 9000.) / 100.
5281        obsLon = obsLonBurpFile(headerIndex) / 100.
5282        obsDistance(headerIndex) = thn_separation(obsLon,obsLat,gridLon,gridLat) * &
5283             float(latLength) / 90.
5284      end if
5285    end do
5286
5287    ! Create a linked list of observations (link to grid point)
5288    obsIndexGrid(:) = 0
5289    obsIndexLink(:) = 0
5290    countObs = 0
5291    do headerIndex = 1, numHeader
5292      if ( .not. valid(headerIndex) ) cycle
5293
5294      gridIndex = obsGridIndex(headerIndex)
5295      if (numObsGrid(gridIndex) /= 0) then
5296        countObs = countObs + 1
5297        headerIndexList(countObs) = headerIndex
5298        obsIndexLink(countObs) = obsIndexGrid(gridIndex)
5299        obsIndexGrid(gridIndex) = countObs
5300      end if
5301    end do
5302
5303    ! Loop over stepObs
5304    do stepIndex = 1, tim_nstepobs
5305
5306      ! Loop over all grid points
5307      countGridPoints = 0
5308      do gridIndex = 1, numGridLonsTotal
5309        if (numObsGrid(gridIndex) /= 0) then
5310          countGridPoints = countGridPoints + 1
5311        end if
5312        numObs = 0
5313        obsIndex = obsIndexGrid(gridIndex)
5314        do
5315          if (obsIndex == 0) exit
5316          headerIndex = headerIndexList(obsIndex)
5317          if ( obsGridIndex(headerIndex) == gridIndex  .and. &
5318               valid(headerIndex)               .and. &
5319               nint(stepObsIndex(headerIndex)) == stepIndex ) then
5320            numObs = numObs + 1
5321            headerIndexList2(numObs) = headerIndex
5322          end if
5323
5324          obsIndex = obsIndexLink(obsIndex)
5325        end do
5326
5327        minDistance = 1000000.             
5328
5329        ! Choose the obs closest to the grid point
5330        do obsIndex = 1, numObs
5331          if (obsDistance(headerIndexList2(obsIndex)) < minDistance) then
5332            minDistance = obsDistance(headerIndexList2(obsIndex))
5333            minLonBurpFile = obsLonBurpFile(headerIndexList2(obsIndex))
5334            headerIndexKeep = headerIndexList2(obsIndex)
5335          end if
5336        end do
5337
5338        ! Check for multiple obs with same distance to grid point
5339        if (numObs > 0) then
5340          if ( count(obsDistance(headerIndexList2(1:numObs)) == minDistance) > 1 ) then
5341            ! resolve ambiguity by choosing obs with min value of lon
5342            minLonBurpFile = 10000000
5343            do obsIndex = 1, numObs
5344              if (obsDistance(headerIndexList2(obsIndex)) == minDistance) then
5345                if (obsLonBurpFile(headerIndexList2(obsIndex)) < minLonBurpFile) then
5346                  minLonBurpFile = obsLonBurpFile(headerIndexList2(obsIndex))
5347                  headerIndexKeep = headerIndexList2(obsIndex)
5348                end if
5349              end if
5350            end do
5351          end if
5352        end if
5353
5354        do obsIndex = 1, numObs
5355          valid(headerIndexList2(obsIndex)) = .false.
5356        end do
5357        if (numObs > 0 .and. minDistance <= real(deltRad) ) then
5358          valid(headerIndexKeep) = .true.
5359        end if
5360
5361        ! Communicate the distance of chosen observation among all mpi tasks
5362        call rpn_comm_allgather(minDistance,    1, 'mpi_real4',  &
5363                                minDistanceMpi, 1, 'mpi_real4', 'grid', ierr)
5364
5365        ! Choose the closest to the center of the box among all mpi tasks
5366        minDistance = 1000000.
5367        do procIndex = 1, mmpi_nprocs
5368          if (minDistanceMpi(procIndex) < minDistance) then
5369            minDistance = minDistanceMpi(procIndex)
5370            procIndexKeep = procIndex
5371          end if
5372        end do
5373
5374        ! Adjust flags to only keep 1 observation among all mpi tasks
5375        if (minDistance < 1000000.) then
5376          if ( count(minDistanceMpi(:) == minDistance) > 1 ) then
5377            ! resolve ambiguity by choosing obs with min value of lon
5378            call rpn_comm_allgather(minLonBurpFile,    1, 'mpi_integer',  &
5379                                    minLonBurpFileMpi, 1, 'mpi_integer', 'grid', ierr)
5380            minLonBurpFile = 10000000
5381            do procIndex = 1, mmpi_nprocs
5382              if (minDistanceMpi(procIndex) == minDistance) then
5383                if (minLonBurpFileMpi(procIndex) < minLonBurpFile) then
5384                  minLonBurpFile = minLonBurpFileMpi(procIndex)
5385                  procIndexKeep = procIndex
5386                end if
5387              end if
5388            end do            
5389          end if
5390          if (numObs > 0) then
5391            if (mmpi_myid /= (procIndexKeep-1)) then
5392              valid(headerIndexKeep) = .false.
5393            end if
5394          end if
5395        end if
5396
5397      end do ! gridIndex
5398    end do ! stepIndex
5399
5400    countObs = count(valid(:))
5401    call rpn_comm_allReduce(countObs, countObsMpi, 1, 'mpi_integer', &
5402                            'mpi_sum','grid',ierr)
5403    write(*,*) 'thn_tovsFilt: countObs after thinning                 = ', &
5404               countObs, countObsMpi
5405
5406    ! modify the observation flags in obsSpaceData
5407    countObs = 0
5408    do headerIndex = 1, numHeader
5409      ! skip observation if we're not supposed to consider it
5410      if (obs_headElem_i(obsdat, OBS_ITY, headerIndex) /= codtyp) then
5411        if (present(codtyp2_opt)) then
5412          if (obs_headElem_i(obsdat, OBS_ITY, headerIndex) /= codtyp2_opt) then
5413            cycle
5414          end if
5415        else
5416          cycle
5417        end if
5418      end if
5419     
5420      countObs = countObs + 1
5421
5422      if (.not. valid(headerIndex)) then
5423        call obs_set_current_body_list(obsdat, headerIndex)
5424        BODY2: do 
5425          bodyIndex = obs_getBodyIndex(obsdat)
5426          if (bodyIndex < 0) exit BODY2
5427        
5428          obsFlag = obs_bodyElem_i(obsdat, OBS_FLG, bodyIndex)
5429          call obs_bodySet_i(obsdat, OBS_FLG, bodyIndex, ibset(obsFlag,11))
5430
5431        end do BODY2
5432      end if
5433    end do
5434
5435    ! print a summary to the listing
5436    countKept = count(valid)
5437    call rpn_comm_allReduce(countKept, countKeptMpi, 1, 'mpi_integer', &
5438                            'mpi_sum','grid',ierr)
5439    call rpn_comm_allReduce(countQc,   countQcMpi,   1, 'mpi_integer', &
5440                            'mpi_sum','grid',ierr)
5441    call rpn_comm_allReduce(countObs, countObsMpi, 1, 'mpi_integer', &
5442                            'mpi_sum','grid',ierr)
5443
5444    countOther = countObsMpi - countKeptMpi - countQcMpi
5445
5446    percentTotal = 100.0
5447    percentQc    = (float(countQcMpi)   / float(countObsMpi)) * 100.0
5448    percentOther = (float(countOther)   / float(countObsMpi)) * 100.0
5449    percentKept  = (float(countKeptMpi) / float(countObsMpi)) * 100.0
5450         
5451    write(*,100)
5452100 format(/,' SOMMAIRE DES RESULTATS',/)
5453    write(*,200) countObsMpi, percentTotal, countQcMpi, percentQc, &
5454                 countOther, percentOther, countKeptMpi, percentKept, &
5455                 delta, numGridLonsTotal, countGridPoints
5456200 format(' NB.STNS TOTAL AU DEBUT EN ENTREE        =    ',I7, &
5457           '  =  ',F6.1,'%',/, &
5458           ' NB.STNS REJETEES AU CONTROLE QUALITATIF =  - ',I7, &
5459           '  =  ',F6.1,'%',/, &
5460           ' NB.STNS REJETEES POUR LES AUTRES RAISONS=  - ',I7, &
5461           '  =  ',F6.1,'%',/, &
5462           '                                              ', &
5463           '-------- = -------',/, &
5464           ' NB.STNS GARDEES A LA FIN                =    ',I7, &
5465           '  =  ',F6.1,'%',/////, &
5466           ' NB.PTS GRILLE AVEC LA RESOLUTION ',I5,' KM   =    ', &
5467           I7,/, &
5468           ' NB.PTS GRILLE TRAITES                       =    ',I7)
5469
5470    ! end of sommair
5471
5472    deallocate(valid)
5473    deallocate(gridLats)
5474    deallocate(gridLatsAll)
5475    deallocate(gridLonsAll)
5476    deallocate(numObsGrid)
5477    deallocate(obsIndexGrid)
5478    deallocate(obsIndexLink)
5479    deallocate(headerIndexList)
5480    deallocate(headerIndexList2)
5481    deallocate(numGridLons)
5482    deallocate(obsGridIndex)
5483    deallocate(obsLonBurpFile)
5484    deallocate(obsLatBurpFile)
5485    deallocate(numObsAssim)
5486    deallocate(obsDistance)
5487    deallocate(stepObsIndex)
5488
5489    write(*,*)
5490    write(*,*) 'thn_tovsFilt: Finished'
5491    write(*,*)
5492
5493  end subroutine thn_tovsFilt
5494
5495  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
5496  ! thn_removeRarsDuplicates
5497  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
5498  subroutine thn_removeRarsDuplicates(obsdat, valid)
5499    !:Purpose: Remove duplicate TOVS observations due to RARS.
5500
5501    implicit none
5502
5503    ! Arguments:
5504    type(struct_obs), intent(inout) :: obsdat
5505    logical,          intent(inout) :: valid(:)
5506
5507    ! Locals:
5508    integer :: nsize, ierr, lenStnId, headerIndex, headerIndex1, headerIndex2
5509    integer :: numHeader, numHeaderMaxMpi, charIndex, headerIndexBeg, headerIndexEnd
5510    integer :: obsDate, obsTime
5511    real(4) :: obsLatInRad, obsLonInRad
5512    real(8) :: dlhours
5513    logical :: global1, global2
5514    integer, allocatable :: centreOrig(:), centreOrigMpi(:)
5515    integer, allocatable :: obsFov(:), obsFovMpi(:)
5516    integer, allocatable :: obsDateStamp(:), obsDateStampMpi(:)
5517    integer, allocatable :: stnIdInt(:,:), stnIdIntMpi(:,:)
5518    logical, allocatable :: validMpi(:)
5519    character(len=12)    :: stnId
5520    
5521    ! Locals related to kdtree2:
5522    type(kdtree2), pointer            :: tree
5523    integer, parameter                :: maxNumSearch = 100
5524    integer                           :: numFoundSearch, resultIndex
5525    type(kdtree2_result)              :: searchResults(maxNumSearch)
5526    real(kdkind)                      :: maxRadius = 100.d6
5527    real(kdkind)                      :: refPosition(3)
5528    real(kdkind), allocatable         :: obsPosition3d(:,:)
5529    real(kdkind), allocatable         :: obsPosition3dMpi(:,:)
5530
5531    ! Local parameters:
5532    integer, parameter :: centreOrigGlobal(3)=(/53, 74, 160/)
5533
5534    ! Externals:
5535    integer, external    :: newdate
5536
5537    numHeader = obs_numHeader(obsdat)
5538    call rpn_comm_allReduce(numHeader, numHeaderMaxMpi, 1, 'mpi_integer', &
5539                            'mpi_max','grid',ierr)
5540
5541    ! Allocations
5542    allocate(obsPosition3d(3,numHeaderMaxMpi))
5543    allocate(obsPosition3dMpi(3,numHeaderMaxMpi*mmpi_nprocs))
5544    allocate(centreOrig(numHeaderMaxMpi))
5545    allocate(centreOrigMpi(numHeaderMaxMpi*mmpi_nprocs))
5546    allocate(obsFov(numHeaderMaxMpi))
5547    allocate(obsFovMpi(numHeaderMaxMpi*mmpi_nprocs))
5548    allocate(obsDateStamp(numHeaderMaxMpi))
5549    allocate(obsDateStampMpi(numHeaderMaxMpi*mmpi_nprocs))
5550    allocate(validMpi(numHeaderMaxMpi*mmpi_nprocs))
5551    lenStnId = len(stnId)
5552    allocate(stnIdInt(lenStnId,numHeaderMaxMpi))
5553    allocate(stnIdIntMpi(lenStnId,numHeaderMaxMpi*mmpi_nprocs))
5554
5555    ! Some initializations
5556    centreOrig(:) = 0
5557    obsPosition3d(:,:) = 0.0
5558
5559    ! Loop over all observation locations
5560    do headerIndex = 1, numHeader
5561      if ( .not. valid(headerIndex) ) cycle
5562
5563      ! Originating centre of data
5564      centreOrig(headerIndex) = obs_headElem_i(obsdat, OBS_ORI, headerIndex)
5565
5566      ! Station ID converted to integer array
