5567      stnId = obs_elem_c(obsdat,'STID',headerIndex)
5568      do charIndex = 1, lenStnId
5569        stnIdInt(charIndex,headerIndex) = iachar(stnId(charIndex:charIndex))
5570      end do
5571
5572      ! Date stamp for each observation
5573      obsDate = obs_headElem_i(obsdat, OBS_DAT, headerIndex)
5574      obsTime = obs_headElem_i(obsdat, OBS_ETM, headerIndex)
5575      ierr = newdate(obsDateStamp(headerIndex), obsDate, obsTime*10000+2900, 3)
5576
5577      ! Field of View for each observation
5578      obsFov(headerIndex) = obs_headElem_i(obsdat, OBS_FOV, headerIndex)
5579
5580      ! Lat and Lon for each observation
5581      obsLonInRad = obs_headElem_r(obsdat, OBS_LON, headerIndex)
5582      obsLatInRad = obs_headElem_r(obsdat, OBS_LAT, headerIndex)
5583
5584      ! 3D location array for kdtree
5585      obsPosition3d(1,headerIndex) = ec_ra * sin(obsLonInRad) * cos(obsLatInRad)
5586      obsPosition3d(2,headerIndex) = ec_ra * cos(obsLonInRad) * cos(obsLatInRad)
5587      obsPosition3d(3,headerIndex) = ec_ra *                    sin(obsLatInRad)
5588    end do
5589
5590    nsize = 3 * numHeaderMaxMpi
5591    call rpn_comm_allgather(obsPosition3d,    nsize, 'mpi_real8',  &
5592                            obsPosition3dMpi, nsize, 'mpi_real8', 'grid', ierr)
5593    nsize = numHeaderMaxMpi
5594    call rpn_comm_allgather(valid,    nsize, 'mpi_logical',  &
5595                            validMpi, nsize, 'mpi_logical', 'grid', ierr)
5596    call rpn_comm_allgather(centreOrig,    nsize, 'mpi_integer',  &
5597                            centreOrigMpi, nsize, 'mpi_integer', 'grid', ierr)
5598    call rpn_comm_allgather(obsFov,    nsize, 'mpi_integer',  &
5599                            obsFovMpi, nsize, 'mpi_integer', 'grid', ierr)
5600    call rpn_comm_allgather(obsDateStamp,    nsize, 'mpi_integer',  &
5601                            obsDateStampMpi, nsize, 'mpi_integer', 'grid', ierr)
5602    nsize = lenStnId * numHeaderMaxMpi
5603    call rpn_comm_allgather(stnIdInt,    nsize, 'mpi_integer',  &
5604                            stnIdIntMpi, nsize, 'mpi_integer', 'grid', ierr)
5605    nullify(tree)
5606
5607    tree => kdtree2_create(obsPosition3dMpi, sort=.true., rearrange=.true.)
5608    HEADER1: do headerIndex1 = 1, mmpi_nprocs*numHeaderMaxMpi
5609        
5610      if ( .not. validMpi(headerIndex1) ) cycle HEADER1
5611
5612      ! Find all obs within 10km
5613      refPosition(:) = obsPosition3dMpi(:,headerIndex1)
5614      call kdtree2_r_nearest(tp=tree, qv=refPosition, r2=maxRadius, nfound=numFoundSearch, &
5615                             nalloc=maxNumSearch, results=searchResults)
5616      if (numFoundSearch >= maxNumSearch) then
5617        call utl_abort('thn_tovsFilt: the parameter maxNumSearch must be increased')
5618      end if
5619      if (numFoundSearch == 0) then
5620        call utl_abort('thn_tovsFilt: no match found. This should not happen!!!')
5621      end if
5622
5623      ! Loop over all of these nearby locations
5624      HEADER2: do resultIndex = 1, numFoundSearch
5625        headerIndex2 = searchResults(resultIndex)%idx
5626
5627        if ( .not. validMpi(headerIndex2) ) cycle HEADER2
5628
5629        ! Certaines stations locales nous envoient 
5630        ! le mauvais numero d'orbite. On ne peut donc
5631        ! pas s'y fier.
5632        ! Il faut comparer le temps de la reception des
5633        ! donnees
5634        if ( centreOrigMpi(headerIndex1) /= centreOrigMpi(headerIndex2) ) then
5635          if ( obsFovMpi(headerIndex1) == obsFovMpi(headerIndex2) ) then
5636            if ( all(stnIdIntMpi(:,headerIndex1) ==  stnIdIntMpi(:,headerIndex2)) ) then
5637            
5638              ! Difference (in hours) between obs time
5639              call difdatr(obsDateStampMpi(headerIndex1),obsDateStampMpi(headerIndex2),dlhours)
5640
5641              ! Si la difference est moins de 6 minutes,
5642              ! on peut avoir affaire a un rars
5643
5644              if ( abs(dlhours) <= 0.1 ) then
5645
5646                ! si l'element_i est global, on doit le garder et rejeter l'element_j
5647                global1 = any(centreOrigGlobal(:) == centreOrigMpi(headerIndex1))
5648                if (global1) then 
5649                  validMpi(headerIndex2) = .false.
5650                else
5651                  ! toutefois, ca ne signifie pas que l'element_j est un rars
5652                  ! VERIFIER SI LA STATION 2 EST RARS
5653                  global2 = any(centreOrigGlobal(:) == centreOrigMpi(headerIndex2))
5654
5655                  ! Si l'element_j est global, rejeter l'element_i
5656                  ! Si les 2 elements sont rars, garder le 1er
5657                  if (global2) then 
5658                    validMpi(headerIndex1) = .false.
5659                    cycle HEADER1
5660                  else
5661                    validMpi(headerIndex2) = .false.
5662                  end if
5663                end if
5664
5665              end if ! abs(dlhours) <= 0.1
5666              
5667            end if ! STID1 == STID2
5668          end if ! FOV1 == FOV2
5669        end if ! centreOrig1 /= centreOrig2
5670
5671      end do HEADER2
5672    end do HEADER1
5673    call kdtree2_destroy(tree)
5674
5675    ! update local copy of 'valid' array
5676    headerIndexBeg = 1 + mmpi_myid * numHeaderMaxMpi
5677    headerIndexEnd = headerIndexBeg + numHeaderMaxMpi - 1
5678    valid(:) = validMpi(headerIndexBeg:headerIndexEnd)
5679
5680    deallocate(obsPosition3d)
5681    deallocate(obsPosition3dMpi)
5682    deallocate(centreOrig)
5683    deallocate(centreOrigMpi)
5684    deallocate(obsFov)
5685    deallocate(obsFovMpi)
5686    deallocate(obsDateStamp)
5687    deallocate(obsDateStampMpi)
5688    deallocate(validMpi)
5689    deallocate(stnIdInt)
5690    deallocate(stnIdIntMpi)
5691
5692  end subroutine thn_removeRarsDuplicates
5693
5694  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
5695  ! thn_scatByLatLonBoxes
5696  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
5697  subroutine thn_scatByLatLonBoxes(obsdat, deltax, deltmax)
5698    !:Purpose: Only keep the observation closest to the center of each
5699    !           lat-lon (and time) box for SCAT observations.
5700    !           Set bit 11 of OBS_FLG on observations that are to be rejected.
5701
5702    implicit none
5703
5704    ! Arguments:
5705    type(struct_obs), intent(inout) :: obsdat
5706    integer, intent(in)             :: deltax
5707    integer, intent(in)             :: deltmax
5708
5709    ! Locals parameters:
5710    integer, parameter :: latLength = 10000 ! Earth dimension parameters
5711    integer, parameter :: lonLength = 40000 ! Earth dimension parameters
5712    integer, parameter :: numStnIdMax = 100
5713
5714    ! Locals:
5715    integer :: bodyIndex, charIndex, nsize, lenStnId
5716    integer :: timeRejectCount, flagRejectCount, timeRejectCountMpi, flagRejectCountMpi
5717    integer :: uObsFlag, vObsFlag, obsVarno, stnIdIndex, numStnId, stnIdIndexFound
5718    integer :: numLat, numLon, latIndex, lonIndex, stepIndex, obsFlag
5719    integer :: ierr, headerIndex, numHeader, numHeaderMaxMpi
5720    integer :: headerIndexBeg, headerIndexEnd
5721    integer :: countObs, countObsInMpi, countObsOutMpi
5722    integer :: obsLonBurpFile, obsLatBurpFile, obsDate, obsTime
5723    integer :: numObsStnIdOut(numStnIdMax)
5724    integer :: numObsStnIdInMpi(numStnIdMax), numObsStnIdOutMpi(numStnIdMax)
5725    real(4) :: latInRadians, distance, obsLat, obsLon
5726    real(8) :: obsLatInDegrees, obsLonInDegrees, obsStepIndex_r8
5727    logical :: change
5728    real(4), allocatable :: gridLats(:), gridLatsMid(:), gridLonsMid(:,:)
5729    integer, allocatable :: headerIndexGrid(:,:,:), delMinutesGrid(:,:,:)
5730    real(4), allocatable :: distanceGrid(:,:,:)
5731    integer, allocatable :: obsLatIndex(:), obsLonIndex(:), obsStepIndex(:), numGridLons(:)
5732    real(4), allocatable :: obsDistance(:)
5733    integer, allocatable :: obsLatIndexMpi(:), obsLonIndexMpi(:), obsStepIndexMpi(:)
5734    integer, allocatable :: obsDelMinutes(:), obsDelMinutesMpi(:)
5735    integer, allocatable :: stnIdInt(:,:), stnIdIntMpi(:,:)
5736    real(4), allocatable :: obsDistanceMpi(:)
5737    logical, allocatable :: valid(:), validMpi(:)
5738    character(len=5)     :: stnIdTrim
5739    character(len=12)    :: stnId, stnidList(numStnIdMax)
5740    character(len=12), allocatable :: stnIdGrid(:,:,:)
5741
5742    write(*,*)
5743    write(*,*) 'thn_scatByLatLonBoxes: Starting'
5744    write(*,*)
5745
5746    numHeader = obs_numHeader(obsdat)
5747    call rpn_comm_allReduce(numHeader, numHeaderMaxMpi, 1, 'mpi_integer', &
5748                            'mpi_max','grid',ierr)
5749    write(*,*) 'thn_scatByLatLonBoxes: numHeader, numHeaderMaxMpi = ', &
5750               numHeader, numHeaderMaxMpi
5751
5752    ! Check if we have any observations to process
5753    allocate(valid(numHeaderMaxMpi))
5754    valid(:) = .false.
5755    call obs_set_current_header_list(obsdat,'SC')
5756    HEADER0: do
5757      headerIndex = obs_getHeaderIndex(obsdat)
5758      if (headerIndex < 0) exit HEADER0
5759      valid(headerIndex) = .true.
5760    end do HEADER0
5761    countObs = count(valid(:))
5762    call rpn_comm_allReduce(countObs, countObsInMpi, 1, 'mpi_integer', &
5763                            'mpi_sum','grid',ierr)
5764    if (countObsInMpi == 0) then
5765      write(*,*) 'thn_scatByLatLonBoxes: no observations for this instrument'
5766      deallocate(valid)
5767      return
5768    end if
5769
5770    numLat = nint(2.*real(latLength)/real(deltax))
5771    numLon = nint(real(lonLength)/real(deltax))
5772
5773    write(*,*)
5774    write(*,*) 'Number of horizontal boxes : ', numLon
5775    write(*,*) 'Number of vertical boxes   : ', numLat
5776    write(*,*) 'Number of temporal bins    : ', tim_nstepobs
5777    write(*,*)
5778
5779    write(*,*) 'thn_scatByLatLonBoxes: countObs initial                   = ', &
5780               countObs, countObsInMpi
5781
5782    ! Allocate arrays
5783    allocate(gridLats(numLat))
5784    allocate(gridLatsMid(numLat))
5785    allocate(gridLonsMid(numLat,numLon))
5786    allocate(numGridLons(numLat))
5787    allocate(stnIdGrid(numLat,numLon,tim_nstepobs))
5788    allocate(distanceGrid(numLat,numLon,tim_nstepobs))
5789    allocate(headerIndexGrid(numLat,numLon,tim_nstepobs))
5790    allocate(delMinutesGrid(numLat,numLon,tim_nstepobs))
5791
5792    allocate(obsLatIndex(numHeaderMaxMpi))
5793    allocate(obsLonIndex(numHeaderMaxMpi))
5794    allocate(obsStepIndex(numHeaderMaxMpi))
5795    allocate(obsDistance(numHeaderMaxMpi))
5796    allocate(obsDelMinutes(numHeaderMaxMpi))
5797    lenStnId = len(stnId)
5798    allocate(stnIdInt(lenStnId,numHeaderMaxMpi))
5799
5800    ! Allocation for MPI gather
5801    allocate(validMpi(numHeaderMaxMpi*mmpi_nprocs))
5802    allocate(obsLatIndexMpi(numHeaderMaxMpi*mmpi_nprocs))
5803    allocate(obsLonIndexMpi(numHeaderMaxMpi*mmpi_nprocs))
5804    allocate(obsStepIndexMpi(numHeaderMaxMpi*mmpi_nprocs))
5805    allocate(obsDistanceMpi(numHeaderMaxMpi*mmpi_nprocs))
5806    allocate(obsDelMinutesMpi(numHeaderMaxMpi*mmpi_nprocs))
5807    allocate(stnIdIntMpi(lenStnId,numHeaderMaxMpi*mmpi_nprocs))
5808
5809    gridLats(:)            = 0.
5810    gridLatsMid(:)         = 0.
5811    gridLonsMid(:,:)       = 0.
5812    numGridLons(:)         = 0
5813    stnIdGrid(:,:,:)       = ''
5814    distanceGrid(:,:,:)    = -1.0
5815    headerIndexGrid(:,:,:) = -1
5816
5817    timeRejectCount = 0
5818    flagRejectCount = 0
5819
5820    ! set spatial boxes properties
5821    do latIndex = 1, numLat
5822      gridLats(latIndex) = (latIndex*180./numLat) - 90.
5823      gridLatsMid(latIndex) = gridLats(latIndex) - (90./numLat)
5824      if (gridLats(latIndex) <= 0.0) then
5825        latInRadians = gridLats(latIndex) * MPC_PI_R8 / 180.
5826      else
5827        latInRadians = gridLats(latIndex-1) * MPC_PI_R8 / 180.
5828      end if
5829      distance = lonLength * cos(latInRadians)
5830      numGridLons(latIndex) = nint(distance/deltax)
5831      do lonIndex = 1, numGridLons(latIndex)
5832        gridLonsMid(latIndex,lonIndex) =  &
5833             (lonIndex * 36000 /  numGridLons(latIndex)) -  &
5834             (18000 / numGridLons(latIndex))
5835        gridLonsMid(latIndex,lonIndex) = 0.01 * gridLonsMid(latIndex,lonIndex)
5836      end do
5837    end do
5838
5839    ! Station ID converted to integer array
5840    stnIdInt(:,:) = 0
5841    HEADER1: do headerIndex = 1, numHeader
5842      if (.not. valid(headerIndex)) cycle HEADER1
5843
5844      stnId = obs_elem_c(obsdat,'STID',headerIndex)
5845      do charIndex = 1, lenStnId
5846        stnIdInt(charIndex,headerIndex) = iachar(stnId(charIndex:charIndex))
5847      end do
5848    end do HEADER1
5849
5850    nsize = numHeaderMaxMpi
5851    call rpn_comm_allgather(valid,    nsize, 'mpi_logical',  &
5852                            validMpi, nsize, 'mpi_logical', 'grid', ierr)
5853    nsize = lenStnId * numHeaderMaxMpi
5854    call rpn_comm_allgather(stnIdInt,    nsize, 'mpi_integer',  &
5855                            stnIdIntMpi, nsize, 'mpi_integer', 'grid', ierr)
5856
5857    ! build a global list of stnId over all mpi tasks
5858    numStnId = 0
5859    numObsStnIdInMpi(:) = 0
5860    HEADER2: do headerIndex = 1, numHeaderMaxMpi * mmpi_nprocs
5861      if (all(stnIdIntMpi(:,headerIndex) == 0)) cycle HEADER2
5862      if (.not.validMpi(headerIndex)) cycle HEADER2
5863
5864      ! Station ID converted back to character string
5865      do charIndex = 1, lenStnId
5866        stnId(charIndex:charIndex) = achar(stnIdIntMpi(charIndex,headerIndex))
5867      end do
5868
5869      if (numStnId < numStnIdMax ) then
5870        stnIdIndexFound = -1
5871        do stnIdIndex = 1, numStnId
5872          if ( stnidList(stnIdIndex) == stnid ) stnIdIndexFound = stnIdIndex
5873        end do
5874        if ( stnIdIndexFound == -1 ) then
5875          numStnId = numStnId + 1
5876          stnidList(numStnId) = stnid
5877          stnIdIndexFound = numStnId
5878        end if
5879        numObsStnIdInMpi(stnIdIndexFound) = numObsStnIdInMpi(stnIdIndexFound) + 1
5880      else
5881        call utl_abort('thn_scatByLatLonBoxes: numStnId too large')
5882      end if
5883    end do HEADER2
5884
5885    ! Initial pass through all observations
5886    HEADER3: do headerIndex = 1, numHeader
5887      if (.not. valid(headerIndex)) cycle HEADER3
5888
5889      ! Station ID converted to integer array
5890      stnId = obs_elem_c(obsdat,'STID',headerIndex)
5891      do charIndex = 1, lenStnId
5892        stnIdInt(charIndex,headerIndex) = iachar(stnId(charIndex:charIndex))
5893      end do
5894
5895      ! Obs lat-lon
5896      obsLonInDegrees = MPC_DEGREES_PER_RADIAN_R8 * obs_headElem_r(obsdat, OBS_LON, headerIndex)
5897      obsLatInDegrees = MPC_DEGREES_PER_RADIAN_R8 * obs_headElem_r(obsdat, OBS_LAT, headerIndex)
5898      obsLonBurpFile = nint(100.0*(obsLonInDegrees - 180.0))
5899      if(obsLonBurpFile < 0) obsLonBurpFile = obsLonBurpFile + 36000
5900      obsLatBurpFile = 9000+nint(100.0*obsLatInDegrees)
5901
5902      ! compute box indices
5903      obsLat = (obsLatBurpFile - 9000.)/100.
5904      do latIndex = 1, numLat
5905        if ( obsLat <= (gridLats(latIndex) + 0.000001) ) then
5906          obsLatIndex(headerIndex) = latIndex
5907          exit
5908        end if
5909      end do
5910
5911      if (obsLonBurpFile >= 18000) then
5912        obsLonBurpFile = obsLonBurpFile - 18000
5913      else
5914        obsLonBurpFile = obsLonBurpFile + 18000
5915      end if
5916      obsLonIndex(headerIndex) =  &
5917           int( obsLonBurpFile /  &
5918                (36000. / real(numGridLons(obsLatIndex(headerIndex)))) ) + 1
5919      if ( obsLonIndex(headerIndex) > numGridLons(obsLatIndex(headerIndex)) ) then
5920        obsLonIndex(headerIndex) = numGridLons(obsLatIndex(headerIndex))
5921      end if
5922
5923      ! compute spatial distances
5924      obsLat = (obsLatBurpFile - 9000.)/100.
5925      obsLon = obsLonBurpFile/100.
5926      obsDistance(headerIndex) =  100.0 * &
5927           ( ((gridLatsMid(obsLatIndex(headerIndex))-obsLat))**2 +  &
5928             ((gridLonsMid(obsLatIndex(headerIndex),obsLonIndex(headerIndex))-obsLon))**2)**0.5
5929
5930      ! calcul de la bin temporelle dans laquelle se trouve l'observation
5931      obsDate = obs_headElem_i(obsdat, OBS_DAT, headerIndex)
5932      obsTime = obs_headElem_i(obsdat, OBS_ETM, headerIndex)
5933      call tim_getStepObsIndex(obsStepIndex_r8, tim_getDatestamp(), &
5934                               obsDate, obsTime, tim_nstepobs)
5935      obsStepIndex(headerIndex) = nint(obsStepIndex_r8)
5936      obsDelMinutes(headerIndex) = nint( 60.0 * tim_dstepobs *  &
5937           abs(real(obsStepIndex(headerIndex)) - obsStepIndex_r8) )
5938
5939      ! check time window
5940      if ( obsDelMinutes(headerIndex) > deltmax ) then
5941        timeRejectCount = timeRejectCount + 1
5942        valid(headerIndex) = .false.
5943      end if
5944
5945      ! find observation flags (assumes 1 level only per headerIndex)
5946      uObsFlag = -1
5947      vObsFlag = -1
5948      call obs_set_current_body_list(obsdat, headerIndex)
5949      BODY3: do 
5950        bodyIndex = obs_getBodyIndex(obsdat)
5951        if (bodyIndex < 0) exit BODY3
5952        obsVarno = obs_bodyElem_i(obsdat, OBS_VNM, bodyIndex)
5953        if (obsVarno == bufr_neus) then
5954          uObsFlag = obs_bodyElem_i(obsdat, OBS_FLG, bodyIndex)
5955        else if (obsVarno == bufr_nevs) then
5956          vObsFlag = obs_bodyElem_i(obsdat, OBS_FLG, bodyIndex)
5957        end if
5958      end do BODY3
5959
5960      ! modify valid based on flags
5961      if (uObsFlag /= -1 .and. vObsFlag /= -1) then
5962        if ( btest(uObsFlag,16) .or. btest(vObsFlag,16) .or. &
5963             btest(uObsFlag,18) .or. btest(vObsFlag,18) ) then
5964          flagRejectCount = flagRejectCount + 1
5965          valid(headerIndex) = .false.
5966        end if
5967      else
5968        valid(headerIndex) = .false.
5969      end if
5970
5971    end do HEADER3
5972
5973    countObs = count(valid(:))
5974    call rpn_comm_allReduce(countObs, countObsOutMpi, 1, 'mpi_integer', &
5975                            'mpi_sum','grid',ierr)
5976    write(*,*) 'thn_scatByLatLonBoxes: countObs after QC and time tests   = ', &
5977               countObs, countObsOutMpi
5978
5979    ! Gather data from all MPI tasks
5980    nsize = numHeaderMaxMpi
5981    call rpn_comm_allgather(valid,    nsize, 'mpi_logical',  &
5982                            validMpi, nsize, 'mpi_logical', 'grid', ierr)
5983    call rpn_comm_allgather(obsLatIndex,    nsize, 'mpi_integer',  &
5984                            obsLatIndexMpi, nsize, 'mpi_integer', 'grid', ierr)
5985    call rpn_comm_allgather(obsLonIndex,    nsize, 'mpi_integer',  &
5986                            obsLonIndexMpi, nsize, 'mpi_integer', 'grid', ierr)
5987    call rpn_comm_allgather(obsStepIndex,    nsize, 'mpi_integer',  &
5988                            obsStepIndexMpi, nsize, 'mpi_integer', 'grid', ierr)
5989    call rpn_comm_allgather(obsDelMinutes,    nsize, 'mpi_integer',  &
5990                            obsDelMinutesMpi, nsize, 'mpi_integer', 'grid', ierr)
5991    call rpn_comm_allgather(obsDistance,    nsize, 'mpi_real4',  &
5992                            obsDistanceMpi, nsize, 'mpi_real4', 'grid', ierr)
5993    
5994    ! Apply thinning algorithm
5995    HEADER4: do headerIndex = 1, numHeaderMaxMpi*mmpi_nprocs
5996      if (.not. validMpi(headerIndex)) cycle HEADER4
5997
5998      change = .true.
5999
6000      latIndex  = obsLatIndexMpi(headerIndex)
6001      lonIndex  = obsLonIndexMpi(headerIndex)
6002      stepIndex = obsStepIndexMpi(headerIndex)
6003
6004      ! Station ID converted back to character string
6005      do charIndex = 1, lenStnId
6006        stnId(charIndex:charIndex) = achar(stnIdIntMpi(charIndex,headerIndex))
6007      end do
6008      stnIdTrim = stnId(2:6)
6009
6010      if ( stnIdGrid(latIndex,lonIndex,stepIndex) /= '' ) then
6011
6012        ! This is an ASCAT observation
6013        if (stnIdTrim == 'METOP') then
6014
6015          ! si l'obs retenue precedemment etait un ASCAT, on poursuit l'investigation
6016          if ( stnIdTrim == stnIdGrid(latIndex,lonIndex,stepIndex) ) then
6017          
6018            ! si la difference temporelle est plus grande que celle deja retenue
6019            if ( obsDelMinutesMpi(headerIndex) >  &
6020                 delMinutesGrid(latIndex,lonIndex,stepIndex) ) then
6021              change = .false.
6022            else
6023              ! si la distance au centre de la boite est plus grande que celle retenue 
6024              if ( (obsDelMinutesMpi(headerIndex) ==  &
6025                    delMinutesGrid(latIndex,lonIndex,stepIndex)) .and. &
6026                   (obsDistanceMpi(headerIndex) >=  &
6027                    distanceGrid(latIndex,lonIndex,stepIndex)) ) then
6028                change = .false.
6029              end if                    
6030            end if
6031
6032          else
6033
6034            ! si l'obs retenue precedemment etait autre que METOP
6035            change = .true.
6036
6037          end if
6038
6039        else ! satellites autre que METOP
6040
6041          ! si l'obs retenue precedemment etait autre qu'un METOP, on poursuit l'investigation
6042          if ( stnIdTrim == stnIdGrid(latIndex,lonIndex,stepIndex) ) then
6043                 
6044            ! si la difference temporelle est plus grande que celle deja retenue, skip it
6045            if ( obsDelMinutesMpi(headerIndex) >  &
6046                 delMinutesGrid(latIndex,lonIndex,stepIndex) ) then
6047              change = .false.
6048            else
6049              ! si la distance au centre de la boite est plus grande que celle retenue, skip it 
6050              if ( (obsDelMinutesMpi(headerIndex) ==  &
6051                    delMinutesGrid(latIndex,lonIndex,stepIndex)) .and. &
6052                   (obsDistanceMpi(headerIndex) >=  &
6053                    distanceGrid(latIndex,lonIndex,stepIndex)) ) then
6054                change = .false.
6055              end if
6056            end if
6057
6058          else
6059
6060            ! si l'obs retenue precedemment etait un METOP
6061            change = .false.
6062
6063          end if
6064
6065        end if ! METOP
6066
6067      end if
6068
6069      ! update list of data to save
6070      if ( .not. change ) then
6071        ! keep previously accepted obs, so reject current obs
6072        validMpi(headerIndex) = .false.
6073      else
6074        ! reject previously accepted obs
6075        if ( headerIndexGrid(latIndex,lonIndex,stepIndex) /= -1 ) then
6076          validMpi(headerIndexGrid(latIndex,lonIndex,stepIndex)) = .false.
6077        end if
6078
6079        ! keep current obs
6080        validMpi(headerIndex) = .true.
6081        headerIndexGrid(latIndex,lonIndex,stepIndex) = headerIndex
6082        stnIdGrid(latIndex,lonIndex,stepIndex) = stnIdTrim
6083        delMinutesGrid(latIndex,lonIndex,stepIndex) = obsDelMinutesMpi(headerIndex)
6084        distanceGrid(latIndex,lonIndex,stepIndex) = obsDistanceMpi(headerIndex)
6085      end if
6086
6087    end do HEADER4
6088
6089    ! update local copy of 'valid' array
6090    headerIndexBeg = 1 + mmpi_myid * numHeaderMaxMpi
6091    headerIndexEnd = headerIndexBeg + numHeaderMaxMpi - 1
6092    valid(:) = validMpi(headerIndexBeg:headerIndexEnd)
6093
6094    countObs = count(valid(:))
6095    call rpn_comm_allReduce(countObs, countObsOutMpi, 1, 'mpi_integer', &
6096                            'mpi_sum','grid',ierr)
6097    write(*,*) 'thn_scatByLatLonBoxes: countObs after choosing 1 per box  = ', &
6098               countObs, countObsOutMpi
6099
6100    ! modify the observation flags in obsSpaceData and count obs for each stnId
6101    numObsStnIdOut(:) = 0
6102    call obs_set_current_header_list(obsdat,'SC')
6103    HEADER5: do
6104      headerIndex = obs_getHeaderIndex(obsdat)
6105      if (headerIndex < 0) exit HEADER5
6106     
6107      if (.not. valid(headerIndex)) then
6108        call obs_set_current_body_list(obsdat, headerIndex)
6109        BODY5: do 
6110          bodyIndex = obs_getBodyIndex(obsdat)
6111          if (bodyIndex < 0) exit BODY5
6112        
6113          obsFlag = obs_bodyElem_i(obsdat, OBS_FLG, bodyIndex)
6114          call obs_bodySet_i(obsdat, OBS_FLG, bodyIndex, ibset(obsFlag,11))
6115
6116        end do BODY5
6117        cycle HEADER5
6118      end if
6119
6120      ! count number of obs kept for each stnId
6121      stnId = obs_elem_c(obsdat,'STID',headerIndex)
6122      stnIdIndexFound = -1
6123      do stnIdIndex = 1, numStnId
6124        if (stnidList(stnIdIndex) == stnId) stnIdIndexFound = stnIdIndex
6125      end do
6126      if (stnIdIndexFound == -1) call utl_abort('stnid not found in list')
6127      numObsStnIdOut(stnIdIndexFound) = numObsStnIdOut(stnIdIndexFound) + 1
6128    end do HEADER5
6129
6130    call rpn_comm_allReduce(numObsStnIdOut, numObsStnIdOutMpi, &
6131                            numStnIdMax, 'mpi_integer', 'mpi_sum', 'grid', ierr)
6132    call rpn_comm_allReduce(timeRejectCount, timeRejectCountMpi, 1, &
6133                            'mpi_integer', 'mpi_sum', 'grid', ierr)
6134    call rpn_comm_allReduce(flagRejectCount, flagRejectCountMpi, 1, &
6135                            'mpi_integer', 'mpi_sum', 'grid', ierr)
6136
6137    write(*,*)
6138    write(*,'(a,i6)') 'scatByLatLonBoxes: Number of obs in input  = ', countObsInMpi
6139    write(*,'(a,i6)') 'scatByLatLonBoxes: Number of obs in output = ', countObsOutMpi
6140    write(*,'(a,i6)') 'scatByLatLonBoxes: Number of obs not selected due to time = ', &
6141         timeRejectCountMpi
6142    write(*,'(a,i6)') 'scatByLatLonBoxes: Number of obs not selected due to topo = ', &
6143         flagRejectCountMpi
6144    write(*,*)
6145    
6146    write(*,'(a40,i10)' ) 'Number of satellites found = ', numStnId
6147    write(*,*)
6148  
6149    write(*,'(a40,a15)' ) 'Satellite', 'nb SCAT in'
6150    write(*,*)
6151    do stnIdIndex = 1, numStnId
6152      write(*,'(a40,i15)') stnidList(stnIdIndex), numObsStnIdInMpi(stnIdIndex)
6153    end do
6154    write(*,*)
6155    write(*,'(a40,i15)' ) 'Total number of obs in : ', sum(numObsStnIdInMpi(:))
6156  
6157    write(*,*)
6158    write(*,'(a40,a15)' ) 'Satellite', 'nb SCAT out'
6159    write(*,*)
6160    do stnIdIndex = 1, numStnId
6161      write(*,'(a40,i15)') stnidList(stnIdIndex), numObsStnIdOutMpi(stnIdIndex)
6162    end do
6163    write(*,*)
6164    write(*,'(a40,i15)' ) 'Total number of obs out : ', sum(numObsStnIdOutMpi(:))
6165
6166    ! Deallocations:
6167    deallocate(valid)
6168    deallocate(gridLats)
6169    deallocate(gridLatsMid)
6170    deallocate(gridLonsMid)
6171    deallocate(numGridLons)
6172    deallocate(stnIdGrid)
6173    deallocate(distanceGrid)
6174    deallocate(headerIndexGrid)
6175    deallocate(delMinutesGrid)
6176
6177    deallocate(obsLatIndex)
6178    deallocate(obsLonIndex)
6179    deallocate(obsStepIndex)
6180    deallocate(obsDistance)
6181    deallocate(obsDelMinutes)
6182    deallocate(stnIdInt)
6183
6184    deallocate(validMpi)
6185    deallocate(obsLatIndexMpi)
6186    deallocate(obsLonIndexMpi)
6187    deallocate(obsStepIndexMpi)
6188    deallocate(obsDistanceMpi)
6189    deallocate(obsDelMinutesMpi)
6190    deallocate(stnIdIntMpi)
6191
6192    write(*,*)
6193    write(*,*) 'thn_scatByLatLonBoxes: Finished'
6194    write(*,*)
6195
6196  end subroutine thn_scatByLatLonBoxes
6197
6198  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
6199  ! thn_csrByLatLonBoxes
6200  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
6201  subroutine thn_csrByLatLonBoxes(obsdat, deltax, deltrad)
6202    !:Purpose: Only keep the observation closest to the center of each
6203    !           lat-lon (and time) box for CSR observations.
6204    !           Set bit 11 of OBS_FLG on observations that are to be rejected.
6205
6206    implicit none
6207
6208    ! Arguments:
6209    type(struct_obs), intent(inout) :: obsdat
6210    integer, intent(in)             :: deltax
6211    integer, intent(in)             :: deltrad
6212
6213    ! Locals parameters:
6214    integer, parameter :: latLength = 10000 ! Earth dimension parameters
6215    integer, parameter :: lonLength = 40000 ! Earth dimension parameters
6216    integer, parameter :: maxNumChan = 15    ! nb max de canaux
6217
6218    ! Locals:
6219    integer :: bodyIndex, channelIndex, charIndex, nsize, lenStnId
6220    integer :: numLat, numLon, latIndex, lonIndex, stepIndex, obsFlag
6221    integer :: ierr, headerIndex, numHeader, numHeaderMaxMpi, channelList(maxNumChan)
6222    integer :: headerIndexBeg, headerIndexEnd, countObs, countObsMpi
6223    integer :: obsLonBurpFile, obsLatBurpFile, obsDate, obsTime
6224    real(4) :: latInRadians, distance, obsLat, obsLon, gridLat, gridLon
6225    real(8) :: obsLatInDegrees, obsLonInDegrees, obsStepIndex_r8
6226    logical :: change
6227    real(4), allocatable :: gridLats(:)
6228    integer, allocatable :: numChanAssimGrid(:,:,:), headerIndexGrid(:,:,:)
6229    real(4), allocatable :: angleGrid(:,:,:), distanceGrid(:,:,:), cloudGrid(:,:,:,:)
6230    integer, allocatable :: obsLatIndex(:), obsLonIndex(:), obsStepIndex(:), numGridLons(:)
6231    real(4), allocatable :: obsCloud(:,:), obsAngle(:), obsDistance(:)
6232    integer, allocatable :: obsLatIndexMpi(:), obsLonIndexMpi(:), obsStepIndexMpi(:)
6233    integer, allocatable :: stnIdInt(:,:), stnIdIntMpi(:,:), numChannel(:), numChannelMpi(:)
6234    real(4), allocatable :: obsCloudMpi(:,:), obsAngleMpi(:), obsDistanceMpi(:)
6235    logical, allocatable :: valid(:), validMpi(:), channelAssim(:,:), channelAssimMpi(:,:)
6236    character(len=12) :: stnId
6237    character(len=12), allocatable :: stnIdGrid(:,:,:)
6238
6239    write(*,*)
6240    write(*,*) 'thn_csrByLatLonBoxes: Starting'
6241    write(*,*)
6242
6243    numHeader = obs_numHeader(obsdat)
6244    call rpn_comm_allReduce(numHeader, numHeaderMaxMpi, 1, 'mpi_integer', &
6245                            'mpi_max','grid',ierr)
6246    write(*,*) 'thn_csrByLatLonBoxes: numHeader, numHeaderMaxMpi = ', &
6247               numHeader, numHeaderMaxMpi
6248
6249    ! Check if we have any observations to process
6250    allocate(valid(numHeaderMaxMpi))
6251    valid(:) = .false.
6252    do headerIndex = 1, numHeader
6253      if ( obs_headElem_i(obsdat, OBS_ITY, headerIndex) == &
6254           codtyp_get_codtyp('radianceclear') ) then
6255        valid(headerIndex) = .true.
6256      end if
6257    end do
6258    countObs = count(valid(:))
6259    call rpn_comm_allReduce(countObs, countObsMpi, 1, 'mpi_integer', &
6260                            'mpi_sum','grid',ierr)
6261    if (countObsMpi == 0) then
6262      write(*,*) 'thn_csrByLatLonBoxes: no observations for this instrument'
6263      deallocate(valid)
6264      return
6265    end if
6266
6267    numLat = nint(2.*real(latLength)/real(deltax))
6268    numLon = nint(real(lonLength)/real(deltax))
6269
6270    write(*,*)
6271    write(*,*) 'Number of horizontal boxes : ', numLon
6272    write(*,*) 'Number of vertical boxes   : ', numLat
6273    write(*,*) 'Number of temporal bins    : ', tim_nstepobs
6274    write(*,*)
6275
6276    write(*,*) 'thn_csrByLatLonBoxes: countObs initial                   = ', &
6277               countObs, countObsMpi
6278
6279    ! Allocate arrays
6280    allocate(gridLats(numLat))
6281    allocate(numGridLons(numLat))
6282    allocate(stnIdGrid(numLat,numLon,tim_nstepobs))
6283    allocate(numChanAssimGrid(numLat,numLon,tim_nstepobs))
6284    allocate(angleGrid(numLat,numLon,tim_nstepobs))
6285    allocate(distanceGrid(numLat,numLon,tim_nstepobs))
6286    allocate(headerIndexGrid(numLat,numLon,tim_nstepobs))
6287    allocate(cloudGrid(maxNumChan,numLat,numLon,tim_nstepobs))
6288    allocate(obsLatIndex(numHeaderMaxMpi))
6289    allocate(obsLonIndex(numHeaderMaxMpi))
6290    allocate(obsStepIndex(numHeaderMaxMpi))
6291    allocate(numChannel(numHeaderMaxMpi))
6292    allocate(channelAssim(maxNumChan,numHeaderMaxMpi))
6293    allocate(obsAngle(numHeaderMaxMpi))
6294    allocate(obsCloud(maxNumChan,numHeaderMaxMpi))
6295    allocate(obsDistance(numHeaderMaxMpi))
6296
6297    gridLats(:)             = 0.
6298    numGridLons(:)          = 0
6299    stnIdGrid(:,:,:)        = ''
6300    numChanAssimGrid(:,:,:) = -1
6301    angleGrid(:,:,:)        = -1.0
6302    distanceGrid(:,:,:)     = -1.0
6303    headerIndexGrid(:,:,:)  = -1
6304    cloudGrid(:,:,:,:)      = -1.0
6305    channelAssim(:,:)       = .false.
6306    numChannel(:)           = 0
6307    obsAngle(:)             = 0.0
6308    obsCloud(:,:)           = 0.0
6309    obsDistance(:)          = 0.0
6310
6311    ! set spatial boxes properties
6312
6313    do latIndex = 1, numLat
6314      gridLats(latIndex) = (latIndex*180./numLat) - 90.
6315      if (gridLats(latIndex) <= 0.0) then
6316        latInRadians = gridLats(latIndex) * MPC_PI_R8 / 180.
6317      else
6318        latInRadians = gridLats(latIndex-1) * MPC_PI_R8 / 180.
6319      end if
6320      distance = lonLength * cos(latInRadians)
6321      numGridLons(latIndex) = nint(distance/deltax)
6322    end do
6323
6324    ! Initial pass through all observations
6325    HEADER1: do headerIndex = 1, numHeader
6326      if (.not. valid(headerIndex)) cycle HEADER1
6327
6328      obsLonInDegrees = MPC_DEGREES_PER_RADIAN_R8 * obs_headElem_r(obsdat, OBS_LON, headerIndex)
6329      obsLatInDegrees = MPC_DEGREES_PER_RADIAN_R8 * obs_headElem_r(obsdat, OBS_LAT, headerIndex)
6330      obsLonBurpFile = nint(100.0*(obsLonInDegrees - 180.0))
6331      if(obsLonBurpFile < 0) obsLonBurpFile = obsLonBurpFile + 36000
6332      obsLatBurpFile = 9000+nint(100.0*obsLatInDegrees)
6333
6334      ! compute box indices
6335      do latIndex = 1, numLat
6336        if ( (obsLatBurpFile - 9000.)/100. <= (gridLats(latIndex) + 0.000001) ) then
6337          obsLatIndex(headerIndex) = latIndex
6338          exit
6339        end if
6340      end do
6341
6342      obsLonIndex(headerIndex) = int(obsLonBurpFile /  &
6343           (36000. / numGridLons(obsLatIndex(headerIndex)))) + 1
6344      if ( obsLonIndex(headerIndex) > numGridLons(obsLatIndex(headerIndex)) ) then
6345        obsLonIndex(headerIndex) = numGridLons(obsLatIndex(headerIndex))
6346      end if
6347
6348      ! compute spatial distances
6349      ! position of the observation
6350      obsLat = (obsLatBurpFile - 9000.) / 100.
6351      obsLon = obsLonBurpFile / 100.
6352
6353      ! position of the box center
6354      gridLat = gridLats(obsLatIndex(headerIndex)) - 0.5 * (180./numLat)
6355      gridLon = (360. / numGridLons(obsLatIndex(headerIndex))) *  &
6356                (obsLonIndex(headerIndex) - 0.5)
6357
6358      ! spatial separation
6359      obsDistance(headerIndex) = thn_separation(obsLon,obsLat,gridLon,gridLat) * &
6360                                 latLength / 90.
6361
6362      ! calcul de la bin temporelle dans laquelle se trouve l'observation
6363      obsDate = obs_headElem_i(obsdat, OBS_DAT, headerIndex)
6364      obsTime = obs_headElem_i(obsdat, OBS_ETM, headerIndex)
6365      call tim_getStepObsIndex(obsStepIndex_r8, tim_getDatestamp(), &
6366                               obsDate, obsTime, tim_nstepobs)
6367      obsStepIndex(headerIndex) = nint(obsStepIndex_r8)
6368
6369      ! check if distance too far from box center
6370      if (obsDistance(headerIndex) > real(deltrad)) then
6371        valid(headerIndex) = .false.
6372        cycle HEADER1
6373      end if
6374
6375    end do HEADER1
6376
6377    countObs = count(valid(:))
6378    call rpn_comm_allReduce(countObs, countObsMpi, 1, 'mpi_integer', &
6379                            'mpi_sum','grid',ierr)
6380    write(*,*) 'thn_csrByLatLonBoxes: countObs after deltrad test        = ', &
6381               countObs, countObsMpi
6382
6383    ! Second pass through all observations
6384    HEADER2: do headerIndex = 1, numHeader
6385      if (.not. valid(headerIndex)) cycle HEADER2
6386      
6387      ! get the zenith angle
6388      obsAngle(headerIndex) = obs_headElem_r(obsdat, OBS_SZA, headerIndex)
6389
6390      ! Keep obs only if at least one channel not rejected based on tests in suprep
6391      valid(headerIndex) = .false.
6392      channelIndex = 0
6393      call obs_set_current_body_list(obsdat, headerIndex)
6394      BODY1: do 
6395        bodyIndex = obs_getBodyIndex(obsdat)
6396        if (bodyIndex < 0) exit BODY1
6397
6398        if (obs_bodyElem_i(obsdat, OBS_VNM, bodyIndex) /= bufr_nbt3) then
6399          cycle BODY1
6400        end if
6401
6402        numChannel(headerIndex) = numChannel(headerIndex) + 1
6403        channelIndex = channelIndex + 1
6404        channelList(channelIndex) = nint(obs_bodyElem_r(obsdat, OBS_PPP, bodyIndex))
6405
6406        obsFlag = obs_bodyElem_i(obsdat, OBS_FLG, bodyIndex)
6407        if ( .not.btest(obsFlag,8) .and. &
6408             .not.btest(obsFlag,9) .and. &
6409             .not.btest(obsFlag,11) ) then
6410          valid(headerIndex) = .true.
6411          channelAssim(channelIndex,headerIndex) = .true.
6412        end if
6413      end do BODY1
6414
6415      ! read the new element 20081 in obsspacedata OBS_CLA
6416      CHANNELS: do channelIndex = 1, numChannel(headerIndex)
6417        obsCloud(channelIndex, headerIndex) = -1.0
6418
6419        ! search for the cloud information for this channel
6420        call obs_set_current_body_list(obsdat, headerIndex)
6421        BODY2: do
6422          bodyIndex = obs_getBodyIndex(obsdat)
6423          if (bodyIndex < 0) exit BODY2
6424
6425          ! check if channel number matches
6426          if (nint(obs_bodyElem_r(obsdat, OBS_PPP, bodyIndex)) == channelList(channelIndex)) then
6427            obsCloud(channelIndex, headerIndex) = real(obs_bodyElem_i(obsdat, OBS_CLA, bodyIndex))
6428            cycle CHANNELS
6429          end if
6430        end do BODY2
6431        if (obsCloud(channelIndex, headerIndex) == -1.0) then
6432          call utl_abort('thn_csrByLatLonBoxes: could not find cloud fraction in obsSpaceData')
6433        end if
6434      end do CHANNELS
6435
6436    end do HEADER2
6437
6438    countObs = count(valid(:))
6439    call rpn_comm_allReduce(countObs, countObsMpi, 1, 'mpi_integer', &
6440                            'mpi_sum','grid',ierr)
6441    write(*,*) 'thn_csrByLatLonBoxes: countObs after rejection flag test = ', &
6442               countObs, countObsMpi
6443
6444    ! Allocation for MPI gather
6445    allocate(validMpi(numHeaderMaxMpi*mmpi_nprocs))
6446    allocate(obsLatIndexMpi(numHeaderMaxMpi*mmpi_nprocs))
6447    allocate(obsLonIndexMpi(numHeaderMaxMpi*mmpi_nprocs))
6448    allocate(obsStepIndexMpi(numHeaderMaxMpi*mmpi_nprocs))
6449    allocate(numChannelMpi(numHeaderMaxMpi*mmpi_nprocs))
6450    allocate(obsAngleMpi(numHeaderMaxMpi*mmpi_nprocs))
6451    allocate(obsDistanceMpi(numHeaderMaxMpi*mmpi_nprocs))
6452    allocate(channelAssimMpi(maxNumChan,numHeaderMaxMpi*mmpi_nprocs))
6453    allocate(obsCloudMpi(maxNumChan,numHeaderMaxMpi*mmpi_nprocs))
6454    lenStnId = len(stnId)
6455    allocate(stnIdInt(lenStnId,numHeaderMaxMpi))
6456    allocate(stnIdIntMpi(lenStnId,numHeaderMaxMpi*mmpi_nprocs))
6457
6458    ! Initialize arrays
6459    obsLatIndexMpi(:)    = 0
6460    obsLonIndexMpi(:)    = 0
6461    obsStepIndexMpi(:)   = 0
6462    numChannelMpi(:)     = 0
6463    obsAngleMpi(:)       = 0.0
6464    obsDistanceMpi(:)    = 0.0
6465    channelAssimMpi(:,:) = 0
6466    obsCloudMpi(:,:)     = 0.0
6467    stnIdInt(:,:)        = 0
6468    stnIdIntMpi(:,:)     = 0
6469
6470    ! Station ID converted to integer array
6471    HEADER3: do headerIndex = 1, numHeader
6472      if (.not. valid(headerIndex)) cycle HEADER3
6473
6474      stnId = obs_elem_c(obsdat,'STID',headerIndex)
6475      do charIndex = 1, lenStnId
6476        stnIdInt(charIndex,headerIndex) = iachar(stnId(charIndex:charIndex))
6477      end do
6478    end do HEADER3
6479
6480    ! Gather data from all MPI tasks
6481    nsize = numHeaderMaxMpi
6482    call rpn_comm_allgather(valid,    nsize, 'mpi_logical',  &
6483                            validMpi, nsize, 'mpi_logical', 'grid', ierr)
6484    call rpn_comm_allgather(obsLatIndex,    nsize, 'mpi_integer',  &
6485                            obsLatIndexMpi, nsize, 'mpi_integer', 'grid', ierr)
6486    call rpn_comm_allgather(obsLonIndex,    nsize, 'mpi_integer',  &
6487                            obsLonIndexMpi, nsize, 'mpi_integer', 'grid', ierr)
6488    call rpn_comm_allgather(obsStepIndex,    nsize, 'mpi_integer',  &
6489                            obsStepIndexMpi, nsize, 'mpi_integer', 'grid', ierr)
6490    call rpn_comm_allgather(numChannel,    nsize, 'mpi_integer',  &
6491                            numChannelMpi, nsize, 'mpi_integer', 'grid', ierr)
6492    call rpn_comm_allgather(obsAngle,    nsize, 'mpi_real4',  &
6493                            obsAngleMpi, nsize, 'mpi_real4', 'grid', ierr)
6494    call rpn_comm_allgather(obsDistance,    nsize, 'mpi_real4',  &
6495                            obsDistanceMpi, nsize, 'mpi_real4', 'grid', ierr)
6496
6497    nsize = maxNumChan * numHeaderMaxMpi
6498    call rpn_comm_allgather(channelAssim,    nsize, 'mpi_integer',  &
6499                            channelAssimMpi, nsize, 'mpi_integer', 'grid', ierr)
6500    call rpn_comm_allgather(obsCloud,    nsize, 'mpi_real4',  &
6501                            obsCloudMpi, nsize, 'mpi_real4', 'grid', ierr)
6502
6503    nsize = lenStnId * numHeaderMaxMpi
6504    call rpn_comm_allgather(stnIdInt,    nsize, 'mpi_integer',  &
6505                            stnIdIntMpi, nsize, 'mpi_integer', 'grid', ierr)
6506    
6507    ! Apply thinning algorithm
6508    HEADER4: do headerIndex = 1, numHeaderMaxMpi*mmpi_nprocs
6509      if (.not. validMpi(headerIndex)) cycle HEADER4
6510
6511      change = .true.
6512
6513      latIndex  = obsLatIndexMpi(headerIndex)
6514      lonIndex  = obsLonIndexMpi(headerIndex)
6515      stepIndex = obsStepIndexMpi(headerIndex)
6516
6517      ! Station ID converted back to character string
6518      do charIndex = 1, lenStnId
6519        stnId(charIndex:charIndex) = achar(stnIdIntMpi(charIndex,headerIndex))
6520      end do
6521
6522      if ( stnIdGrid(latIndex,lonIndex,stepIndex) /= '' ) then
6523
6524        ! on veut previlegier les profils avec le plus de canaux assimiles
6525        if ( count(channelAssimMpi(:,headerIndex)) <  &
6526             numChanAssimGrid(latIndex,lonIndex,stepIndex) ) change = .false.
6527
6528        ! en cas d'egalite, on doit regarder d'autres conditions pour faire un choix
6529        if ( count(channelAssimMpi(:,headerIndex)) ==  &
6530             numChanAssimGrid(latIndex,lonIndex,stepIndex) ) then
6531
6532          ! si le profil actuel est d'un autre instrument que celui deja considere
6533          ! choisir celui qui a le plus petit angle satellite
6534          if ( stnid /= stnIdGrid(latIndex,lonIndex,stepIndex) ) then
6535            if ( obsAngleMpi(headerIndex)  >  &
6536                 angleGrid(latIndex,lonIndex,stepIndex) ) change = .false.
6537
6538            ! en cas d'egalite de l'angle,
6539            ! choisir le profil le plus pres du centre de la boite
6540            if ( ( obsAngleMpi(headerIndex) ==  &
6541                   angleGrid(latIndex,lonIndex,stepIndex) ) .and. &
6542                 ( obsDistanceMpi(headerIndex) >  &
6543                   distanceGrid(latIndex,lonIndex,stepIndex) ) ) change = .false.
6544
6545          ! si le profil actuel est du meme instrument que celui deja considere
6546          ! choisir celui dont tous les canaux assimiles ont respectivement
6547          ! moins de fraction nuageuse que celui deja considere
6548          else
6549            do channelIndex = 1, numChannelMpi(headerIndex)
6550              if ( channelAssimMpi(channelIndex,headerIndex) .and. &
6551                   ( obsCloudMpi(channelIndex,headerIndex) >  &
6552                     cloudGrid(channelIndex,latIndex,lonIndex,stepIndex) ) ) change = .false.
6553            end do
6554
6555            ! en cas d'egalite de la fraction nuageuse pour chaque canal present,
6556            ! choisir le profil le plus pres du centre de la boite
6557            do channelIndex = 1, numChannelMpi(headerIndex)
6558              if ( channelAssimMpi(channelIndex,headerIndex) .and. &
6559                   ( obsCloudMpi(channelIndex,headerIndex) <  &
6560                     cloudGrid(channelIndex,latIndex,lonIndex,stepIndex) ) ) exit
6561              if ( ( channelIndex == numChannelMpi(headerIndex) ) .and. &
6562                   ( obsDistanceMpi(headerIndex) >  &
6563                     distanceGrid(latIndex,lonIndex,stepIndex) ) ) change = .false.
6564            end do
6565          end if
6566        end if
6567      end if
6568
6569      ! update list of data to save
6570      if ( .not. change ) then
6571        ! keep previously accepted obs, so reject current obs
6572        validMpi(headerIndex) = .false.
6573      else
6574        ! reject previously accepted obs
6575        if ( headerIndexGrid(latIndex,lonIndex,stepIndex) /= -1 ) then
6576          validMpi(headerIndexGrid(latIndex,lonIndex,stepIndex)) = .false.
6577        end if
6578
6579        ! keep current obs
6580        validMpi(headerIndex) = .true.
6581        headerIndexGrid(latIndex,lonIndex,stepIndex) = headerIndex
6582        numChanAssimGrid(latIndex,lonIndex,stepIndex) =  &
6583             count(channelAssimMpi(:,headerIndex))
6584        stnIdGrid(latIndex,lonIndex,stepIndex) = stnid
6585        angleGrid(latIndex,lonIndex,stepIndex) = obsAngleMpi(headerIndex)
6586        cloudGrid(:,latIndex,lonIndex,stepIndex) = obsCloudMpi(:,headerIndex)
6587        distanceGrid(latIndex,lonIndex,stepIndex) = obsDistanceMpi(headerIndex)
6588      end if
6589
6590    end do HEADER4
6591
6592    ! update local copy of 'valid' array
6593    headerIndexBeg = 1 + mmpi_myid * numHeaderMaxMpi
6594    headerIndexEnd = headerIndexBeg + numHeaderMaxMpi - 1
6595    valid(:) = validMpi(headerIndexBeg:headerIndexEnd)
6596
6597    countObs = count(valid(:))
6598    call rpn_comm_allReduce(countObs, countObsMpi, 1, 'mpi_integer', &
6599                            'mpi_sum','grid',ierr)
6600    write(*,*) 'thn_csrByLatLonBoxes: countObs after choosing 1 per box  = ', &
6601               countObs, countObsMpi
6602
6603    ! modify the observation flags in obsSpaceData
6604    HEADER5: do headerIndex = 1, numHeader
6605      ! skip observation if we're not supposed to consider it
6606      if ( obs_headElem_i(obsdat, OBS_ITY, headerIndex) /= &
6607           codtyp_get_codtyp('radianceclear') ) then
6608        cycle HEADER5
6609      end if
6610     
6611      if (.not. valid(headerIndex)) then
6612        call obs_set_current_body_list(obsdat, headerIndex)
6613        BODY3: do 
6614          bodyIndex = obs_getBodyIndex(obsdat)
6615          if (bodyIndex < 0) exit BODY3
6616        
6617          obsFlag = obs_bodyElem_i(obsdat, OBS_FLG, bodyIndex)
6618          call obs_bodySet_i(obsdat, OBS_FLG, bodyIndex, ibset(obsFlag,11))
6619
6620        end do BODY3
6621      end if
6622    end do HEADER5
6623
6624    deallocate(valid)
6625    deallocate(gridLats)
6626    deallocate(numGridLons)
6627    deallocate(stnIdGrid)
6628    deallocate(numChanAssimGrid)
6629    deallocate(angleGrid)
6630    deallocate(distanceGrid)
6631    deallocate(headerIndexGrid)
6632    deallocate(cloudGrid)
6633    deallocate(obsLatIndex)
6634    deallocate(obsLonIndex)
6635    deallocate(obsStepIndex)
6636    deallocate(numChannel)
6637    deallocate(channelAssim)
6638    deallocate(obsAngle)
6639    deallocate(obsCloud)
6640    deallocate(obsDistance)
6641    deallocate(validMpi)
6642    deallocate(obsLatIndexMpi)
6643    deallocate(obsLonIndexMpi)
6644    deallocate(obsStepIndexMpi)
6645    deallocate(numChannelMpi)
6646    deallocate(obsAngleMpi)
6647    deallocate(obsDistanceMpi)
6648    deallocate(channelAssimMpi)
6649    deallocate(obsCloudMpi)
6650    deallocate(stnIdInt)
6651    deallocate(stnIdIntMpi)
6652
6653    write(*,*)
6654    write(*,*) 'thn_csrByLatLonBoxes: Finished'
6655    write(*,*)
6656
6657  end subroutine thn_csrByLatLonBoxes
6658
6659  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
6660  ! thn_hyperByLatLonBoxes
6661  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
6662  subroutine thn_hyperByLatLonBoxes(obsdat, removeUnCorrected, &
6663                                    deltmax, deltax, deltrad,  &
6664                                    familyType, codtyp)
6665    !:Purpose: Only keep the observation closest to the center of each
6666    !           lat-lon (and time) box.
6667    !           Set bit 11 of OBS_FLG on observations that are to be rejected.
6668
6669    implicit none
6670
6671    ! Arguments:
6672    type(struct_obs), intent(inout) :: obsdat
6673    logical, intent(in)             :: removeUnCorrected
6674    integer, intent(in)             :: deltmax
6675    integer, intent(in)             :: deltax
6676    integer, intent(in)             :: deltrad
6677    character(len=*), intent(in)    :: familyType
6678    integer, intent(in)             :: codtyp
6679
6680    ! Locals:
6681    integer :: headerIndex, bodyIndex, obsDate, obsTime, obsFlag
6682    integer :: numHeader, numHeaderMpi, numHeaderMaxMpi, lenStnId 
6683    integer :: numLat, numLon, latIndex, numChannels, delMinutes
6684    integer :: lonBinIndex, latBinIndex, timeBinIndex, charIndex
6685    integer :: ierr, nsize, procIndex, countHeader, countHeaderMpi
6686    real(4) :: latInRadians, length, distance
6687    real(8) :: lonBoxCenterInDegrees, latBoxCenterInDegrees
6688    real(8) :: obsLatInRad, obsLonInRad, obsLat, obsLon
6689    real(8) :: obsLatInDegrees, obsLonInDegrees, obsStepIndex_r8
6690    integer, parameter :: latLength = 10000
6691    integer, parameter :: lonLength = 40000
6692    real(4), allocatable :: gridLats(:)
6693    integer, allocatable :: numGridLons(:)
6694    integer, allocatable :: stnIdInt(:,:), stnIdIntMpi(:,:)
6695    integer, allocatable :: headerIndexKeep(:,:,:), numChannelsKeep(:,:,:)
6696    integer, allocatable :: headerIndexKeepMpi(:,:,:,:), numChannelsKeepMpi(:,:,:,:)
6697    integer, allocatable :: delMinutesKeep(:,:,:), delMinutesKeepMpi(:,:,:,:)
6698    integer, allocatable :: procIndexKeep(:,:,:)
6699    real(4), allocatable :: distanceKeep(:,:,:), distanceKeepMpi(:,:,:,:)
6700    logical, allocatable :: rejectThisHeader(:)
6701    logical :: keepThisObs, stnIdFoundInList
6702    integer :: obsLonBurpFile, obsLatBurpFile
6703    integer, parameter :: numStnIdMax = 10
6704    integer :: numStnId, stnIdIndexFound, stnIdIndex, countMpi, numObsStnId(numStnIdMax)
6705    character(len=12) :: stnid, stnidList(numStnIdMax)
6706    character(len=codtyp_name_length) :: instrumName
6707
6708    instrumName = codtyp_get_name(codtyp)
6709    write(*,*)
6710    write(*,*) 'thn_hyperByLatLonBoxes: Starting, ', trim(instrumName)
6711    write(*,*)
6712
6713    numHeader = obs_numHeader(obsdat)
6714    call rpn_comm_allReduce(numHeader, numHeaderMaxMpi, 1, 'mpi_integer', &
6715                            'mpi_max', 'grid', ierr)
6716
6717    lenStnId = len(stnId)
6718    allocate(stnIdInt(lenStnId,numHeaderMaxMpi))
6719    allocate(stnIdIntMpi(lenStnId,numHeaderMaxMpi*mmpi_nprocs))
6720    stnIdInt(:,:) = 0
6721    stnIdIntMpi(:,:) = 0
6722
6723    ! loop over all header indices of the specified family and get integer stnId
6724    countHeader = 0
6725    call obs_set_current_header_list(obsdat,trim(familyType))
6726    HEADER: do
6727      headerIndex = obs_getHeaderIndex(obsdat)
6728      if (headerIndex < 0) exit HEADER
6729      if (obs_headElem_i(obsdat, OBS_ITY, headerIndex) /= codtyp) cycle HEADER
6730
6731      countHeader = countHeader + 1
6732
6733      ! convert and store stnId as integer array
6734      stnId = obs_elem_c(obsdat,'STID',headerIndex)
6735      do charIndex = 1, lenStnId
6736        stnIdInt(charIndex,headerIndex) = iachar(stnId(charIndex:charIndex))
6737      end do
6738    end do HEADER
6739
6740    ! return if no observations for this instrument
6741    call rpn_comm_allReduce(countHeader, countHeaderMpi, 1, 'mpi_integer', &
6742                            'mpi_sum', 'grid', ierr)
6743    if (countHeaderMpi == 0) then
6744      write(*,*) 'thn_hyperByLatLonBoxes: no observations for this instrument'
6745      return
6746    end if
6747
6748    ! Gather stnIdInt from all MPI tasks
6749    nsize = lenStnId * numHeaderMaxMpi
6750    call rpn_comm_allgather(stnIdInt,    nsize, 'mpi_integer',  &
6751                            stnIdIntMpi, nsize, 'mpi_integer', 'grid', ierr)
6752
6753    ! build a global stnIdList
6754    numStnId = 0
6755    numHeaderMpi = numHeaderMaxMpi * mmpi_nprocs
6756    HEADER4: do headerIndex = 1, numHeaderMpi
6757      if (all(stnIdIntMpi(:,headerIndex) == 0)) cycle HEADER4
6758
6759      ! Station ID converted back to character string
6760      do charIndex = 1, lenStnId
6761        stnId(charIndex:charIndex) = achar(stnIdIntMpi(charIndex,headerIndex))
6762      end do
6763
6764      stnIdFoundInList = .false.
6765      if ( numStnId == 0 ) then
6766        stnIdFoundInList = .true.
6767        numStnId = numStnId + 1
6768        stnidList(numStnId) = stnId
6769      else
6770        do stnIdIndex = 1, numStnId
6771          if ( stnidList(stnIdIndex) == stnId ) cycle HEADER4
6772        end do
6773      end if
6774
6775      if ( .not. stnIdFoundInList ) then
6776        numStnId = numStnId + 1
6777        stnidList(numStnId) = stnId
6778      end if
6779
6780      if ( numStnId >= numStnIdMax ) then
6781        call utl_abort('thn_hyperByLatLonBoxes: numStnId too large')
6782      end if
6783
6784    end do HEADER4
6785
6786    ! loop over local headers to find numObs for each stnId
6787    call obs_set_current_header_list(obsdat,trim(familyType))
6788    HEADER0: do
6789      headerIndex = obs_getHeaderIndex(obsdat)
6790      if (headerIndex < 0) exit HEADER0
6791      if (obs_headElem_i(obsdat, OBS_ITY, headerIndex) /= codtyp) cycle HEADER0
6792
6793      stnId = obs_elem_c(obsdat,'STID',headerIndex)
6794
6795      do stnIdIndex = 1, numStnId
6796        if ( stnidList(stnIdIndex) == stnId ) then
6797          numObsStnId(stnIdIndex) = numObsStnId(stnIdIndex) + 1
6798        end if
6799      end do
6800
6801    end do HEADER0
6802
6803    ! Initial setup
6804    numLat = nint( 2. * real(latLength) / real(deltax) )
6805    numLon = nint(      real(lonLength) / real(deltax) )
6806    allocate(headerIndexKeep(numLat,numLon,tim_nstepobs))
6807    allocate(numChannelsKeep(numLat,numLon,tim_nstepobs))
6808    allocate(distanceKeep(numLat,numLon,tim_nstepobs))
6809    allocate(delMinutesKeep(numLat,numLon,tim_nstepobs))
6810    allocate(gridLats(numLat))
6811    allocate(numGridLons(numLat))
6812    headerIndexKeep(:,:,:) = -1
6813    numChannelsKeep(:,:,:) = 0
6814    distanceKeep(:,:,:)    = 0.0
6815    delMinutesKeep(:,:,:)  = deltmax
6816    gridLats(:)              = 0.0
6817    numGridLons(:)                = 0
6818
6819    write(*,'(a)') ' '
6820    write(*,'(a)') ' == Gridbox properties == '
6821    write(*,'(a)') ' '
6822    write(*,'(a,i8)') ' Number of horizontal boxes : ', numLon
6823    write(*,'(a,i8)') ' Number of vertical boxes   : ', numLat
6824    write(*,'(a,i8)') ' Number of temporal bins    : ', tim_nstepobs
6825
6826    ! print some statistics before thinning
6827
6828    instrumName = codtyp_get_name(codtyp)
6829    write(*,*)
6830    write(*,'(a)')        ' == Input file == '
6831    write(*,*)
6832    write(*,'(a,a4)')     ' Instrument = ', trim(instrumName)
6833    write(*,'(a,i4)')     ' Codtyp     = ', codtyp
6834
6835    write(*,*)
6836    write(*,'(a,2i8)')     ' Number of valid satellite profiles  = ', countHeader, countHeaderMpi
6837    write(*,*)
6838
6839    do stnIdIndex = 1, numStnId
6840      call rpn_comm_allReduce(numObsStnId(stnIdIndex), countMpi, 1, 'mpi_integer', &
6841                              'mpi_sum', 'grid', ierr)
6842      write(*,'(a9,a,2i8)')  stnidList(stnIdIndex), ' :  ', numObsStnId(stnIdIndex), countMpi
6843    end do
6844    
6845    allocate(headerIndexKeepMpi(numLat,numLon,tim_nstepobs,mmpi_nprocs))
6846    allocate(numChannelsKeepMpi(numLat,numLon,tim_nstepobs,mmpi_nprocs))
6847    allocate(distanceKeepMpi(numLat,numLon,tim_nstepobs,mmpi_nprocs))
6848    allocate(delMinutesKeepMpi(numLat,numLon,tim_nstepobs,mmpi_nprocs))
6849    allocate(procIndexKeep(numLat,numLon,tim_nstepobs))
6850    procIndexKeep(:,:,:) = -1
6851
6852    ! set spatial boxes properties
6853    ! gridLats(:) : latitude (deg) of northern side of the box
6854    ! numGridLons(:)   : number of longitudinal boxes at this latitude
6855    do latIndex = 1, numLat
6856      gridLats(latIndex) = (latIndex*180./numLat) - 90.
6857      if ( gridLats(latIndex) <= 0.0 ) then
6858        latInRadians = gridLats(latIndex) * MPC_PI_R8 / 180.
6859      else
6860        latInRadians = gridLats(latIndex-1) * MPC_PI_R8 / 180.
6861      end if
6862      length = lonLength * cos(latInRadians)
6863      numGridLons(latIndex)   = nint(length/deltax)
6864    end do
6865
6866    ! loop over all header indices of the specified family
6867    call obs_set_current_header_list(obsdat,trim(familyType))
6868    HEADER1: do
6869      headerIndex = obs_getHeaderIndex(obsdat)
6870      if (headerIndex < 0) exit HEADER1
6871
6872      if (obs_headElem_i(obsdat, OBS_ITY, headerIndex) /= codtyp) cycle HEADER1
6873
6874      obsLonInRad = obs_headElem_r(obsdat, OBS_LON, headerIndex)
6875      obsLatInRad = obs_headElem_r(obsdat, OBS_LAT, headerIndex)
6876      obsDate = obs_headElem_i(obsdat, OBS_DAT, headerIndex)
6877      obsTime = obs_headElem_i(obsdat, OBS_ETM, headerIndex)
6878
6879      obsLonInDegrees = MPC_DEGREES_PER_RADIAN_R8 * obsLonInRad
6880      obsLatInDegrees = MPC_DEGREES_PER_RADIAN_R8 * obsLatInRad
6881      obsLonBurpFile = nint(100.0*(obsLonInDegrees - 180.0))
6882      if(obsLonBurpFile < 0) obsLonBurpFile = obsLonBurpFile + 36000
6883      obsLatBurpFile = 9000+nint(100.0*obsLatInDegrees)
6884
6885      numChannels = 0
6886
6887      ! loop over all body indices for this headerIndex
6888      call obs_set_current_body_list(obsdat, headerIndex)
6889      BODY: do 
6890        bodyIndex = obs_getBodyIndex(obsdat)
6891        if (bodyIndex < 0) exit BODY
6892
6893        ! mark for rejection if not bias corrected (bit 6 not set)
6894        if (removeUnCorrected) then
6895          obsFlag = obs_bodyElem_i(obsdat, OBS_FLG, bodyIndex)
6896          if (.not. btest(obsFlag,6)) then
6897            call obs_bodySet_i(obsdat, OBS_FLG, bodyIndex, ibset(obsFlag,11))
6898          end if
6899        end if
6900
6901        ! count the number of accepted channels
6902        obsFlag = obs_bodyElem_i(obsdat, OBS_FLG, bodyIndex)
6903        if ( .not. btest(obsFlag,8) .and. &
6904             .not. btest(obsFlag,9) .and. &
6905             .not. btest(obsFlag,11) ) then
6906          numChannels = numChannels + 1
6907        end if
6908
6909      end do BODY
6910
6911      ! Determine the lat and lon bin indexes
6912      do latIndex = 1, numLat
6913        if ( obsLatInDegrees <= (gridLats(latIndex)+0.000001) ) then
6914          latBinIndex = latIndex
6915          exit
6916        end if
6917      end do
6918      lonBinIndex = int( obsLonBurpFile/(36000.0/numGridLons(latBinIndex)) ) + 1
6919      if ( lonBinIndex > numGridLons(latBinIndex) ) lonBinIndex = numGridLons(latBinIndex)
6920
6921      ! Determine the time bin index
6922      call tim_getStepObsIndex(obsStepIndex_r8, tim_getDatestamp(), &
6923                               obsDate, obsTime, tim_nstepobs)
6924      timeBinIndex = nint(obsStepIndex_r8)
6925      delMinutes = nint(60.0 * tim_dstepobs * abs(real(timeBinIndex) - obsStepIndex_r8))
6926
6927      ! Determine distance from box center
6928      latBoxCenterInDegrees = gridLats(latBinIndex) - 0.5 * (180./numLat)
6929      lonBoxCenterInDegrees = (360. / numGridLons(latBinIndex)) * (lonBinIndex - 0.5)
6930      obsLat = (obsLatBurpFile - 9000.) / 100.
6931      obsLon = obsLonBurpFile / 100.
6932      distance = 1.0d-3 * phf_calcDistance(MPC_RADIANS_PER_DEGREE_R8 * latBoxCenterInDegrees, &
6933                                           MPC_RADIANS_PER_DEGREE_R8 * lonBoxCenterInDegrees, &
6934                                           MPC_RADIANS_PER_DEGREE_R8 * obsLat, &
6935                                           MPC_RADIANS_PER_DEGREE_R8 * obsLon )
6936
6937      ! Apply thinning criteria
6938      keepThisObs = .false.
6939
6940      ! keep if distance to box center smaller than limit and 
6941      ! time under limit fixed at input and maximise number of channels 
6942      if ( (distance < deltrad)                                              .and. &
6943           (numChannels >= numChannelsKeep(latBinIndex,lonBinIndex,timeBinIndex)) .and. &
6944           (delMinutes <= deltmax) ) keepThisObs = .true.
6945     
6946      ! keep the closest to bin central time
6947      if ( numChannels == numChannelsKeep(latBinIndex,lonBinIndex,timeBinIndex) ) then
6948        if ( headerIndexKeep(latBinIndex,lonBinIndex,timeBinIndex) == -1 ) then
6949          keepThisObs = .false.
6950        else
6951          if ( delMinutes > delMinutesKeep(latBinIndex,lonBinIndex,timeBinIndex) ) then
6952            keepThisObs = .false.
6953          end if
6954         
6955          if ( delMinutes == delMinutesKeep(latBinIndex,lonBinIndex,timeBinIndex) ) then
6956            if ( distance > distanceKeep(latBinIndex,lonBinIndex,timeBinIndex) ) then
6957              keepThisObs = .false.
6958            end if
6959          end if
6960
6961        end if
6962      end if
6963
6964      ! save the observation if thinning criteria is satisfied
6965      if ( keepThisObs ) then
6966        headerIndexKeep(latBinIndex,lonBinIndex,timeBinIndex) = headerIndex
6967        distanceKeep(latBinIndex,lonBinIndex,timeBinIndex)    = distance
6968        delMinutesKeep(latBinIndex,lonBinIndex,timeBinIndex)  = delMinutes
6969        numChannelsKeep(latBinIndex,lonBinIndex,timeBinIndex) = numChannels
6970      end if
6971
6972    end do HEADER1
6973
6974    ! communicate results to all other mpi tasks
6975    nsize = numLat * numLon * tim_nstepobs
6976    call rpn_comm_allgather(distanceKeep,     nsize, 'mpi_real4',  &
6977                            distanceKeepMpi,  nsize, 'mpi_real4', 'grid', ierr)
6978    call rpn_comm_allgather(delMinutesKeep,     nsize, 'mpi_integer',  &
6979                            delMinutesKeepMpi,  nsize, 'mpi_integer', 'grid', ierr)
6980    call rpn_comm_allgather(numChannelsKeep,     nsize, 'mpi_integer',  &
6981                            numChannelsKeepMpi,  nsize, 'mpi_integer', 'grid', ierr)
6982    call rpn_comm_allgather(headerIndexKeep,     nsize, 'mpi_integer',  &
6983                            headerIndexKeepMpi,  nsize, 'mpi_integer', 'grid', ierr)
6984
6985    ! reset arrays that store info about kept obs
6986    headerIndexKeep(:,:,:) = -1
6987    numChannelsKeep(:,:,:) = 0
6988    distanceKeep(:,:,:)    = 0.0
6989    delMinutesKeep(:,:,:)  = deltmax
6990
6991    do timeBinIndex = 1, tim_nstepobs
6992      do lonBinIndex = 1, numLon
6993        do latBinIndex = 1, numLat
6994
6995          ! Apply thinning criteria to results from all mpi tasks
6996          do procIndex = 1, mmpi_nprocs
6997
6998            headerIndex = headerIndexKeepMpi(latBinIndex,lonBinIndex,timeBinIndex,procIndex)
6999            distance    = distanceKeepMpi(latBinIndex,lonBinIndex,timeBinIndex,procIndex)
7000            delMinutes  = delMinutesKeepMpi(latBinIndex,lonBinIndex,timeBinIndex,procIndex)
7001            numChannels = numChannelsKeepMpi(latBinIndex,lonBinIndex,timeBinIndex,procIndex)
7002            
7003            keepThisObs = .false.
7004
7005            ! keep if distance to box center smaller than limit and 
7006            ! time under limit fixed at input and maximise number of channels 
7007            if ( (distance < deltrad)                                              .and. &
7008                 (numChannels >= numChannelsKeep(latBinIndex,lonBinIndex,timeBinIndex)) .and. &
7009                 (delMinutes <= deltmax) ) keepThisObs = .true.
7010     
7011            ! keep the closest to bin central time
7012            if ( numChannels == numChannelsKeep(latBinIndex,lonBinIndex,timeBinIndex) ) then
7013              if ( headerIndexKeep(latBinIndex,lonBinIndex,timeBinIndex) == -1 ) then
7014                keepThisObs = .false.
7015              else
7016                if ( delMinutes > delMinutesKeep(latBinIndex,lonBinIndex,timeBinIndex) ) then
7017                  keepThisObs = .false.
7018                end if
7019         
7020                if ( delMinutes == delMinutesKeep(latBinIndex,lonBinIndex,timeBinIndex) ) then
7021                  if ( distance > distanceKeep(latBinIndex,lonBinIndex,timeBinIndex) ) then
7022                    keepThisObs = .false.
7023                  end if
7024                end if
7025
7026              end if
7027            end if
7028
7029            ! save the observation if thinning criteria is satisfied
7030            if ( keepThisObs ) then
7031              procIndexKeep(latBinIndex,lonBinIndex,timeBinIndex)   = procIndex
7032              headerIndexKeep(latBinIndex,lonBinIndex,timeBinIndex) = headerIndex
7033              distanceKeep(latBinIndex,lonBinIndex,timeBinIndex)    = distance
7034              delMinutesKeep(latBinIndex,lonBinIndex,timeBinIndex)  = delMinutes
7035              numChannelsKeep(latBinIndex,lonBinIndex,timeBinIndex) = numChannels
7036            end if
7037
7038          end do ! procIndex
7039
7040        end do
7041      end do
7042    end do
7043
7044    ! determine which headerIndex values are rejected
7045    allocate(rejectThisHeader(obs_numheader(obsdat)))
7046    rejectThisHeader(:) = .true.
7047    do timeBinIndex = 1, tim_nstepobs
7048      do lonBinIndex = 1, numLon
7049        do latBinIndex = 1, numLat
7050          if (procIndexKeep(latBinIndex,lonBinIndex,timeBinIndex) == mmpi_myid+1) then
7051            headerIndex = headerIndexKeep(latBinIndex,lonBinIndex,timeBinIndex)
7052            rejectThisHeader(headerIndex) = .false.
7053          end if
7054        end do
7055      end do
7056    end do
7057
7058    ! modify flags, by setting bit 11 for those rejected, and count obs
7059    countHeader = 0
7060    numObsStnId(:) = 0
7061    call obs_set_current_header_list(obsdat,trim(familyType))
7062    HEADER2: do
7063      headerIndex = obs_getHeaderIndex(obsdat)
7064      if (headerIndex < 0) exit HEADER2
7065
7066      if (obs_headElem_i(obsdat, OBS_ITY, headerIndex) /= codtyp) cycle HEADER2
7067
7068      if (.not. rejectThisHeader(headerIndex)) then
7069
7070        stnid = obs_elem_c(obsdat,'STID',headerIndex)
7071        stnIdIndexFound = -1
7072        do stnIdIndex = 1, numStnId
7073          if ( stnidList(stnIdIndex) == stnid ) stnIdIndexFound = stnIdIndex
7074        end do
7075        if ( stnIdIndexFound == -1 ) then
7076          call utl_abort('thn_hyperByLatLonBoxes: Problem with stnId')
7077        end if
7078        numObsStnId(stnIdIndexFound) = numObsStnId(stnIdIndexFound) + 1
7079        countHeader = countHeader + 1
7080
7081        cycle HEADER2
7082      end if
7083
7084      ! loop over all body indices for this headerIndex
7085      call obs_set_current_body_list(obsdat, headerIndex)
7086      BODY2: do 
7087        bodyIndex = obs_getBodyIndex(obsdat)
7088        if (bodyIndex < 0) exit BODY2
7089
7090        obsFlag = obs_bodyElem_i(obsdat, OBS_FLG, bodyIndex)
7091        call obs_bodySet_i(obsdat, OBS_FLG, bodyIndex, ibset(obsFlag,11))
7092      end do BODY2
7093
7094    end do HEADER2
7095
7096    call rpn_comm_allReduce(countHeader, countHeaderMpi, 1, 'mpi_integer', &
7097                            'mpi_sum', 'grid', ierr)
7098
7099    write(*,*)
7100    write(*,'(a)')        ' == Output file == '
7101
7102    write(*,*)
7103    write(*,'(a,2i8)')     ' Number of valid satellite profiles  = ', countHeader, countHeaderMpi
7104    write(*,*)
7105
7106    do stnIdIndex = 1, numStnId
7107      call rpn_comm_allReduce(numObsStnId(stnIdIndex), countMpi, 1, 'mpi_integer', &
7108                              'mpi_sum', 'grid', ierr)
7109      write(*,'(a9,a,2i8)')  stnidList(stnIdIndex), ' :  ', numObsStnId(stnIdIndex), countMpi
7110    end do
7111    
7112    deallocate(rejectThisHeader)
7113    deallocate(headerIndexKeep)
7114    deallocate(numChannelsKeep)
7115    deallocate(distanceKeep)
7116    deallocate(delMinutesKeep)
7117    deallocate(gridLats)
7118    deallocate(numGridLons)
7119    deallocate(headerIndexKeepMpi)
7120    deallocate(numChannelsKeepMpi)
7121    deallocate(distanceKeepMpi)
7122    deallocate(delMinutesKeepMpi)
7123    deallocate(procIndexKeep)
7124    deallocate(stnIdIntMpi)
7125    deallocate(stnIdInt)
7126
7127    write(*,*)
7128    write(*,*) 'thn_hyperByLatLonBoxes: Finished'
7129    write(*,*)
7130
7131  end subroutine thn_hyperByLatLonBoxes
7132
7133  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
7134  ! thn_separation
7135  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
7136  function thn_separation(xlon1, xlat1, xlon2, xlat2)
7137    !:Purpose: Compute the separation distance for some thinning algorithms.
7138
7139    implicit none
7140
7141    ! Arguments:
7142    real(4) :: thn_separation
7143    real(4) :: xlat1, xlat2, xlon1, xlon2
7144
7145    ! Locals:
7146    real(4) :: cosval, degrad, raddeg
7147
7148    raddeg = 180.0 / 3.14159265358979
7149    degrad = 1.0 / raddeg
7150    cosval = sin(xlat1 * degrad) * sin(xlat2 * degrad) + &
7151             cos(xlat1 * degrad) * cos(xlat2 * degrad) * &
7152             cos((xlon1 - xlon2) * degrad)
7153
7154    if (cosval < -1.0d0) then
7155      cosval = -1.0d0
7156    else if (cosval > 1.0d0) then
7157      cosval = 1.0d0
7158    end if
7159    thn_separation = acos(cosval) * raddeg
7160
7161  end function thn_separation
7162
7163  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
7164  ! thn_thinSatSST
7165  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
7166  subroutine thn_thinSatSST(obsData)
7167    !:Purpose: Main subroutine for thinning of satellite SST obs.
7168
7169    implicit none
7170
7171    ! Arguments:
7172    type(struct_obs), intent(inout) :: obsData
7173
7174    ! Locals:
7175    integer :: nulnam
7176    integer :: fnom, fclos, ierr
7177    integer, parameter :: maxNumDataSetSST = 10 ! maximum number of SST datasets considered in surface thinning 
7178    integer :: dataSetSSTIndex, numberDataSetSST
7179
7180    ! Namelist variables
7181    logical :: doThinning                             ! if false, we return immediately
7182    integer :: numTimesteps                           ! thinning number of timesteps
7183    integer :: deltmax                                ! maximum time difference (in minutes)
7184    real(4) :: fractionGridCell                       ! keep data only inside a fraction of the grid cell size
7185    character(len=10) :: dataSetSST(maxNumDataSetSST) ! array of SST dataset names considered in thinning
7186
7187    namelist /thin_satSST/doThinning, numTimesteps, deltmax, fractionGridCell, dataSetSST
7188    
7189    ! set default values for namelist variables
7190    doThinning        = .false. 
7191    numTimesteps      = 5
7192    deltmax           = 90      
7193    fractionGridCell  = 1.0
7194    dataSetSST(:)     = ''
7195    
7196    ! return if no SST obs
7197    if (.not. obs_famExist(obsData, 'TM')) return
7198
7199    ! Read the namelist for Surface observations (if it exists)
7200    if (utl_isNamelistPresent('thin_satSST', './flnml')) then
7201      nulnam = 0
7202      ierr = fnom(nulnam, './flnml','FTN+SEQ+R/O', 0)
7203      if (ierr /= 0) call utl_abort('thn_thinSatSST: Error opening file flnml')
7204      read(nulnam,nml = thin_satSST, iostat = ierr)
7205      if (ierr /= 0) call utl_abort('thn_thinSatSST: Error reading namelist')
7206      if (mmpi_myid == 0) write(*, nml = thin_satSST)
7207      ierr = fclos(nulnam)
7208    else
7209      write(*,*)
7210      write(*,*) 'thn_thinSatSST: Namelist block thin_satSST is missing in the namelist.'
7211      write(*,*) '                The default value will be taken.'
7212      if (mmpi_myid == 0) write(*, nml = thin_satSST)
7213    end if 
7214       
7215    if (.not. doThinning) return
7216
7217    numberDataSetSST = 0
7218    do dataSetSSTIndex = 1, maxNumDataSetSST
7219      if (trim(dataSetSST(dataSetSSTIndex)) == '') exit
7220      numberDataSetSST = numberDataSetSST + 1
7221    end do
7222
7223    write(*,*)''
7224    if (numberDataSetSST > 0) then
7225      write(*,*) 'thn_thinSurface: satellite SST datasets considered in thinning: '
7226      do dataSetSSTIndex = 1, numberDataSetSST
7227        write(*,'(i5,a)') dataSetSSTIndex, trim(dataSetSST(dataSetSSTIndex))
7228      end do
7229    end if
7230
7231    call utl_tmg_start(114,'--ObsThinning')
7232    do dataSetSSTIndex = 1, numberDataSetSST
7233      call thn_satelliteSSTByGridCell(obsData, dataSetSST(dataSetSSTIndex), &
7234                                      numTimesteps, deltmax, fractionGridCell)
7235    end do
7236    call utl_tmg_stop(114)
7237
7238  end subroutine thn_thinSatSST
7239
7240  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
7241  ! thn_satelliteSSTByGridCell
7242  !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
7243  subroutine thn_satelliteSSTByGridCell(obsData, dataSet, numTimesteps, deltmax, fractionGridCell)
7244    !
7245    !:Purpose: thinning satellite SST data by grid cells.
7246    !          Set bit 11 of obs_flg on observations that are to be rejected.
7247    !          The algorithm consists in keeping median satellite SST data
7248    !          within one grid cell.
7249    !          The grid is provided in the input file analysisgrid_thinning_satSST.
7250    !
7251    implicit none
7252
7253    ! Arguments:
7254    type(struct_obs), intent(inout) :: obsData          ! obsSpace data object
7255    character(len=*), intent(in)    :: dataSet          ! station ID (id_stn variable in SQLite obs.files)
7256    integer         , intent(in)    :: numTimesteps     ! thinning number of timesteps
7257    integer         , intent(in)    :: deltmax          ! maximum time difference (in minutes)
7258    real(4)         , intent(in)    :: fractionGridCell ! between 0. and 1., keep data only inside a fraction of the grid cell size
7259    
7260    ! Locals:
7261    type(struct_hco), pointer :: hco_thinning
7262    integer :: headerIndexBeg, headerIndexEnd
7263    integer :: ierr, lonIndex, latIndex, stepIndex, codeType
7264    integer :: obsLonIndex, obsLatIndex, obsStepIndex
7265    integer :: numHeader, numHeaderMaxMpi, headerIndex, bodyIndex
7266    integer :: satSSTCount, satSSTCountMpi
7267    integer :: obsFlag, obsVarno, obsDate, obsTime
7268    real(8) :: delMinutes, obsStepIndex_r8
7269    real(8) :: obsLon, obsLat
7270    real(8) :: deltaLon, deltaLat, deltaLatCell, deltaLonCell
7271    real(4) :: obsDistance, sizeGridCell
7272    integer :: medianIndex
7273    logical :: llok
7274    real(4), allocatable :: lonGrid(:), latGrid(:)
7275    logical, allocatable :: valid(:), validMpi(:)
7276    integer, allocatable :: obsLonIndexVec(:), obsLonIndexMpi(:)
7277    integer, allocatable :: obsLatIndexVec(:), obsLatIndexMpi(:) 
7278    integer, allocatable :: obsTimeIndexVec(:), obsTimeIndexMpi(:)
7279    real(4), allocatable :: obsSST(:), obsSSTMpi(:)
7280    type countSatSSTdataType
7281      integer              :: numObs         ! number of data inside each grid cell
7282      real(4), allocatable :: dataVec(:)     ! vector of data inside each grid cell
7283      integer, allocatable :: headerIndex(:) ! header indexes inside each grid cell
7284    end type countSatSSTdataType
7285    type(countSatSSTdataType), allocatable :: dataGrid(:,:) ! for each lon/lat of the grid
7286
7287    write(*,*)
7288    write(*,*) 'thn_satelliteSSTByGridCell: Starting satellite SST data thinning for sensor: ', trim(dataSet)
7289    write(*,*)
7290
7291    numHeader = obs_numHeader(obsData)
7292    call rpn_comm_allReduce(numHeader, numHeaderMaxMpi, 1, 'mpi_integer', 'mpi_max','grid',ierr)
7293
7294    allocate(valid(numHeaderMaxMpi))
7295    valid(:) = .false.
7296
7297    ! count satellite SST data of the current sensor (id_stn)
7298    satSSTCount = 0
7299    do headerIndex = 1, numHeader      
7300      bodyIndex = obs_headElem_i(obsData, obs_rln, headerIndex)
7301      llok = (obs_bodyElem_i(obsData, obs_ass, bodyIndex) == obs_assimilated)
7302      if (.not. llok) cycle
7303      obsVarno  = obs_bodyElem_i(obsData, obs_vnm, bodyIndex)
7304      if (obsVarno /= bufr_sst) cycle
7305      codeType = obs_headElem_i(obsData, obs_ity, headerIndex)
7306      if (codeType /= codtyp_get_codtyp('satob')) cycle
7307
7308      if (trim(obs_elem_c(obsData, 'STID' , headerIndex)) == trim(dataSet)) then
7309        satSSTCount = satSSTCount + 1
7310        valid(headerIndex) = .true.
7311      end if
7312    end do
7313
7314    ! Return if no satellite SST obs to thin
7315    allocate(validMpi(numHeaderMaxMpi * mmpi_nprocs))
7316    validMpi(:) = .false.
7317    call rpn_comm_allgather(valid,    numHeaderMaxMpi, 'mpi_logical',  &
7318                            validMpi, numHeaderMaxMpi, 'mpi_logical', 'grid', ierr)
7319    if (count(validMpi(:)) == 0) then
7320      write(*,*) 'thn_satelliteSSTByGridCell: no ', trim(dataSet), ' SST data present'
7321      return
7322    end if
7323
7324    write(*,*) 'thn_satelliteSSTByGridCell: ', trim(dataSet), ': numHeader, numHeaderMaxMpi: ', &
7325               numHeader, numHeaderMaxMpi
7326
7327    call rpn_comm_allReduce(satSSTCount, satSSTCountMpi, 1, 'mpi_integer', 'mpi_sum','grid', ierr)
7328    write(*,*) 'thn_satelliteSSTByGridCell: ', trim(dataSet),' data: total number of initial data: ', satSSTCountMpi
7329    write(*,*) 'thn_satelliteSSTByGridCell: ', trim(dataSet),' data: number of thinning timesteps: ', numTimesteps
7330
7331    ! Setup horizontal thinning grid
7332    nullify(hco_thinning)
7333    call hco_SetupFromFile(hco_thinning, './analysisgrid_thinning_satSST', 'ANALYSIS', 'Analysis')
7334
7335    ! Setup thinning grid parameters
7336    allocate(lonGrid(hco_thinning%ni))
7337    allocate(latGrid(hco_thinning%nj))
7338    lonGrid(:) = hco_thinning%lon(:) * MPC_DEGREES_PER_RADIAN_R8
7339    latGrid(:) = hco_thinning%lat(:) * MPC_DEGREES_PER_RADIAN_R8
7340    allocate(dataGrid(hco_thinning%nj, hco_thinning%ni))
7341
7342    ! Allocate vectors
7343    allocate(obsLatIndexVec(numHeaderMaxMpi))
7344    allocate(obsLonIndexVec(numHeaderMaxMpi))
7345    allocate(obsTimeIndexVec(numHeaderMaxMpi))
7346    allocate(obsSST(numHeaderMaxMpi))
7347
7348    ! Allocate mpi global vectors
7349    allocate(obsLatIndexMpi(numHeaderMaxMpi * mmpi_nprocs))
7350    allocate(obsLonIndexMpi(numHeaderMaxMpi * mmpi_nprocs))
7351    allocate(obsTimeIndexMpi(numHeaderMaxMpi * mmpi_nprocs))
7352    allocate(obsSSTMpi(numHeaderMaxMpi * mmpi_nprocs))
7353
7354    ! Initialize vectors
7355    obsLatIndexVec(:) = 0
7356    obsLonIndexVec(:) = 0
7357    obsTimeIndexVec(:) = 0
7358    obsSST(:) = 0.
7359
7360    HEADER: do headerIndex = 1, numHeader
